sql.sql: select distinct jc.nsrjcuuid, jc.fpzl_dm, jc.djxh, zl.fpzlmc, jc.fp_dm, fp.fpdmmc, fp.jldw_dm, jc.fs, jc.fpqshm, jc.fpzzhm, fp.phcd, jc.fpzt_dm, fp.mbfs, zl.zppz_dm, zl.defpbz, zl.zkdklx_dm, zl.fplb_dm, zl.tdhy_dm, zl.skbz, jc.swjg_dm, jc.lrr_dm, jc.sjgsdq, fp.fpme, fp.yspc, fp.fpzg, zl.defpxebz from fp_nsrfpjc jc, dm_fp_fpzl zl, dm_fp_fp fp where jc.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm and jc.fp_dm = fp.fp_dm and zl.fpzl_dm = fp.fpzl_dm and jc.djxh = ? and jc.fpzt_dm= ?
select gpruuid, sqspuuid, gprxm, lxdh, sfzjzl_dm, sfzjhm, fppzhdczlx_dm, sjgsdq, lrr_dm, gprqcuuid, lrrq, sjtb_sj from fp_pzhdsqsp_gpr where sqspuuid = ?

select sq.bdswxzxkuuid, sq.lcslid, sq.slr_dm, sq.djxh, sq.bdswxzxklx_dm, sq.slswjg_dm, sq.slrq, sq.zstybz, sq.lrr_dm, sq.lrrq, sq.chbgbz from fp_swxzxk_bdqk_sqsp sq where sq.bdswxzxklx_dm = '5' and sq.bdswxzxkuuid = (select bgmx.bdswxzxkuuid from fp_swxzxk_bdqk_bgmx bgmx where bgmx.lrrq = (select max(lrrq) from fp_swxzxk_bdqk_bgmx mx where mx.swxzxkuuid = ?))

select djxh, yzybdwmcfpbauuid, swjg_dm, fpzl_dm, sbrq_1, jbr, bfs, fp_dm, gg_dm, mbfs, jeb_dm, lc_dm, zz_dm, wzb_dm, pjzdfs_dm, fpdmmc, bz, gmfplqfs_dm, ysswjg_dm, fpme, fpyzmc, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sjgsdq, gg, zfbz_1, zfr_dm, zfrq_1, sjtb_sj, yzly, lxr, lxdh, jzdw, thyy, bazt from fp_yzybdwmcfpbaxx a where a.zfbz_1 = 'Y' and (1 = ? or a.lrr_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or a.lrrq >= ?) and (1 = ? or a.lrrq-1 <= ? ) and bazt = ?

select kc.fpzl_dm, zl.fpzlmc, kc.fp_dm, fp.fpdmmc, kc.fpqshm, kc.fpzzhm, kc.bs as sl, (kc.bs * fp.fpjj) as je, fp.mbfs, zl.jldw_dm as dwsl_dm, kc.fpkf_dm, kf.fpkfgtmc from fp_swjgkfkc kc, dm_fp_fp fp, dm_fp_fpzl zl, fp_fpkf kf where kc.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm and kc.fpzl_dm = fp.fpzl_dm and zl.fpzl_dm = fp.fpzl_dm and kc.fp_dm = fp.fp_dm and zl.yxbz = 'Y' and fp.yxbz = 'Y' and kc.fpkf_dm = kf.fpkf_dm and (1 = ? or kf.ssswjg_dm in (#macroparam#)) and (1 = ? or kc.fpkf_dm = ?) and kc.fpzt_dm = ? order by kc.fpzl_dm, kc.fp_dm, kc.fpqshm

select mx.jxsqmxuuid, mx.fpzl_dm, zl.fpzlmc, mx.fp_dm, mx.fpqshm, mx.fpzzhm, mx.je, mx.fpjxlx_dm, mx.fpsl, mx.jxdx_dm, zl.jldw_dm from fp_jxsq sq, fp_jxsq_mx mx, dm_fp_fpzl zl where sq.jxsquuid = mx.jxsquuid and mx.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm and sq.djxh = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or sq.slrq >= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or sq.slrq <= ?) and mx.zfbz_1 = 'N' and (1 = #macroparam# or mx.fpjxlx_dm = ?) order by mx.fpzl_dm, mx.fp_dm, mx.fpqshm
select * from fp_waqsbdkzzskspzdkshb where lcslid = ? and hdslid = ?

select
(select b.fpkfgtmc from fp_fpkf b where b.fpkf_dm = a.fpckkf_dm) fpckdwmc, a.fpckkf_dm, (select d.fpkfgtmc from fp_fpkf d where d.fpkf_dm = a.fprkkf_dm) fprkdwmc, a.fprkkf_dm, x.fpzl_dm, e.fpzlmc, x.fp_dm, x.fpqshm, x.fpzzhm, c.kfdbuuid, c.lrr_dm sqr_dm, c.sqrxm, c.ckfswry_dm ckr_dm, f.swryxm ckrxm, a.hzfpdbckdbz, x.sfrk, a.lrrq
from fp_dbckd a, fp_dbckd_mx x, fp_kfdbsq c, dm_fp_fpzl e, dm_gy_swry f where a.dbckuuid = x.dbckuuid and a.kfdbuuid = c.kfdbuuid and x.fpzl_dm = e.fpzl_dm(+) and c.ckfswry_dm = f.swry_dm(+) and a.kfdbuuid = ? and (1 = ? or a.hzfpdbckdbz = ?) and c.zfbz_1 = 'N' and c.fpdbzt_dm != '50' and not exists (select 1 from fp_dbrkd r where r.kfdbuuid = a.kfdbuuid) order by a.lrrq desc

select esc.esccgluuid, esc.djxh, esc.fp_dm, esc.fphm, esc.kprq, esc.mfsfsbh, esc.mfmc, esc.mfsfsbh_1, esc.mfmc_1, esc.cjhj, esc.fpkjqk_dm, esc.cglcjfpyjuuid, esc.sjgsdq, esc.lrr_dm, esc.lrrq, esc.xgr_dm, esc.xgrq, esc.fpzl_dm from fp_cglcj_escfp esc where esc.fpzl_dm = ? and esc.fp_dm = ? and esc.fphm = ? and (esc.zfbz_1 != 'Y' or esc.zfbz_1 is null)

select tz.tzsjgzgpzuuid, tz.fphd_dm, tz.gnbh, tz.swjg_dm, tz.dywszglx_dm, tz.swjgjg, tz.zg, tz.bz, tz.yxbz, tz.lrr_dm, tz.lrrq, tz.xgr_dm, tz.xgrq, tz.sjgsdq ,tz.SJSWJG_DM from fp_tzsjgzgpz tz where tz.fphd_dm = ? and tz.gnbh = ? and tz.swjg_dm = ? and tz.yxbz = 'Y' order by tz.lrrq desc

SELECT COUNT(1) cnt FROM QX_SWJG_GW G, QX_JGGW_SWRYSF SF WHERE G.GWXH = SF.GWXH AND G.SWJG_DM IN (#macroparam#) AND (EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM QX_GW_XTGN X WHERE G.GW_DM = X.GW_DM AND X.YXBZ = 'Y' AND X.XTGN_DM = ?) OR EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM QX_GW_GNJ GNJ, DM_QX_GNJ DM, QX_GNJ_XTGN XTGN WHERE G.GW_DM = GNJ.GW_DM AND GNJ.GNJ_DM = DM.GNJ_DM AND GNJ.GNJ_DM = XTGN.GNJ_DM AND XTGN.XTGN_DM = ? AND GNJ.YXBZ = 'Y' AND XTGN.YXBZ = 'Y' AND DM.YXBZ = 'Y')) AND G.YXBZ = 'Y' AND SF.YXBZ = 'Y'

select T.SWXZXKUUID, T.SWXZXKXM_DM, t.xkyxqq, t.xkyxqz, T.djxh, T.swjg_dm, T.swxzxkzt_dm, T.lrr_dm, T.lrrq, T.xgr_dm, T.xgrq, T.sjgsdq from FP_SWXZXK T WHERE T.SWXZXKZT_DM = '1' AND T.DJXH = ? and t.swxzxkxm_dm = ? and T.xkyxqz >= SYSDATE

SELECT M.FPZL_DM, M.FP_DM, M.FPQSHM, M.FPZZHM FROM FP_LY L, FP_LY_MX M WHERE L.FPLYUUID = M.FPLYUUID AND M.FPZL_DM = ? AND M.FP_DM = ? AND TO_NUMBER(M.FPQSHM) <= ? AND TO_NUMBER(M.FPZZHM) >= ? AND M.WTDKBZ = ? AND L.DJXH = ?

select a.fphbqxuuid, a.fpzl_dm, a.fp_dm, a.hbyy, a.swjg_dm, a.jxrqq, a.jxrqz from fp_hbjxqxsz a where (1 = #macroparam# or a.fpzl_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.fp_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or a.swjg_dm = ?)
select j.djsquuid, j.lcslid, j.sqrq, j.djrdjxh, j.djrxm_1, j.djrsfzjlx_dm, j.djrsfzjhm, j.slswjg_dm from fp_yjfpdjsq j where j.lcslid = ?

select distinct zl.fpzl_dm, zl.fpzlmc, fp.fp_dm, fp.fpdmmc, fp.phcd from dm_fp_fpzl zl, dm_fp_fp fp where zl.fplb_dm in (#macroparam#) #macroparam# and zl.fpzl_dm = fp.fpzl_dm order by zl.fpzl_dm, fp.fp_dm

select t.sfcmxuuid, t.sfcuuid, t.fp_dm, t.fpzl_dm, t.dwsl_dm, t.sqjcsl, t.sqjcje, t.bqsdsl, t.bqsdje, t.bqfssl, t.bqfsje, t.bqfcsl, t.bqfcje, t.bqhxsl, t.bqhxje, t.bqtpsl, t.bqtpje, t.bqdksl, t.bqdkje, t.bqjcsl, t.bqjcje, t.bqgssl, t.bqgsje, t.sfph, t.lrr_dm, t.sjgsdq, t.lrrq, t.xgr_dm, t.xgrq, t.fpkf_dm, zl.fpzlmc from fp_sfcqkbg_mx t ,dm_fp_fpzl zl where t.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm and t.sfcuuid = ?

select cjmx.mxuuid, cjmx.uuid, cjmx.tssjcjsjx_dm, cjmx.xh, cjmx.tjsjq, cjmx.tjsjz, cjmx.tjdy, cjmx.lrrq, cjmx.lrr_dm, cjmx.xgrq, cjmx.xgr_dm, cjmx.sjgsdq, cjmx.nr from fp_tssjcj_mx cjmx,fp_tssjcj cj where cjmx.uuid = cj.tssjcjuuid #macroparam#

select a.fpzl_dm, a.fp_dm, a.fpqshm, a.fpzzhm, '14' fphd_dm, '调拨入库撤销' fphdmc, kf.fpkf_dm, kf.fpkfgtmc, zl.fpzlmc, a.fpzl_dm from fp_dbrkd_mx a, fp_dbrkd b, fp_kfdbsq c, fp_fpkf kf, dm_fp_fpzl zl where b.kfdbuuid = c.kfdbuuid and c.zfbz_1 = 'Y' and a.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm(+) and b.dbrkuuid = a.dbrkuuid and b.fprkkf_dm = kf.fpkf_dm and b.kfdbuuid = ?

select a.fpzl_dm, a.fp_dm, a.fpqshm, a.fpzl_dm, a.fpzzhm, '41' fphd_dm, '发票领用' fphdmc, kf.fpkf_dm, kf.fpkf_dm, fpzlmc from fp_ly_mx a, fp_ly b, fp_fpkf kf,dm_fp_fpzl zl where a.fplyuuid = b.fplyuuid and a.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm(+) and b.fpkf_dm = kf.fpkf_dm and a.fplymxuuid=?

select a.rkcyuuid, a.lcuuid, a.spfzr_dm, a.cyr_dm, a.cyrq, a.bz, a.fpdbzt_dm, a.cytgbz, a.kfdbuuid, (select d.fpkfgtmc from fp_fpkf d where d.fpkf_dm = a.fprkkf_dm) fprkdwmc, a.fprkkf_dm, (select b.fpkfgtmc from fp_fpkf b where b.fpkf_dm = a.fpckkf_dm) fpckdwmc, a.fpckkf_dm, a.ckr_dm from fp_rkswcyd a where a.lcuuid = ?
select qh.xzqhsz_dm code, qh.xzqhmc caption, qh.sjxzqhsz_dm pcode from dm_gy_xzqh qh where yxbz = 'Y' and xybz = 'Y' start with qh.xzqhsz_dm = ? connect by prior qh.xzqhsz_dm = sjxzqhsz_dm
select * from fp_yrzzzskspzqd_hgjks where waqsbdkzzskspzdksqduuid = ?
select distinct a.dcxcqduuid from fp_dcxcqdb a , fp_dcxcqdb_mx b where a.dcxcqduuid = b.dcxcqduuid and b.djxh=? and a.qdpch=?

select tpuuid, lcslid, hdslid, djxh, zgqxq, zgqxz, sqly, sqrq, sqrxm, slrq, slr_dm, gptplx_dm, slswjg_dm, ljgpje, dyljykdefpje, hzr_dm, hzrq, hzswjg_dm, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sjgsdq, hztpje from fp_gptp_sqsp where lcslid = ?

select y.djxh, m.fpzl_dm, m.fp_dm, m.fpqshm, m.fpzzhm, m.kpqsrq, m.kpjzrq, m.kpje from fp_yjjcyqk_mx m, fp_yjjcyqk y where m.fpcyuuid = y.fpcyuuid and y.djxh = ? and m.fpzl_dm = ? and m.fp_dm = ? and m.fpqshm = ? and m.fpzzhm = ? and m.zfbz_1 != 'Y'

select hd.fpzl_dm, hd.dffpzgkpxe_dm, hd.myzggpsl, hd.mczggpsl, hd.cpzgsl, hd.fpgpfs_dm, hd.wtdkbz, hd.dffpzgkpxe, hd.djxh, hd.yxqq, hd.yxqz, hd.yxbz from fp_pzhdxx hd, where hd.djxh =? and hd.yxqq <= ? AND hd.yxqz >= ? AND hd.yxbz = 'Y'

SELECT QD.DCXCZHUUID, QD.DCXCQDUUID FROM FP_DCXCQDB_MX QDBMX, FP_DCXCQDB QD WHERE QDBMX.DCXCQDUUID = QD.DCXCQDUUID AND QDBMX.DCXCQDUUID != ? AND QDBMX.DJXH = ? AND QDBMX.DCSX_DM = ? AND QD.QDRQ = (SELECT MAX(QD.QDRQ) FROM FP_DCXCQDB_MX QDBMX, FP_DCXCQDB QD WHERE QDBMX.DCXCQDUUID = QD.DCXCQDUUID AND QDBMX.DJXH = ? AND QDBMX.DCSX_DM = ?)
delete fp_sssxdcnsrpfb pf where 1 = 1 #macroparam#
SELECT ZSXM_DM,ZSPM_Dm,ZFSBZ,SFHBBZ FROM CS_FP_FPDKSFZPZB t WHERE t.zszsxm_dm = ? AND t.zszspm_dm = ? AND t.swjg_dm= ?

select b.*, d.phcd from fp_cglcj a, fp_cglcj_bdcfp b left join fp_cglcj_fpyj c on b.cglcjfpyjuuid = c.cglcjfpyjuuid, dm_fp_fp d where a.fpcglcjuuid = b.fpcglcjuuid and b.zfbz_1 = 'N' and b.fp_dm = d.fp_dm and ((c.zfbz_1 = 'Y') or (b.cglcjfpyjuuid is null)) and a.fpcglcjuuid = ?

select pf.sssxdcnsruuid, pf.lsrwbh, pf.dcswjg_dm, pf.dcr_dm, pf.dcrjh, pf.pfswjg_dm, pf.pfr_dm, pf.jsjg_dm, pf.jsr_dm, pf.jsrjh, pf.lcslid, pf.blzt_dm, nvl(pf.xgrq, pf.lrrq) pfrq, pf.lrr_dm, pf.lrrq, pf.xgrq, pf.xgr_dm, pf.sjgsdq, pf.xguuid from fp_sssxdcnsrpfb pf where pf.lsrwbh in (select max(zhb.lsrwbh) lsrwbh from fp_dcxczhb zhb where exists (select 1 from fp_dcxcqdb qd, (select distinct qdmx.dcxcqduuid, qdmx.djxh from fp_dcxcqdb_mx qdmx where qdmx.djxh = ?) qdbmx where qd.dcxcqduuid = qdbmx.dcxcqduuid and zhb.dcxczhuuid = qd.dcxczhuuid #macroparam# ) and zhb.djxh = ?)
delete from fp_waqsbdkzzskspzdkshb w where lcslid = ?

select distinct jx.jxsquuid as uuid, jx.lrrq as rq, jx.slswjg_dm as swjg_dm, swjg.swjgmc, '7' as dylx_dm from fp_jxsq jx, fp_jxsq_mx mx, dm_gy_swjg swjg where jx.jxsquuid = mx.jxsquuid and jx.slswjg_dm = swjg.swjg_dm and jx.djxh = ? and (mx.zfbz_1 <> 'Y' or mx.zfbz_1 is null) and to_date(to_char(jx.lrrq, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') >= ? and to_date(to_char(jx.lrrq, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') <= ? order by jx.lrrq desc

delete from fp_yrzzzskspzqd_sqdkxx where yrzzzskspzqduuid in (select yrzzzskspzqduuid from fp_yrzzzskspzqd_zzszyfp where waqsbdkzzskspzdksqduuid =(select waqsbdkzzskspzdksqduuid from fp_waqsbdkzzskspzdksqd where lcslid = ?))
SELECT COUNT(1) scsl from fp_dk_sq WHERE djxh=? AND lrrq>=to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND lrrq<to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD')+1 AND dkfplb_dm=? AND zfbz_1='N'

select a.rkcymxuuid, a.rkcyuuid, a.fpzl_dm, b.fpzlmc, a.fp_dm, c.fpdmmc, a.xqshm, a.xzzhm, a.xs, a.mxbfs, a.bs, a.mbfs, a.fs, a.fpqshm, a.fpzzhm, a.dj, a.xsje, a.sjgsdq, a.lrr_dm, a.xgr_dm, c.phcd, a.dsbdbz, a.cybdsjbz, a.cybdsjclbz, a.fpdbcyshjg_dm, a.tzyj_dm from fp_rkswcyd_mx a, dm_fp_fpzl b, dm_fp_fp c, fp_rkswcyd x where a.rkcyuuid = x.rkcyuuid and a.fpzl_dm = b.fpzl_dm and a.fp_dm = c.fp_dm and (1 = ? or x.kfdbuuid = ?) and (1 = ? or a.cybdsjbz = ? ) and (1 = ? or a.dsbdbz = ? ) and (1 = ? or a.tzyj_dm = ? ) and (1 = ? or a.cybdsjclbz = ? ) and (1 = ? or a.FPDBCYSHJG_DM in (#macroparam#))

SELECT DISTINCT ZH.ZHRWBH LSRWBH, TO_CHAR(ZH.DJXH) DJXH, PF.SSSXDCNSRUUID, PF.DCSWJG_DM, PF.DCR_DM, PF.DCRJH, PF.PFSWJG_DM, PF.PFR_DM, PF.JSJG_DM, PF.JSR_DM, PF.JSRJH, PF.LCSLID, PF.BLZT_DM, PF.SJGSDQ, NVL(PF.XGRQ, PF.LRRQ) PFRQ FROM FP_DCXCZHB ZH, FP_SSSXDCNSRPFB PF WHERE ZH.ZHRWBH = PF.LSRWBH #macroparam#
select t.dcxm_dm as code, t.dcxmmc as caption,t.dcsx_dm as pcode from dm_zh_dcxm t where t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.xybz = 'Y' #macroparam#
select a.tdhy_dm, a.tdhymc tdhyhc from dm_fp_tdhy a where a.xybz = 'Y' and a.yxbz = 'Y' and (1 = #macroparam# or a.fplb_dm = ?) order by a.tdhy_dm

SELECT T.HDQCUUID, T.DJXH, ZL.FPLB_DM, T.FPZL_DM, ZL.TDHY_DM, T.MYZGGPSL, T.MCZGGPSL, T.CPZGSL, T.YXQQ, T.YXQZ, T.YXBZ, T.SWJG_DM, T.FPGPFS_DM, T.DFFPZGKPXE_DM, T.DFFPZGKPXE, T.WTDKBZ, ZL.FPZLMC, ZL.TKFS_DM, ZL.SKBZ, ZL.DEFPBZ, ZL.ZPPZ_DM, t.lxkpsx, t.lxkpljxe FROM FP_PZHDXX T, DM_FP_FPZL ZL WHERE T.FPZL_DM = ZL.FPZL_DM AND T.DJXH = ? AND T.YXBZ = 'Y' ORDER BY T.FPZL_DM
select yj.fpzl_dm, yj.fpyjbs from fp_kfyjxx yj, dm_fp_fpzl zl where yj.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm and yj.fpkf_dm = ? and zl.fplb_dm = ? and zl.tdhy_dm = ?

select pf.sssxdcnsruuid, pf.lsrwbh, pf.dcswjg_dm, pf.dcr_dm, pf.dcrjh, pf.pfswjg_dm, pf.pfr_dm, pf.jsjg_dm, pf.jsr_dm, pf.jsrjh, pf.lcslid, pf.blzt_dm, pf.sjgsdq, nvl(pf.xgrq, pf.lrrq) pfrq, pf.lrr_dm, pf.lrrq, pf.xgr_dm, pf.xgrq, pf.xguuid from fp_sssxdcnsrpfb pf where pf.lsrwbh in (select max(zhb.lsrwbh) lsrwbh from fp_dcxczhb zhb where zhb.dcxczhuuid = ? and zhb.djxh= ? )

select b.fpcglcjuuid, b.esccgluuid, b.lrr_dm, swry.swryxm lrrxm, b.lrrq, b.fpzl_dm, b.fp_dm, fp.fpdmmc, b.fphm, trim(a.cglsjcjlx_dm) cglsjcjlxDm from fp_cglcj a, fp_cglcj_escfp b, dm_gy_swry swry, dm_fp_fp fp where a.fpcglcjuuid = b.fpcglcjuuid and b.lrr_dm = swry.swry_dm and b.fp_dm = fp.fp_dm and b.zfbz_1 = 'N' and a.djxh = ? and a.fpcglcjuuid = ?

select t.fpkf_dm, t.fpzl_dm, t.fp_dm, t.fpqshm, t.fpzzhm, '04' fphd_dm, '印制入库撤销' fphdmc, kf.fpkfgtmc, zl.fpzlmc, t.fpkf_dm from fp_yzrkxx t,fp_fpkf kf,dm_fp_fpzl zl where t.yzrkuuid = ? and t.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm(+) and t.fpkf_dm = kf.fpkf_dm and t.zfbz_1 = 'Y'

select fplgbuuid, lcslid, djxh, fpglyxm, fplgbhm, slswjg_dm, sjgsdq, wszzrq, sfzjhm, sfzjlx_dm, lrrq from fp_lgbff where (1=#macroparam# or djxh=?) and (1=#macroparam# or fplgbhm=?) order by lrrq desc

select bdswxzxkuuid, lcslid, djxh, bdswxzxklx_dm, slr_dm, slswjg_dm, zstybz, slrq, zsr_dm, zsrq_3, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sjgsdq, sjtb_sj, dlrlxdh, dlrmc, dlrdz, dlrsfzjzl_dm, dlrsfzjhm, sqly, sqdbh, DZ, LXDH, YZBM, zybgwszg, bybgwszg, fpzyzwszg, wtdsyhswszg, zyyxwszg from FP_SWXZXK_BDQK_SQSP WHERE LCSLID = ?

select * from ( select T.SWXZXKUUID, T.SWXZXKXM_DM, t.xkyxqq, t.xkyxqz, T.djxh, T.swjg_dm, T.swxzxkzt_dm, T.lrr_dm, T.lrrq, T.xgr_dm, T.xgrq, T.sjgsdq, t.lssqbz, xe.kpxeuuid, xe.fpzl_dm, xe.fpzgkpxe_dm, xe.yxbz from FP_SWXZXK T,fp_swxzxk_zgxe xe WHERE T.SWXZXKZT_DM = '1' and t.swxzxkuuid = xe.swxzxkuuid and xe.fpzl_dm='1130' and (t.lssqbz <> 'Y' or t.lssqbz is null) and t.djxh = ? and t.swxzxkxm_dm='03' and xe.yxbz='Y' and t.xkyxqz >= SYSDATE order by lrrq desc ) where rownum=1 union select * from ( select T.SWXZXKUUID, T.SWXZXKXM_DM, t.xkyxqq, t.xkyxqz, T.djxh, T.swjg_dm, T.swxzxkzt_dm, T.lrr_dm, T.lrrq, T.xgr_dm, T.xgrq, T.sjgsdq, t.lssqbz, xe.kpxeuuid, xe.fpzl_dm, xe.fpzgkpxe_dm, xe.yxbz from FP_SWXZXK T,fp_swxzxk_zgxe xe WHERE T.SWXZXKZT_DM = '1' and t.swxzxkuuid = xe.swxzxkuuid and xe.fpzl_dm='1160' and (t.lssqbz <> 'Y' or t.lssqbz is null) and t.djxh = ? and xe.yxbz='Y' and t.swxzxkxm_dm='03' and t.xkyxqz >= SYSDATE order by lrrq desc ) where rownum=1
select count(1) from dm_fp_fp where fpzl_dm=? and yxbz='Y' and xybz='Y'

select YHSPDSSQSPUUID, DJXH, LCSLID, HDSLID, SQLY, YWFW, SXFBL, XDSKJJQX, XKYXQQ, XKYXQZ, SCJGSCYJ_DM, SCJGSCYJSM, SCR_DM, SCSWJG_DM, SCRQ, LRR_DM, LRRQ, XGR_DM, XGRQ, SJGSDQ from fp_swxzxk_dsyhsp_sqsp yhs where yhs.lcslid = ?

select max(to_number(x.fpzzhm)) from (select a.fpzzhm, a.fp_dm from fp_swjgqckccj a where a.zfbz_1 = 'N' union select b.fpzzhm, b.fp_dm from fp_yzrkxx b where b.zfbz_1 = 'N' union select c.fpzzhm, c.fp_dm from fp_yzjhfp_mx c, fp_yzjhfp d where c.yzfpuuid = d.yzfpuuid and d.zfbz_1 = 'N' union select e.fpzzhm, e.fp_dm from fp_yybdwmczzsptfpba_mx e, fp_yybdwmczzsptfpba f where e.yybdwmczzsptfpuuid = f.yybdwmczzsptfpuuid and f.zfbz_1 = 'N' and e.zfbz_1 = 'N') x where x.fp_dm = ?

select mx.fplyuuid, mx.fplymxuuid, mx.fpzl_dm, mx.fp_dm, mx.fpqshm, mx.fpzzhm, mx.fpsl, mx.wtdkbz, mx.xpbz, mx.lrrq, zl.fpzlmc, fp.fpdmmc, zl.defpbz, zl.zppz_dm, fp.fpjj, fp.fpxj, zl.fplb_dm, zl.tdhy_dm, ly.gprxm ,ly.fpdzxxlqfs_dm from fp_ly ly, fp_ly_mx mx, dm_fp_fpzl zl, dm_fp_fp fp where ly.fplyuuid = mx.fplyuuid and mx.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm and mx.fpzl_dm = fp.fpzl_dm and mx.fp_dm = fp.fp_dm and zl.fpzl_dm = fp.fpzl_dm and ly.djxh = ? and mx.lrrq > = ? and mx.lrrq < (? +1) and (1 = #macroparam# or not exists (select tp.fptpuuid from fp_tp tp, fp_tp_mx tpmx where tp.fptpuuid = tpmx.fptpuuid and tp.djxh = ly.djxh and tpmx.fpzl_dm = mx.fpzl_dm and tpmx.fp_dm = mx.fp_dm and to_number(tpmx.fpqshm) <= to_number(mx.fpzzhm) and to_number(tpmx.fpzzhm) >= to_number(mx.fpqshm) and tpmx.lrrq >= mx.lrrq)) and mx.xpbz in (#macroparam#)
delete from fp_kfgly_dbfpzl a where a.kfgly_dm = ? and a.fpkf_dm = ?

select distinct zl.fpzl_dm, zl.fpzlmc, fp.fp_dm, fp.fpdmmc, fp.phcd, zl.fpzljc, zl.fplb_dm, zl.tkfs_dm, zl.tdhy_dm, zl.wzb_dm, zl.lc_dm, zl.jeb_dm, fp.jldw_dm, zl.fwskbz, zl.skbz, zl.gdsbz, zl.zppz_dm, zl.zkdklx_dm, zl.swjg_dm, zl.zgkpxedmbz, zl.defpbz, fp.mbfs, b.fpme, fp.gg, fp.ZZ_DM, fp.PJZDFS_DM from dm_fp_fpzl zl, dm_fp_fp fp, dm_gy_jeb b, dm_fp_gg c where zl.fpzl_dm = fp.fpzl_dm and zl.jeb_dm = b.jeb_dm(+) and fp.gg_dm = c.gg_dm(+) and zl.gdsbz in (#macroparam#) and fp.fpsx_Dm = ? and zl.fpzlbb_dm = ? and zl.yxbz = 'Y' and zl.xybz = 'Y' order by zl.fpzl_dm, fp.fp_dm

select kc.kfkcuuid, kc.fpzl_dm, kc.fp_dm, kc.bs, kc.fpqshm, kc.fpzzhm, kc.fpkf_dm, kc.fpzt_dm, zl.jeb_dm, zl.tkfs_dm, zl.fplb_dm, zl.tdhy_dm, zl.skbz, zl.fpzlmc, fp.fpjj, fp.phcd, fp.fpme, fp.yspc, fp.jldw_dm, fp.fpdmmc, fp.fpzg, fp.fpxj, fp.mbfs from fp_swjgkfkc kc left join dm_fp_fpzl zl on kc.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm left join dm_fp_fp fp on kc.fp_dm = fp.fp_dm where kc.fpkf_dm = ? and kc.fpzl_dm in (#macroparam#) and kc.fpzt_dm = ? and fp.yxbz = ?

select pcbg.pcbguuid, fpkf.fpkfgtmc, fpkf.kflx_dm, pcbg.lcslid, pcbg.pcr_dm, pcbg.fpkfgt_dm, pcbg.pcrq, pcbg.bgr_dm, pcbg.bgrq_1, pcbg.zstybz, pcbg.sjgsdq, pcbg.swjg_dm, pcbg.zfbz_1, pcbg.zfr_dm, pcbg.zfrq_1, pcbg.lrrq, pcbg.lrr_dm, pcbg.xgr_dm, pcbg.xgrq, pcbg.pcspbz, pcbg.pcjcr_dm, pcbg.pcjcrq, pcbg.pcjcrmc from fp_pcbg pcbg, fp_fpkf fpkf where pcbg.fpkfgt_dm = fpkf.fpkf_dm #macroparam#

with jcuuid as( select t.fpjcuuid from (SELECT mx.fpjcuuid, jc.jcrq, mx.fpkf_dm, row_number() over(partition by mx.fpkf_dm order by jc.jcrq desc) rn FROM FP_JC_MX mx, fp_jc jc where mx.fpjcuuid = jc.fpjcuuid and jc.zfbz_1 = 'N' and jc.jcrq >= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and jc.jcrq <= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and mx.fpkf_dm in(#macroparam#) ) t where t.rn = 1 ) select t.fpzl_dm, zl.fpzlmc, t.fp_dm, zl.jldw_dm as dwsl_dm, sum(t.sqjcsl) sqjcsl, sum(t.sqjcje) sqjcje, sum(t.bqsdsl) bqsdsl, sum(t.bqsdje) bqsdje, sum(t.bqfssl) bqfssl, sum(t.bqfsje) bqfsje, sum(t.bqfcsl) bqfcsl, sum(t.bqfcje) bqfcje, sum(t.bqhxsl) bqhxsl, sum(t.bqhxje) bqhxje, sum(t.bqtpsl) bqtpsl, sum(t.bqtpje) bqtpje, sum(t.bqgssl) bqgssl, sum(t.bqgsje) bqgsje, sum(t.bqdksl) bqdksl, sum(t.bqdkje) bqdkje, sum(t.bqjcsl) bqjcsl, sum(t.bqjcje) bqjcje, Case When sum(t.sqjcsl) + sum(t.bqsdsl) - sum(t.bqfssl) - sum(t.bqfcsl) - sum(t.bqhxsl) + sum(t.bqtpsl) - sum(t.bqdksl) - sum(t.bqgssl) - sum(t.bqjcsl) = 0 Then 'Y' Else 'N' End As sfph from fp_sfcqkbg z, fp_sfcqkbg_mx t, dm_fp_fpzl zl where z.sfcuuid = t.sfcuuid and t.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm and z.fpjcuuid in (select fpjcuuid from jcuuid) Group by t.fpzl_dm, zl.fpzlmc, t.fp_dm, zl.jldw_dm

select jdxz_dm code, jdxzmc caption from dm_gy_jdxz jd where jd.xybz = 'Y' and jd.yxbz = 'Y' and jd.jdxz_dm in (select zb.jdxz_dm from cs_dj_jdxzxzqhdzb zb where zb.xzqhsz_dm = ? and zb.gdslx_dm = ? and zb.yxbz = 'Y' and zb.xybz = 'Y')

select mx.yybdwmczzsptfpmxuuid, mx.yybdwmczzsptfpuuid, mx.fpzl_dm, mx.fpqshm, mx.fp_dm, mx.fpzzhm, mx.fpyzmc, mx.lrr_dm, mx.lrrq, mx.xgr_dm, mx.xgrq, mx.sjgsdq, mx.bfs, mx.sjtb_sj, mx.mbfs, mx.jeb_dm, mx.lc_dm, mx.zz_dm, mx.wzb_dm, mx.pjzdfs_dm, mx.gg, mx.zfbz_1, mx.kfkcuuid from fp_yybdwmczzsptfpba_mx mx,fp_yybdwmczzsptfpba ba where ba.yybdwmczzsptfpuuid = mx.yybdwmczzsptfpuuid and ba.zfbz_1 = 'N' and ba.djxh = ? and mx.fp_dm in (#macroparam#)
select * from fp_yrzzzskspzqd_sqdkhgjks where hgjksuuid = ?

select cy.djxh, cymx.fpzl_dm, cymx.fp_dm, cymx.fs, cymx.fpqshm, cymx.fpzzhm, cymx.lrrq, cymx.kpqsrq, cymx.kpjzrq, cymx.kpje, fp.phcd from fp_yjjcyqk cy, fp_yjjcyqk_mx cymx, dm_fp_fp fp where cy.fpcyuuid = cymx.fpcyuuid and cymx.fpzl_dm = fp.fpzl_dm and cymx.fp_dm = fp.fp_dm and (1=#macroparam# or cy.djxh = ?) and cymx.fpzl_dm = ? and cymx.fp_dm = ? and cymx.fpqshm <= ? and cymx.fpzzhm >= ? and cymx.zfbz_1 = 'N' order by cymx.fpzl_dm, cymx.fp_dm, cymx.fpqshm, cymx.fpzzhm

select uuid, swxzxkuuid, hzrscjydz, bhzrscjydz, bhzrqysdszgswjg_dm, hzrqysdszgswjg_dm, nsrsbh, djxh, nsrmc, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sjgsdq, sjtb_sj, xkyxqq, xkyxqz, bhzrqysdszgswjgmc, czlx_dm from fp_swxzxk_hzjnqysds where swxzxkuuid = ? and xkyxqz >= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and xkyxqq <= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')

select kc.fpkf_dm, kc.fpzl_dm, zl.fpzlmc, kc.fp_dm, kc.fpqshm, kc.fpzzhm, kc.bs, fp.fpzl_dm, fp.fp_dm, fp.fpdmmc, fp.fpxj, fp.fpzg, fp.phcd, zl.skbz, zl.zppz_dm, fp.jldw_dm, kc.fpzt_dm, fp.mbfs from fp_swjgkfkc kc, dm_fp_fpzl zl, dm_fp_fp fp where kc.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm and kc.fpzl_dm = fp.fpzl_dm and zl.fpzl_dm = fp.fpzl_dm and kc.fp_dm = fp.fp_dm and kc.fpkf_dm = ? and kc.fpzt_dm = '20' order by kc.fpzl_dm,kc.fp_dm,kc.fpqshm,kc.fpzzhm
select count(1) from fp_dk_fpkjxx kj where kj.fpzl_dm = ? and kj.fp_dm = ? and to_number(kj.fphm) >= ? and to_number(kj.fphm) <= ?

select a.dbckuuid, a.dbckmxuuid, a.fpzl_dm, b.fpzlmc, a.fp_dm, c.fpdmmc, a.xqshm, a.xzzhm, a.xs, a.mxbfs, a.bs, a.mbfs, a.fs, a.fpqshm, a.fpzzhm, a.dj, a.xsje, a.sfrk, a.sjgsdq, a.lrr_dm, a.xgr_dm, c.phcd, d.hzfpdbckdbz from fp_dbckd d, fp_dbckd_mx a, dm_fp_fpzl b, dm_fp_fp c where d.dbckuuid = a.dbckuuid and a.fpzl_dm = b.fpzl_dm and a.fp_dm = c.fp_dm and d.kfdbuuid = ? order by d.lrrq asc
SELECT DCB.RWBH FROM FP_SSSXDCNSRPFB PFB, FP_SSSXDCB DCB WHERE PFB.LSRWBH = DCB.LSRWBH #macroparam#

SELECT B.FWYPGG, B.XGR_DM, B.FWHXMXUUID, B.DWSL_DM, B.SQHXSL, B.LRRQ, B.LRR_DM, B.XGRQ, B.FWHXUUID, B.SYSL_2, B.FWYP_DM, B.SJGSDQ, C.NSRFWYPUUID, C.DJXH, C.FWYP_DM AS jcfwypDm, C.SL FROM FP_FWYPHXSQ A, FP_FWYPHXSQ_MX B, FP_NSRFWYPJC C WHERE A.FWHXUUID = B.FWHXUUID AND A.DJXH = C.DJXH AND B.FWYP_DM = C.FWYP_DM AND A.DJXH = ? AND A.LCSLID = ?

select tp.slrq, tp.sqrxm, tp.slr_dm, swry.swryxm, mx.fpzl_dm, mx.fp_dm, -mx.fpsl fpsl, -mx.fpsl * fp.mbfs lgsl, mx.fpqshm, mx.fpzzhm, zl.jldw_dm, fp.fpzg, fp.fpdmmc, fp.yspc from fp_tp_mx mx, fp_tp tp, dm_fp_fpzl zl, dm_fp_fp fp, dm_gy_swry swry where tp.fptpuuid = mx.fptpuuid and mx.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm and mx.fp_dm = fp.fp_dm and swry.swry_dm = tp.slr_dm and mx.fptpuuid = ? order by tp.lrrq
delete fp_tssjcj_mx cjmx where 1=1 #macroparam#
SELECT DJXH, SJGSDQ, XGRQ, FWYP_DM, SWJG_DM, XGR_DM, SL, LRR_DM, LRRQ, NSRFWYPUUID FROM FP_NSRFWYPJC T WHERE T.DJXH = ?

SELECT SYSL, SSKCS, CSB.LJBZQ, CSB.LJBZZ, CSB.ZSXM_DM, CSB.ZSPM_DM, CSB.SFKCMSSR, CSB.ZSZM_DM, CSB.SLWHMS, CSB.UUID FROM CS_SB_SSKCS CSB WHERE CSB.YXBZ = 'Y' AND CSB.XYBZ = 'Y' AND SYSDATE BETWEEN CSB.YXQQ AND CSB.YXQZ
delete fp_dcxcqdb_mx qdbmx where 1 = 1 #macroparam#

select * from (select distinct a.fpjcuuid, a.ssswjg_dm, a.jbr_dm, a.jcrq, a.zfr_dm, a.zfrq_1, a.zfbz_1, a.sjgsdq, a.lrr_dm, a.lrrq from fp_jc a,fp_jc_mx b where (1= #macroparam# or ssswjg_dm = ?) and a.fpjcuuid=b.fpjcuuid and (1=#macroparam# or b.fpkf_dm=?) and zfbz_1 !='Y' order by jcrq desc) where rownum = 1

select fpzl.fpzl_dm, fpzl.fpzlmc,fpzl.jldw_dm from dm_fp_fpzl fpzl where exists (select 1 from fp_kfgly_dbfpzl gly where gly.fpzl_dm = fpzl.fpzl_dm and (1 = #macroparam# or gly.kfgly_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or gly.fpkf_dm = ?)) and fpzl.yxbz='Y' and fpzl.xybz='Y' and (1 = #macroparam# or fpzl.gdsbz in('0', ?)) and (1 = #macroparam# or fpzl.fpzl_dm = ?)
delete from fp_pzhdsqsp_gpr where sqspuuid in (select sqspuuid from fp_pzhdsqsp where lcslid=?)

select mx.fpzl_dm, mx.fp_dm, mx.fpqshm, mx.fpzzhm, mx.kpje, mx.se from fp_yjjcyqk yj, dm_fp_fpzl zl, fp_yjjcyqk_mx mx where yj.fpcyuuid = mx.fpcyuuid and zl.fpzl_dm = mx.fpzl_dm and yj.djxh = ? and mx.kpqsrq >= ? and mx.kpjzrq < (?+1) and (1=#macroparam# or zl.zppz_dm in (#macroparam#)) and mx.fpyjjg_dm = ? and mx.zfbz_1 != 'Y'
select swjg_dm, sjswjg_dm, uuid, lrr_dm, lrrq, sjgsdq, xgr_dm, xgrq, yxbz from fp_dbswjgszdzb where (1=? or swjg_dm = ?) and (1=? or sjswjg_dm = ?) and yxbz='Y'

select mx.cyfpmxuuid, mx.ywuuid, mx.fpzl_dm, mx.fp_dm, mx.fs, mx.fpqshm, mx.fpzzhm, mx.fpkjqk_dm, mx.kpqsrq, mx.kpjzrq, mx.kpje, mx.se, mx.fpyjjg_dm, cy.yjjsjly_dm, mx.lrr_dm, zl.fplb_dm, zl.tdhy_dm from fp_yjjcyqk cy, fp_yjjcyqk_mx mx, dm_fp_fpzl zl where cy.fpcyuuid = mx.fpcyuuid and zl.fpzl_dm = mx.fpzl_dm and cy.djxh = ? and (1=#macroparam# or mx.lrrq >= ?) and (1=#macroparam# or mx.lrrq < (?+1)) and (1=#macroparam# or mx.fpyjjg_dm = ?) and (1=#macroparam# or mx.fpzl_dm = ?) and (1=#macroparam# or mx.fp_dm = ?) and (1=#macroparam# or to_number(mx.fpqshm) <= to_number(?)) and (1=#macroparam# or to_number(mx.fpzzhm) >= to_number(?)) and mx.zfbz_1 = 'N'

select distinct jc.nsrjcuuid, jc.fpzl_dm, jc.djxh, zl.fpzlmc, jc.fp_dm, fp.fpdmmc, fp.jldw_dm, jc.fs, jc.fpqshm, jc.fpzzhm, fp.phcd, jc.fpzt_dm, hd.wtdkbz, fp.mbfs, zl.zppz_dm, zl.defpbz, hd.fpgpfs_dm, zl.zkdklx_dm, zl.fplb_dm, zl.tdhy_dm, zl.skbz, jc.swjg_dm, jc.lrr_dm, jc.sjgsdq, fp.fpme, fp.yspc, fp.fpzg, zl.defpxebz from fp_pzhdxx hd, dm_fp_fpzl zl, dm_fp_fp fp, fp_nsrfpjc jc where hd.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm and hd.fpzl_dm = fp.fpzl_dm and hd.fpzl_dm = jc.fpzl_dm and zl.fpzl_dm = fp.fpzl_dm and zl.fpzl_dm = jc.fpzl_dm and fp.fpzl_dm = jc.fpzl_dm and fp.fp_dm = jc.fp_dm and hd.djxh = jc.djxh and jc.djxh = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or jc.fpzt_dm=?) and hd.yxbz='Y' and hd.yxqq <= to_date(to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd') and hd.yxqz >= to_date(to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd')

SELECT T.SWXZXKUUID, T.SWXZXKXM_DM, to_char(t.xkyxqq,'YYYY-MM-DD') XKYXQQ, to_char(t.xkyxqz,'YYYY-MM-DD') XKYXQZ FROM FP_SWXZXK T WHERE T.SWXZXKZT_DM = '1' and t.swxzxkxm_dm not in ('02','05','03') AND T.DJXH = ? and T.xkyxqz >= SYSDATE
select distinct last_day(trunc(mx.kpqsrq)) ssqz from fp_yjjcyqk_mx mx where mx.fpcyuuid = ? and trim(mx.fpyjjg_dm) = ?
select sx.dcsx_dm, sx.dcsx_dm code, sx.dcsx_dm, sx.dcsxmc caption, sx.sjdcsx_dm, sx.sjdcsx_dm pcode from dm_zh_dcsx sx where sx.yxbz = 'Y' #macroparam#
select yj.fpzl_dm, yj.fpyjbs from fp_kfyjxx yj where yj.fpkf_dm = ?

select y.djxh, m.fpzl_dm, m.fp_dm, m.fpqshm, m.fpzzhm, m.kpqsrq, m.kpjzrq, m.kpje from fp_yjjcyqk_mx m, fp_yjjcyqk y where m.fpcyuuid = y.fpcyuuid and y.djxh = ? and m.fpzl_dm = ? and m.fp_dm = ? and to_number(m.fpqshm) <= to_number(?) and to_number(m.fpzzhm) >= to_number(?) and m.zfbz_1 != 'Y'
select a.fpzl_dm from dm_fp_fpzl a where a.fpzl_dm like ?

select a.yzjhuuid, a.swjg_dm, a.sssqq, a.sssqz, a.fpjhfl_dm, a.fpzl_dm, b.fpzlmc, b.jldw_dm, a.hzfpsl, a.djxh, a.syfpsl, a.spswjg_dm, a.jhbzuuid, a.fpyzmc, d.nsrmc as ysdw1, b.lc_dm, b.jeb_dm, b.wzb_dm, a.swjg_dm as sbdw_dm, e.gmfplqfs_dm from fp_yzjh a, dm_fp_fpzl b, dj_nsrxx d, fp_yzybdwmcfpbaxx e, FP_TMP_YZFP f where a.fpzl_dm = b.fpzl_dm(+) and a.djxh = d.djxh(+) and a.swjg_dm = f.swjg_dm and a.jhbzuuid = e.yzybdwmcfpbauuid(+) and a.syfpsl > 0 and a.yxbz = 'Y' and (1 = ? or a.fpjhfl_dm in (#macroparam#)) and (1 = ? or b.fpzlmc like '%' || ? || '%') and (1 = ? or d.nsrsbh like '%' || ? || '%' or d.shxydm like '%' || ? || '%') and (1 = ? or b.fpzl_dm like '%' || ? || '%') and (1 = ? or a.jzdw = ?)

select XZXKUUID, DJXH, SQRLX_DM, SQDBH, DLRMC, DLRSFZJHM_1, WTDLRZZ, DLRLXDH, DLRSFZJZL_DM_1, LRR_DM, LRRQ, XGR_DM, XGRQ, SJGSDQ, LXDH, DZ, YZBM, LCSLID, BJJZRQ, SWXZXKXM_DM, SLSWJG_DM, SLR_DM, SLRQ, BLZT_DM, QRJDRQ from fp_swxzxk_sqxx t where t.djxh = ? and t.blzt_dm <> '3'

select kc.kfkcuuid, kc.fpkf_dm, kc.fpzl_dm, kc.fp_dm, kc.xqshm, kc.xzzhm, kc.xs, kc.bs, kc.fpqshm, kc.fpzzhm, kc.fpzt_dm, kc.swjg_dm from fp_swjgkfkc kc where kc.fpzl_dm = ? and kc.fp_dm = ? and (1 = ? or kc.fpzt_dm = ? ) and to_number(kc.fpqshm) #macroparam# and to_number(kc.fpzzhm) #macroparam# order by to_number(kc.fpqshm) asc

select n.nsrsbh, n.djxh, n.nsrmc, m.fpzl_dm, m.fp_dm, m.fpqshm, m.fpzzhm from fp_yjjcyqk_mx m, fp_yjjcyqk y, dj_nsrxx n where m.fpcyuuid = y.fpcyuuid and y.djxh = n.djxh and m.fpzl_dm = ? and m.fp_dm = ? and ? between m.fpqshm and m.fpzzhm and m.zfbz_1 != 'Y'

select yqzzskspzdkzgjgshuuid, djxh, zzszyfpzgswjghdzlqk, hgjkzzszyjkszgswjghdzlqk, glnhhwysytyfpzgswjghdzlqk, yxdkdyqzzszyfpfs, yxdkdyqzzszyfpse, yxdkdyqglnhhwysytyfpfs, yxdkdyqglnhhwysytyfpse, yxdkdyqhgjkzzszyjksfs, yxdkdyqhgjkzzszyjksse, shyj, shyjsm, shr_dm, jbr, jbrq, shrq, fzr, zgswjg_dm, shswjg_dm from fp_yqzzskspzdk_zgswjgshb t where t.lcslid = ? and t.hdslid = ?

select b.kpxeuuid, b.swxzxkuuid, b.swxzxkxm_dm, b.fpzl_dm, b.fpzgkpxe_dm, b.lrr_dm, b.lrrq, b.sjgsdq, b.sjtb_sj, a.swxzxkuuid, a.djxh, a.swxzxkxm_dm, a.xkyxqq, a.xkyxqz, a.swjg_dm, a.swxzxkzt_dm, a.lrr_dm, a.sjgsdq from fp_swxzxk a, fp_swxzxk_zgxe b where a.swxzxkuuid = b.swxzxkuuid and a.swxzxkxm_dm = ? and a.swxzxkzt_dm = ? and a.djxh = ?
select t.fpzl_dm, t.fp_dm, sum(t.fs) fs from fp_nsrfpjc t where djxh = ? and t.fpzl_dm in (#macroparam#) and t.fpzt_dm = ? group by t.fpzl_dm, t.fp_dm
SELECT BDSWXZXKUUID, LCSLID, DJXH, BDSWXZXKLX_DM, SLR_DM, SLSWJG_DM, SLRQ, ZSTYBZ, ZSR_DM, ZSRQ_3, LRR_DM, LRRQ, XGR_DM, XGRQ, SJGSDQ FROM FP_SWXZXK_BDQK_SQSP WHERE LCSLID = ?

select pcsycl.pccluuid, pcsycl.lcslid, pcsycl.clrq, pcsycl.clr_dm, pcsycl.zfly, pcsycl.clswjg_dm, pcsycl.sjgsdq, pcsycl.lrr_dm, pcsycl.lrrq, pcsycl.xgr_dm, pcsycl.xgrq, pcsycl.zfrq_1, pcsycl.zfbz_1, pcsycl.cljy_dm, pcsycl.sjtb_sj from fp_pcsyclqk pcsycl where 1=1 #macroparam#

select fplszuuid, ywuuid, fphd_dm, fpzl_dm, fp_dm, fpqshm, fpzzhm, fpkf_dm, djxh, swjg_dm, lrrq, lrr_dm, xgrq, xgr_dm, sjgsdq, bz, bs from fp_fplsz where fphd_dm = ? and TRUNC(lrrq) >= ? and TRUNC(lrrq) <= ?

delete from fp_yrzzzskspzqd_sqdkhgjks where hgjksuuid in (select hgjksuuid from fp_yrzzzskspzqd_hgjks where waqsbdkzzskspzdksqduuid = (select waqsbdkzzskspzdksqduuid from fp_waqsbdkzzskspzdksqd where lcslid = ?))
select lcslid, clr_dm, pccluuid, clrq, clswjg_dm, zfly, sjgsdq, lrrq, lrr_dm, zfbz_1, xgrq, xgr_dm, zfrq_1, cljy_dm from fp_pcsyclqk where lcslid=? and cljy_dm ='4'
DELETE FROM fp_yqzzskspzdksqd_zzszyfp WHERE yqkspzdksqduuid in (select yqkspzdksqduuid FROM fp_yqzzskspzdksqd where lcslid in ?)

select t.fphd_dm, t.gnbh, t.swjg_dm, t.dywszglx_dm, t.swjgjg, t.zg, t.bz, t.yxbz, t.sjgsdq, t.sjswjg_dm from fp_tzsjgzgpz t where (1 = ? or t.swjg_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or t.fphd_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or t.gnbh = ?) and (1 = ? or t.dywszglx_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or t.sjswjg_dm = ?)

select distinct b.djxh, b.nsrmc from fp_swxzxk a, fp_swxzxk_cyfpxx b where a.swxzxkuuid = b.swxzxkuuid and a.swxzxkzt_dm = '1' and (1 = ? or a.djxh = ?) and (1 = ? or a.xkyxqq <= ?) and (1 = ? or a.xkyxqz >= ?)

select * from fp_yybdwmczzsptfpba a where (1= ? or a.yybdwmczzsptfpuuid = ?) and (1= ? or a.djxh = ?) and (1= ? or a.lrrq between to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')+1) and a.zfbz_1 = 'N' and (1= ? or a.dybz = ?)

SELECT YBSFE, DKSQJE, HY_DM, XZQHSZ_DM, ZGSWSKFJ_DM, JDXZ_DM, SQDHM, XGRQ, XGR_DM, LRRQ, LRR_DM, SJGSDQ, PZXH, KJBZ, ZRRBZ, ZFR_DM, ZFRQ_1, ZFBZ_1, SLSWJG_DM, SLRQ, SLR_DM, SQRQ, SQRXM, KPJE, LCSLID, DKFPLB_DM, DJXH, DKSQUUID, JMSBZ, JMSLX_DM, JMYY, KPLX_DM, ZSBZ, FPLX_DM, FYBH FROM FP_DK_SQ WHERE SBUUID = ? AND ZFBZ_1 = ?

SELECT A.DJXH, A.NSRFWYPUUID, A.FWYP_DM, sum(A.SL) SL, A.FWYP_DM CODE, B.FPFWYPMC CAPTION, B.JLDW_DM DWSLDM, B.GG_DM FWYPGG, sum(A.SL) SQHXSL FROM FP_NSRFWYPJC A, DM_FP_FPFWYP B WHERE A.FWYP_DM = B.FPFWYP_DM AND A.DJXH = ? group by A.DJXH,a.fwyp_dm,A.NSRFWYPUUID,B.FPFWYPMC,B.JLDW_DM,B.GG_DM order by a.fwyp_dm

select qckc.swjgqckccjuuid, qckc.fpkf_dm, qckc.fpzl_dm, qckc.kfgly_dm, qckc.fp_dm, qckc.fs, qckc.fpqshm, qckc.fpzt_dm, qckc.fpzzhm, qckc.zfbz_1, qckc.zfr_dm, qckc.zfrq, qckc.sjgsdq, qckc.lrr_dm, qckc.xgr_dm, qckc.lrrq, qckc.xgrq, fpdm.fpdmmc from fp_swjgqckccj qckc, dm_fp_fp fpdm where qckc.fpzl_dm = fpdm.fpzl_dm and qckc.fp_dm = fpdm.fp_dm #macroparam#
select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg t where t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.xybz = 'Y' and t.bsfwtbz = 'Y' and t.sjswjg_dm=?

select t.fphd_dm, t.gnbh, t.swjg_dm, t.dywszglx_dm, t.swjgjg, t.zg, t.bz, t.yxbz, t.sjgsdq, t.sjswjg_dm from fp_tzsjgzgpz t where (1 = ? or t.swjg_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or t.fphd_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or t.gnbh = ?) and (1 = ? or t.dywszglx_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or t.sjswjg_dm = ?)

select a.fpzl_dm, b.fpzlmc, a.fp_dm, c.fpdmmc, b.gg_dm, b.jeb_dm, b.wzb_dm, b.lc_dm, c.nd, c.yspc, a.fs, c.zz_dm, c.fpjj dj, a.je, a.fpqshm, a.fpzzhm, a.syfpsl, a.sl, c.mbfs, a.yzjhuuid, e.jhbzuuid, case c.gg_dm when '29900' then nvl(c.gg,d.ggmc) else nvl(c.gg,d.ggmc) end gg from fp_yzjhfp_mx a, dm_fp_fpzl b, dm_fp_fp c,dm_fp_gg d,fp_yzjh e where a.fpzl_dm = b.fpzl_dm and a.yzjhuuid=e.yzjhuuid and a.fp_dm = c.fp_dm and c.gg_dm=d.gg_dm(+) and (1 = ? or a.yzfpuuid = ?) and (1 = ? or a.zfbz_1 = ?)

select kf.fpkf_dm, kf.fpkfgtmc, kf.kflx_dm, kf.ssswjg_dm, kf.yxbz kfsfyx, bd.swry_dm, bd.czrybdkfuuid, bd.lrrq from fp_fpkf kf, fp_czrykfbd bd where kf.fpkf_dm = bd.fpkf_dm and (1 = #macroparam# or kf.ssswjg_dm in (select jg.swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg jg start with jg.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior jg.swjg_dm = jg.sjswjg_dm)) and (1 = #macroparam# or kf.fpkf_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or bd.swry_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or kf.kflx_dm = ?) and bd.yxbz = 'Y'
delete fp_dcscsrdcxx srdc where srdc.lsrwbh = ?

select bdc.bdccgluuid, bdc.djxh, bdc.bdcxmbh, bdc.bdcxmmc, bdc.bdclph, bdc.mjlx_dm, bdc.mj, bdc.dj, bdc.fp_dm, bdc.fphm, bdc.fpkjqk_dm, bdc.kprq, bdc.fkfsfsbh, bdc.fkfmc, bdc.je, bdc.cglcjfpyjuuid, bdc.sjgsdq, bdc.lrr_dm, bdc.lrrq, bdc.xgr_dm, bdc.xgrq, bdc.fpzl_dm from fp_cglcj_bdcfp bdc where bdc.fpzl_dm = ? and bdc.fp_dm = ? and bdc.fphm = ? and (bdc.zfbz_1 != 'Y' or bdc.zfbz_1 is null)

select lgb.fplgbuuid, lgb.djxh, lgb.swzjzl_dm, lgb.swzjhm, lgb.swzjglzt_dm, lgb.ffrq, lgb.yxqq, lgb.yxqz, lgb.lrrq, lgb.lrr_dm, lgb.xgrq, lgb.xgr_dm, lgb.sjgsdq, lgb.fplgbhm from fp_lgb lgb where lgb.djxh = ?

select a.fpkf_dm, a.fpkfgtmc, a.ssswjg_dm, b.swjgmc ssswjgmc, a.kflx_dm, a.yxbz, a.sfgmfpzdfsgt from fp_fpkf a, dm_gy_swjg b where a.ssswjg_dm = b.swjg_dm and (1 = ? or a.fpkf_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or a.kflx_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or a.sfgmfpzdfsgt = ?) and (1 = ? or a.yxbz = ?) #macroparam# order by a.yxbz desc, a.kflx_dm, a.fpkfgtmc
select jg.swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg jg where jg.swjg_dm = ? or (jg.sjswjg_dm = ? and jg.bsfwtbz = 'N' and jg.swjgbz = '1')
SELECT t.* FROM fp_yjfpdjsq t WHERE t.djrdjxh=?

select b.fpzl_dm, b.fp_dm, b.fpzl_dm, b.fpqshm, b.fpzzhm, '23' fphd_dm, '税务机关核销' fphdmc, kf.fpkf_dm, kf.fpkfgtmc,fpzlmc from Fp_Swjgfphx_Jgb a, fp_swjgfphx_mx_jgb b, fp_fpkf kf,dm_fp_fpzl zl where b.fphxuuid = a.fphxuuid and b.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm(+) and a.fpszkfgt_dm = kf.fpkf_dm and a.zstybz = 'Y' and a.fphxuuid = ?
select * from fp_yrzzzskspzqd_zyfpdkxx where yrzzzskspzqduuid = ?

select kc.kfkcuuid, kc.fpzl_dm, zl.fpzlmc, kc.fp_dm, fp.fpdmmc, kc.fpkf_dm, kc.xs, kc.bs, (to_number(kc.fpzzhm) - to_number(kc.fpqshm) + 1) kcfs, kc.fpqshm, kc.fpzzhm, kc.xqshm, kc.xzzhm, kc.fpzt_dm, kc.swjg_dm, kc.sjgsdq, kc.lrr_dm, kc.xgr_dm, fp.phcd, fp.fpjj, fp.fpxj, fp.mbfs, fp.mxbfs, zl.jldw_dm, kc.lrrq, kc.xgrq from fp_swjgkfkc kc, dm_fp_fpzl zl, dm_fp_fp fp where kc.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm and kc.fp_dm = fp.fp_dm and (1 = ? or kc.swjg_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or kc.fpkf_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or kc.fpzl_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or kc.fp_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or to_number(kc.fpqshm) <= to_number(?)) and (1 = ? or to_number(kc.fpzzhm) >= to_number(?)) and (1 = ? or kc.fpzt_dm = ?) and kc.YYBDWMCZZSPTFPUUID is null order by kc.fpzl_dm, kc.fp_dm, kc.fpqshm
select djxh, fpglyxm, slswjg_dm, fplgbhm, sjgsdq, wszzrq, sfzjhm, sfzjlx_dm from fp_lgbff where djxh=? and fplgbhm=?
select null pcode, t.xzqhsz_dm code, t.xzqhmc caption from dm_gy_xzqh t where t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.xybz = 'Y' #macroparam# order by t.xzqhsz_dm

select zl.fpzl_dm, zl.fpzlmc, zl.tkfs_dm, zl.tdhy_dm, zl.wzb_dm, zl.lc_dm, zl.jeb_dm, zl.fwskbz, zl.skbz, zl.fplb_dm, zl.zppz_dm, zl.defpbz, fp.fp_dm, fp.mbfs, fp.jldw_dm, fp.fpme, fp.fpdmmc, fp.phcd, fp.fpzg from dm_fp_fpzl zl,dm_fp_fp fp where zl.fpzl_dm = fp.fpzl_dm and zl.gdsbz in (#macroparam#) and (zl.swjg_dm in (select jg.swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg jg connect by prior jg.sjswjg_dm = jg.swjg_dm start with jg.swjg_dm = ?) or zl.swjg_dm in (select jg.swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg jg connect by prior jg.swjg_dm = jg.sjswjg_dm start with jg.swjg_dm = ?)) order by zl.fpzl_dm

select gptp.djxh, gptp.fpzl_dm, zl.fpzlmc, gptp.hzzggpsl, gptp.gptplx_dm, gptp.zgqxq, gptp.zgqxz, zl.defpbz, zl.zppz_dm from fp_gptpxx gptp, dm_fp_fpzl zl where gptp.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm and gptp.djxh = ? and gptp.zgqxq <= ? and gptp.zgqxz >= ? and gptp.gptplx_dm = ? order by gptp.fpzl_dm

select ws.wslpuuid, ws.ywslxh, ws.djxh, ws.nsrsbh, ws.gprxm, ws.sfzjzl_dm, ws.sfzjhm, ws.wslpywzt_dm, ws.wslpqrfs_dm, ws.shbtgyy, ws.zgswskfj_dm, ws.slcs, ws.lxdh, ws.yjyjsdsj, ws.sycxltpje, ws.sytgtpje, ws.dz, ws.bz, ws.version, mx.wslpmxuuid, mx.fpzl_dm, mx.fp_dm, mx.fpqshm, mx.bs, mx.fpzzhm, mx.zgswskfj_dm, mx.zfbz_1, mx.wslpsjmxzt_dm, mx.sycxlgptpsl, mx.sytggptpsl, mx.sjgsdq, zl.fpzlmc, zl.defpbz, zl.fplb_dm, zl.tdhy_dm, zl.zppz_dm, zl.skbz from fp_wslp ws, fp_wslp_mx mx, dm_fp_fpzl zl where ws.wslpuuid = mx.wslpuuid and mx.fpzl_dm=zl.fpzl_dm and (1 = #macroparam# or ws.wslpuuid = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or ws.wslpywzt_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or mx.wslpsjmxzt_dm = ?) and mx.zfbz_1 <> 'Y'

select hzjnqysdssqspuuid, hzrscjydz, bhzrscjydz, bhzrqysdszgswjg_dm, hzrqysdszgswjg_dm, nsrsbh, djxh, lcslid, scjgscyj_dm, scjgscyjsm, xkyxqq, xkyxqz, scr_dm, scswjg_dm, scrq, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgrq, xgr_dm, sjgsdq, sjtb_sj, nsrmc, bhzrqysdszgswjgmc, hzjnqysdsmxuuid, swxzxkuuid, czlx_dm
from fp_swxzxk_hzjnqysds_sqsp where lcslid=?
select dkfpjmslx_dm code, dkfpjmslxmc caption from dm_fp_dkfpjmslx where 1 = 1 #macroparam#

select cgl.djxh, cgl.kprq, cgl.jehj from (select c.djxh, c.fpzl_dm, c.fp_dm, c.fphm, c.kprq, c.jehj jehj from fp_cglcj_ty c, dm_fp_fpzl z where c.fpzl_dm = z.fpzl_dm and c.fpzl_dm = ? and c.fp_dm = ? and c.fphm = ? and (c.zfbz_1 != 'Y' or c.zfbz_1 is null) union select c.djxh, c.fpzl_dm, c.fp_dm, c.fphm, c.kprq, c.je jehj from fp_cglcj_bdcfp c, dm_fp_fpzl z where c.fpzl_dm = z.fpzl_dm and c.fpzl_dm = ? and c.fp_dm = ? and c.fphm = ? and (c.zfbz_1 != 'Y' or c.zfbz_1 is null) union select c.djxh, c.fpzl_dm, c.fp_dm, c.fphm, c.kprq, c.cjhj jehj from fp_cglcj_escfp c, dm_fp_fpzl z where c.fpzl_dm = z.fpzl_dm and c.fpzl_dm = ? and c.fp_dm = ? and c.fphm = ? and (c.zfbz_1 != 'Y' or c.zfbz_1 is null) union select c.djxh, c.fpzl_dm, c.fp_dm, c.fphm, c.kprq, c.jshj jehj from fp_cglcj_jdcfp c, dm_fp_fpzl z where c.fpzl_dm = z.fpzl_dm and c.fpzl_dm = ? and c.fp_dm = ? and c.fphm = ? and (c.zfbz_1 != 'Y' or c.zfbz_1 is null) union select c.djxh, c.fpzl_dm, c.fp_dm, c.fphm, c.kprq, c.je jehj from fp_cglcj_jzyfp c, dm_fp_fpzl z where c.fpzl_dm = z.fpzl_dm and c.fpzl_dm = ? and c.fp_dm = ? and c.fphm = ? and (c.zfbz_1 != 'Y' or c.zfbz_1 is null) union select c.stfdjxh djxh, c.fpzl_dm, c.fp_dm, c.fphm, c.kprq, c.je jehj from fp_wtdkfpxxcjb c, dm_fp_fpzl z where c.fpzl_dm = z.fpzl_dm and c.fpzl_dm = ? and c.fp_dm = ? and c.fphm = ? and (c.zfbz_1 != 'Y' or c.zfbz_1 is null)) cgl where cgl.fpzl_dm = ? and cgl.fp_dm = ? and cgl.fphm = ?

select a.fpzl_dm, a.fp_dm, a.fpqshm, a.fpzzhm, '13' fphd_dm, '调拨入库' fphdmc, kf.fpkf_dm, kf.fpkfgtmc, zl.fpzlmc from fp_dbrkd_mx a, fp_dbrkd b, fp_fpkf kf, dm_fp_fpzl zl where b.dbrkuuid = a.dbrkuuid and a.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm(+) and b.fprkkf_dm = kf.fpkf_dm and b.kfdbuuid = ?

select distinct mx.fpzl_dm, mx.fpzl_dm, mx.fp_dm, mx.fpsl, mx.fpqshm, mx.fpzzhm, mx.lrr_dm, mx.lrrq from fp_tp t, fp_tp_mx mx where t.fptpuuid = mx.fptpuuid and t.djxh = ? and mx.lrrq >= ? and mx.lrrq < (? +1)
select t.bdswxzxkuuid, t.lcslid, t.djxh, t.bdswxzxklx_dm, t.zstybz from fp_swxzxk_bdqk_sqsp t, fp_swxzxk_bdqk_xmmx x where t.bdswxzxkuuid = x.bdswxzxkuuid and x.bdswxzxkxmmxuuid = ?

select m.fpzl_dm,m.fppzhdczlx_dm,m.dffpzgkpxe_dm,m.myzggpsl,m.mczggpsl,m.cpzgsl, m.dffpzgkpxe,m.wtdkbz,m.zsbz from fp_pzhdsqsp_mx m where m.sqspuuid in (select p.sqspuuid from fp_pzhdsqsp p where p.lcslid = ?)
select jx.fpzl_dm, jx.fp_dm from FP_HBJXQXSZ jx where jx.fpzl_dm in (#macroparam#) and jx.jxrqq <= ?

select zcqmx.mxuuid, zcqmx.uuid, zcqmx.bz_1, zcqmx.tzbdhzfgfzb, zcqmx.zftzbdnd, zcqmx.zftzbdlx, zcqmx.jwsdsbnd, zcqmx.dndjwsdsbe, zcqmx.jwsdsbebz, zcqmx.dndjwsdyjnsdsk, zcqmx.dndjwsddmse, zcqmx.lrrq, zcqmx.lrr_dm, zcqmx.xgrq, zcqmx.xgr_dm, zcqmx.sjgsdq, zcq.djxh, zcq.nsrsbh from fp_tssjcj_zcqqyxxcjb_mx zcqmx, fp_tssjcj_zcqqyxxcjb zcq, fp_tssjcj cj where zcqmx.uuid=zcq.mxuuid and zcq.uuid = cj.tssjcjuuid #macroparam#

select kc.kfkcuuid, kc.fpzl_dm, zl.fpzlmc, kc.fp_dm, fp.fpdmmc, kc.fpkf_dm, kc.xs, kc.bs, (to_number(kc.fpzzhm) - to_number(kc.fpqshm) + 1) kcfs, kc.fpqshm, kc.fpzzhm, kc.xqshm, kc.xzzhm, kc.fpzt_dm, kc.swjg_dm, kc.sjgsdq, kc.lrr_dm, kc.xgr_dm, fp.phcd, fp.fpjj, fp.fpxj, fp.mbfs, fp.mxbfs, zl.jldw_dm, kc.lrrq, kc.xgrq from fp_swjgkfkc kc, dm_fp_fpzl zl, dm_fp_fp fp where kc.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm and kc.fp_dm = fp.fp_dm and (1 = ? or kc.swjg_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or kc.fpkf_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or kc.fpzl_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or kc.fp_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or to_number(kc.fpqshm) <= to_number(?)) and (1 = ? or to_number(kc.fpzzhm) >= to_number(?)) and (1 = ? or kc.fpzt_dm = ?) order by kc.fpzl_dm, kc.fp_dm, kc.fpqshm

select jhfp.yzfpuuid, jhfp.yzcsdjxh, jhfp.fpr_dm, jhfp.zfbz_1, jhfp.fprq, jhfp.zfr_dm, jhfp.zfrq_1, jhfp.wszg, jhfp.ysdw_dm, jhfp.wszzrq, jhfp.sjgsdq, jhfp.lrr_dm, jhfp.lrrq, jhfp.xgr_dm, jhfp.xgrq, jhfp.fpyzysbz, jhfp.cycsmc, jhfp.xzbz, jhfp.ysdw_1, jhfp.xzrq, jhfp.bz, jhfp.jsswjg_1_dm, jhfp.fpswjg_dm, jhfp.rkswjg_dm, jhfp.jsdwmc_1, jhfp.sfrk, jhfp.sjtb_sj from fp_yzjhfp jhfp inner join fp_yzjhfp_mx jhfpmx on jhfp.yzfpuuid = jhfpmx.yzfpuuid and jhfpmx.zfbz_1 <> 'Y' and jhfp.zfbz_1 <> 'Y' and jhfp.fpyzysbz = 'N' inner join fp_yzjh yzjh on jhfpmx.yzjhuuid = yzjh.yzjhuuid and yzjh.yxbz = 'Y' inner join fp_yzybdwmcfpbaxx fpba on yzjh.jhbzuuid = fpba.yzybdwmcfpbauuid and fpba.zfbz_1 <> 'Y' and fpba.swjg_dm like ?

select kfkcuuid, fpkf_dm, fpzl_dm, fp_dm, xqshm, xzzhm, xs, bs, fpqshm, fpzzhm, fpzt_dm, swjg_dm, sjgsdq, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq from fp_swjgkfkc where fpkf_dm = ? and yybdwmczzsptfpuuid is null and (1=? or fpzt_dm = ?)

select mx.cyfpmxuuid, mx.ywuuid, mx.fpzl_dm, mx.fp_dm, mx.fs, mx.fpqshm, mx.fpzzhm, mx.fpkjqk_dm, mx.kpqsrq, mx.kpjzrq, mx.kpje, mx.se, mx.fpyjjg_dm, cy.yjjsjly_dm, mx.lrr_dm, zl.fplb_dm, zl.tdhy_dm from fp_yjjcyqk cy, fp_yjjcyqk_mx mx, dm_fp_fpzl zl where cy.fpcyuuid = mx.fpcyuuid and zl.fpzl_dm = mx.fpzl_dm and cy.djxh = ? and (1=#macroparam# or mx.kpqsrq >= ?) and (1=#macroparam# or mx.kpjzrq < (?+1)) and (1=#macroparam# or mx.fpyjjg_dm = ?) and (1=#macroparam# or mx.fpzl_dm = ?) and (1=#macroparam# or mx.fp_dm = ?) and (1=#macroparam# or to_number(mx.fpqshm) <= to_number(?)) and (1=#macroparam# or to_number(mx.fpzzhm) >= to_number(?)) and mx.zfbz_1 = 'N'

select ws.ywslxh, ws.wslpuuid, ws.djxh, ws.nsrsbh, ws.gprxm, ws.sfzjzl_dm, ws.sfzjhm, ws.wslpywzt_dm, ws.wslpqrfs_dm, ws.shbtgyy, ws.zgswskfj_dm, ws.slcs, ws.lxdh, ws.yjyjsdsj, ws.sytgtpje, ws.sycxltpje, ws.dz, ws.bz, ws.lrr_dm, ws.lrrq, ws.sjgsdq from fp_wslp ws, fp_wslp_gxswjg jg where ws.zgswskfj_dm = jg.swjg_dm and (1 = #macroparam# or ws.djxh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or ws.wslpuuid = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or ws.wslpywzt_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or ws.lrrq >= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or ws.lrrq < ? +1) order by ws.lrrq

select cg.cglcjfpyjuuid, cg.djxh, cg.fpzl_dm, cg.fp_dm, cg.fpqshm, cg.fpzzhm, cg.fs, cg.kpqsrq, cg.kpzzrq, cg.kpje, cg.se, cg.fpkjqk_dm, cg.swjg_dm, cg.sfyyj, cg.cglsjcjlx_dm, cg.zfbz_1, cg.bz, cg.sjgsdq, cg.fpcglcjuuid, cg.sjtb_sj, zl.fpzlmc, zl.defpbz, zl.zppz_dm, cg.fp_dm, fp.fpdmmc, fp.jldw_dm, fp.mxbfs, fp.phcd, fp.fpme, fp.mbfs, fp.yspc, fp.fpzg from fp_cglcj_fpyj cg, dm_fp_fpzl zl, dm_fp_fp fp where cg.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm and cg.fpzl_dm = fp.fpzl_dm and zl.fpzl_dm = fp.fpzl_dm and cg.fp_dm = fp.fp_dm and cg.djxh = ? and ('1'= #macroparam# or trim(cg.cglsjcjlx_dm)=?) and to_date(to_char(cg.lrrq, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') >= ? and to_date(to_char(cg.lrrq, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') <= ? and cg.zfbz_1 <> 'Y' and cg.sfyyj='N' and (1= #macroparam# or rownum <= ?)

delete from fp_yrzzzskspzqd_hgjksdkxx where hgjksuuid in (select hgjksuuid from fp_yrzzzskspzqd_hgjks where waqsbdkzzskspzdksqduuid = (select waqsbdkzzskspzdksqduuid from fp_waqsbdkzzskspzdksqd where lcslid = ?))

select tp.fptpuuid as uuid, tp.slrq as rq, tp.swjg_dm, swjg.swjgmc, '4' as dylx_dm from fp_tp tp, dm_gy_swjg swjg where tp.swjg_dm = swjg.swjg_dm and tp.djxh = ? and to_date(to_char(tp.lrrq, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') >= ? and to_date(to_char(tp.lrrq, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') <= ? order by tp.lrrq desc

select ck.czrykfkcuuid, ck.czry_dm, ck.fpkf_dm, ck.fpzl_dm, ck.fp_dm, ck.bs, ck.fpqshm, ck.fpzzhm, ck.fpzt_dm, ck.swjg_dm, ck.sjgsdq, ck.lrrq, ck.lrr_dm from fp_czrykfkc ck where ck.fpzl_dm = ? and ck.fp_dm = ? and to_number(ck.fpqshm) <= to_number(?) and to_number(ck.fpzzhm) >= to_number(?) and (1 = #macroparam# or ck.fpzt_dm = ?) order by ck.fpqshm
select zl.fpzl_dm, jeb.fpme from dm_fp_fpzl zl, dm_gy_jeb jeb where zl.jeb_dm = jeb.jeb_dm and zl.fplb_dm in (#macroparam#) and (zl.tdhy_dm = ?)

select distinct zl.fpzlmc, kc.fpzl_dm, fp.jldw_dm, fp.mbfs, kc.fp_dm, fp.fpdmmc, kc.bs, kc.fpqshm, kc.fpzzhm, fp.fpzg, fp.fpxj, kc.fpzt_dm, zl.jeb_dm, zl.tkfs_dm, zl.fplb_dm, zl.tdhy_dm, zl.skbz, fp.fpjj, fp.phcd, fp.fpme, kc.fpkf_dm from fp_swjgkfkc kc, fp_gptpxx tp, dm_fp_fpzl zl, dm_fp_fp fp where kc.fpzl_dm = tp.fpzl_dm and kc.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm and kc.fpzl_dm = fp.fpzl_dm and tp.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm and tp.fpzl_dm = fp.fpzl_dm and zl.fpzl_dm = fp.fpzl_dm and fp.fp_dm = kc.fp_dm and tp.djxh = ? and kc.fpkf_dm = ? and tp.zgqxq <= ? and tp.zgqxz >= ? and tp.gptplx_dm = ? and kc.fpzt_dm = ? and fp.yxbz = 'Y' order by kc.fpzl_dm,kc.fp_dm,kc.fpqshm

with wp as (select /*+materialize*/ a.wlfpuuid, a.djxh, a.fpzl_dm, a.fp_dm, a.fs, a.fpqshm, a.fpzzhm, a.fpkjqk_dm, a.kpqsrq, a.kpjzrq, a.kpje, a.se, a.lrr_dm, a.swjg_dm, a.sjgsdq from fp_wlfp_kjxx a where a.FPKJQK_DM in (#macroparam#) and a.sfyyj='N' and #macroparam# and a.swjg_dm = ?) select wp.* from wp order by wp.djxh,wp.fpzl_dm,wp.fp_dm,wp.fpqshm

select * from (select lgb.fpglyxm, lgb.fplgbhm, lgb.wszzrq, lgb.sfzjhm, lgb.sfzjlx_dm, lgb.fplgbuuid, lgb.lcslid, lgb.djxh, lgb.slswjg_dm, lgb.lrr_dm, lgb.lrrq, lgb.sjgsdq from fp_lgbff lgb where lgb.djxh = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or lgb.lcslid = ?) order by lgb.lrrq desc) t where rownum <= 1

select distinct mx.fpzl_dm, mx.fpzl_dm, mx.fp_dm, mx.fpsl, mx.fpqshm, mx.fpzzhm, mx.lrr_dm, mx.lrrq, mx.sytggptpsl, mx.sycxlgptpsl from fp_ly ly, fp_ly_mx mx where ly.fplyuuid = mx.fplyuuid and ly.djxh = ? and mx.fpzl_dm = ? and mx.lrrq >= ? and mx.lrrq < (? +1)

select distinct mx.tpmxuuid, mx.tpuuid, mx.fpzl_dm, mx.sqzggpsl, mx.hzzggpsl, mx.dyykfpxse, mx.zsbz, mx.lrr_dm, mx.lrrq, mx.xgr_dm, mx.xgrq, mx.sjgsdq, hd.myzggpsl, zl.defpbz from fp_gptp_sqsp zb, fp_gptp_sqsp_mx mx, fp_pzhdxx hd, dm_fp_fpzl zl where zb.tpuuid = mx.tpuuid and zb.djxh = hd.djxh and mx.fpzl_dm = hd.fpzl_dm and mx.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm and hd.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm and hd.yxbz = 'Y' and mx.tpuuid = ? order by mx.fpzl_dm
SELECT p.djxh, p.sqrxm, p.sqrq, p.swjg_dm, p.fpdbbz,p.fpdblx_dm,p.dbje,p.zsbz,p.spyj FROM fp_pzhdsqsp p WHERE p.lcslid = ?

select distinct mx.fpzl_dm, mx.fpzl_dm, mx.fp_dm, mx.fpsl, mx.fpqshm, mx.fpzzhm, mx.lrr_dm, mx.lrrq from fp_tp t, fp_tp_mx mx where t.fptpuuid = mx.fptpuuid and t.djxh = ? and mx.fpzl_dm = ? and mx.lrrq >= ? and mx.lrrq < (? +1)

select zjfs.pcfsuuid, zjfs.pccluuid, zjfs.fp_dm, zjfs.djxh, zjfs.fpzl_dm, zjfs.dwsl_dm, zjfs.zjfssl, zjfs.fpqshm, zjfs.clbz, zjfs.fpzzhm, zjfs.sjgsdq, zjfs.lrrq, zjfs.lrr_dm, zjfs.xgr_dm, zjfs.xgrq, zjfs.sjtb_sj from fp_pcsyclqk_zjfsjl zjfs where 1=1 #macroparam#

select kc.kfkcuuid, kc.fpzl_dm, zl.fpzlmc, kc.fp_dm, fp.fpdmmc, kc.fpkf_dm, kc.xs, kc.bs, (to_number(kc.fpzzhm) - to_number(kc.fpqshm) + 1) kcfs, kc.fpqshm, kc.fpzzhm, kc.xqshm, kc.xzzhm, kc.fpzt_dm, kc.swjg_dm, kc.sjgsdq, kc.lrr_dm, kc.xgr_dm, fp.phcd, fp.fpjj, fp.fpxj, fp.mbfs, kc.fpkf_dm from fp_swjgkfkc kc, dm_fp_fpzl zl, dm_fp_fp fp where kc.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm and kc.fp_dm = fp.fp_dm and kc.fpzt_dm='20' and (1 = ? or kc.fpzt_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or zl.tdhy_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or zl.zkdklx_dm in (#macroparam#)) and (1 = ? or exists (select 1 from fp_kfgly ry,fp_fpkf kf where ry.kfgly_dm = ? and ry.yxbz='Y' and kf.yxbz='Y' and kf.fpkf_dm=ry.fpkf_dm and (1 = ? or kf.kflx_dm=?) and kc.fpkf_dm = ry.fpkf_dm)) and (1 = ? or zl.fplb_dm in (#macroparam#)) order by kc.fpzl_dm, kc.fp_dm, kc.fpqshm

select dkfpsz.dkptfpszuuid, dkfpsz.swjg_dm, dkfpsz.dkfplb_dm, dkfpsz.fpzl_dm, dkfpsz.yxbz, dkfpsz.lrr_dm, dkfpsz.lrrq, dkfpsz.xgr_dm, dkfpsz.xgrq, dkfpsz.sjgsdq from fp_dkptfpsz dkfpsz where 1=1 #macroparam# order by dkfpsz.dkfplb_dm,dkfpsz.fpzl_dm

select XZXKUUID, DJXH, SQRLX_DM, SQDBH, DLRMC, DLRSFZJHM_1, WTDLRZZ, DLRLXDH, DLRSFZJZL_DM_1, LRR_DM, LRRQ, XGR_DM, XGRQ, SJGSDQ, LXDH, DZ, YZBM, LCSLID, BJJZRQ, SWXZXKXM_DM, SLSWJG_DM, SLR_DM, SLRQ, BLZT_DM, QRJDRQ, wszg from FP_SWXZXK_SQXX sq where sq.lcslid = ?

select mx.sqspmxuuid, mx.sqspuuid, mx.fpzl_dm, mx.fppzhdczlx_dm, mx.dffpzgkpxe_dm, mx.myzggpsl, mx.mczggpsl, mx.cpzgsl, mx.fpgpfs_dm, mx.dffpzgkpxe, mx.wtdkbz, mx.zsbz, mx.sjgsdq, mx.lrr_dm, zl.fplb_dm, zl.tdhy_dm, zl.fpzlmc, zl.TKFS_DM, zl.SKBZ, zl.DEFPBZ, zl.ZPPZ_DM, zl.JLDW_DM, j.fpme, mx.lxkpsx, mx.lxkpljxe, lb.fplbmc from fp_pzhdsqsp_mx mx, dm_fp_fpzl zl,dm_gy_jeb j,dm_fp_fplb lb where mx.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm and zl.jeb_dm = j.jeb_dm and zl.fplb_dm = lb.fplb_dm and sqspuuid = ?

select jc.nsrjcuuid, jc.fpzl_dm, jc.djxh, jc.fp_dm, jc.fs, jc.fpqshm, jc.fpzzhm, jc.fpzt_dm, fp.phcd, fp.fpdmmc, fp.jldw_dm, fp.mbfs, fp.yspc, fp.fpzg, fp.fpme, jc.lrrq, zl.zppz_dm, zl.defpbz, zl.fpzlmc, zl.fplb_dm, zl.tdhy_dm, zl.zkdklx_dm, zl.defpxebz, zl.skbz from fp_nsrfpjc jc, dm_fp_fpzl zl, dm_fp_fp fp where zl.fpzl_dm = fp.fpzl_dm and zl.fpzl_dm = jc.fpzl_dm and fp.fpzl_dm = jc.fpzl_dm and fp.fp_dm = jc.fp_dm and jc.djxh = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or zl.zppz_dm = ?) and jc.fpzt_dm = ? order by jc.fpzl_dm, jc.fp_dm, jc.fpqshm

select b.fpzl_dm, b.fp_dm, b.fpzl_dm, b.fpqshm, b.fpzzhm, '21' fphd_dm, '税务机关挂失' fphdmc, kf.fpkf_dm, kf.fpkfgtmc, fpzlmc from fp_swjgfpgs_jgb a, fp_swjgfpgs_mx_jgb b, fp_fpkf kf,dm_fp_fpzl zl where b.fpgsuuid = a.fpgsuuid and b.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm(+) and a.gsfpszkfgt_dm = kf.fpkf_dm and a.zstybz = 'Y' and a.fpgsuuid = ?

select kfyj.fpyjuuid, kfyj.ssswjg_dm, kfyj.fpkf_dm, kfyj.fpzl_dm, kfyj.fphlbs, kfyj.fpyjbs, kfyj.lrr_dm, kfyj.lrrq, kfyj.xgr_dm, kfyj.xgrq, kfyj.fpyjbl, kfyj.sjgsdq, kf.fpkfgtmc, fpzl.fpzlmc from fp_kfyjxx kfyj, fp_fpkf kf, dm_fp_fpzl fpzl where kfyj.fpkf_dm=kf.fpkf_dm and kfyj.fpzl_dm=fpzl.fpzl_dm #macroparam#
delete from fp_gptp_sqsp_mx where tpuuid in(select tpuuid from fp_gptp_sqsp where lcslid=?)

select kc.fpkf_dm, kc.fpzl_dm, zl.fpzlmc, kc.fp_dm, kc.fpqshm, kc.fpzzhm, kc.bs, fp.fpzl_dm, fp.fp_dm, fp.fpdmmc, fp.fpxj, fp.fpzg, fp.phcd, zl.skbz, zl.zppz_dm, fp.jldw_dm, kc.fpzt_dm, fp.mbfs from fp_swjgkfkc kc, dm_fp_fpzl zl, dm_fp_fp fp where kc.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm and kc.fpzl_dm = fp.fpzl_dm and zl.fpzl_dm = fp.fpzl_dm and kc.fp_dm = fp.fp_dm and kc.fpkf_dm = ? and zl.fplb_dm = ? and (1 = ? or zl.tdhy_dm = ?) and kc.fpzt_dm = '20' order by kc.fpzl_dm,kc.fp_dm,kc.fpqshm,kc.fpzzhm

select a.rkcymxuuid, a.rkcyuuid, a.fpzl_dm, b.fpzlmc, a.fp_dm, c.fpdmmc, a.xqshm, a.xzzhm, a.xs, a.mxbfs, a.bs, a.mbfs, a.fs, a.fpqshm, a.fpzzhm, a.dj, a.xsje, a.sjgsdq, a.lrr_dm, a.xgr_dm, c.phcd, a.cybdsjbz, a.cybdsjclbz, a.fpdbcyshjg_dm, a.tzyj_dm from fp_rkswcyd_mx a, dm_fp_fpzl b, dm_fp_fp c where a.fpzl_dm = b.fpzl_dm and a.fp_dm = c.fp_dm and (1 = ? or a.rkcyuuid = ? ) and (1 = ? or a.cybdsjbz = ? ) and (1 = ? or a.dsbdbz = ? ) and (1 = ? or a.tzyj_dm = ? ) and (1 = ? or a.cybdsjclbz = ? ) and (1 = ? or a.FPDBCYSHJG_DM in (#macroparam#))
delete fp_dcxcqdb_mx qdbmx where qdbmx.dcxcqduuid = ?

select mx.fpzl_dm, mx.fp_dm, mx.fpqshm, mx.fpzzhm, mx.zfbz_1, mx.fpyjjg_dm from fp_yjjcyqk qk, fp_yjjcyqk_mx mx where qk.fpcyuuid = mx.fpcyuuid and qk.djxh = ? and mx.fpzl_dm = ? and mx.fp_dm = ? and mx.fpqshm = ? and mx.fpzzhm = ?

select zl.fpzl_dm, zl.fpzlmc, zl.tkfs_dm, zl.tdhy_dm, zl.wzb_dm, zl.lc_dm, zl.jeb_dm, zl.fwskbz, zl.skbz, zl.fplb_dm, zl.zppz_dm, zl.defpbz, zl.jldw_dm, 'N' wtdkbz, jeb.fpme, zl.defpxebz from dm_fp_fpzl zl, dm_gy_jeb jeb where zl.jeb_dm = jeb.jeb_dm and zl.gdsbz in (#macroparam#) and (zl.swjg_dm in (select jg.swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg jg connect by prior jg.sjswjg_dm = jg.swjg_dm start with jg.swjg_dm = ?) or zl.swjg_dm in (select jg.swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg jg connect by prior jg.swjg_dm = jg.sjswjg_dm start with jg.swjg_dm = ?)) and zl.yxbz='Y' order by zl.fpzl_dm
select * from fp_yrzzzskspzqd_hyfpdkxx where hyfpuuid = ?
select zl.* from dm_fp_fpzl zl where zl.fplb_dm in (#macroparam#) and zl.yxbz = 'Y' and zl.xybz = 'Y'

select wtdkfpxxcjuuid, wtfswjg_dm, stfdjxh, fpzl_dm, fp_dm, fphm, kprq, fkfsfsbh, fkfdjxh, fkfmc, skfsfsbh, skfdjxh, skfmc, hwlwmc, je, fpkjqk_dm, sjgsdq, fpcglcjuuid, zgswskfj_dm, lrr_dm from fp_wtdkfpxxcjb w where w.fpcglcjuuid = ? and w.zfbz_1 != 'Y'

select qckc.swjgqckccjuuid, qckc.fpkf_dm, qckc.fpzl_dm, qckc.kfgly_dm, qckc.fp_dm, qckc.fs, qckc.fpqshm, qckc.fpzt_dm, qckc.fpzzhm, qckc.zfbz_1, qckc.zfr_dm, qckc.zfrq, qckc.sjgsdq, qckc.lrr_dm, qckc.xgr_dm, qckc.lrrq, qckc.xgrq, fpdm.fpdmmc from fp_swjgqckccj qckc, dm_fp_fp fpdm where qckc.fpzl_dm = fpdm.fpzl_dm and qckc.fp_dm = fpdm.fp_dm and (1 = ? or fpqshm = ?) and (1 = ? or fpzzhm = ?) #macroparam#
DELETE FROM fp_yqzzskspzdksqd_hgjks WHERE yqkspzdksqduuid in (select yqkspzdksqduuid FROM fp_yqzzskspzdksqd where lcslid in ?)

SELECT C.SWJGMC, A.SSSWJG_DM, A.JCRQ, D.FPKFGTMC, B.FPKF_DM, B.DWSL_DM, B.FPJCUUID, B.FPQSHM, B.FPZL_DM, B.FPZZHM, B.FP_DM, B.JBR_DM, B.JCMXUUID, B.JE, B.LRRQ, B.LRR_DM, B.SJGSDQ, B.SL, B.XGRQ, B.XGR_DM FROM FP_JC A, FP_JC_MX B, DM_GY_SWJG C, FP_FPKF D WHERE A.FPJCUUID = B.FPJCUUID AND A.SSSWJG_DM = C.SWJG_DM AND B.FPKF_DM = D.FPKF_DM AND NVL(A.ZFBZ_1, 'N') = ? AND A.JCRQ = (SELECT distinct MAX(JCRQ) FROM FP_JC a, fp_jc_mx b where a.fpjcuuid = b.fpjcuuid and (1=#macroparam# or a.ssswjg_dm = ?) and b.fpkf_dm = ? and a.zfbz_1 = 'N') AND (1=#macroparam# or A.SSSWJG_DM = ?) and b.fpkf_dm = ?
select * from FP_DCXCYCLXXB where lyuuid = ? and bz_1='0'

select a.uuid, a.fpzl_dm, b.fpzlmc, a.fp_dm, c.fpdmmc, a.bfs, a.fpqshm, a.fpzzhm, a.fphxlx_dm, c.mbfs, c.fpjj , c.phcd from fp_swjgfphx_mx_jgb a, dm_fp_fpzl b, dm_fp_fp c where a.fpzl_dm = b.fpzl_dm and a.fp_dm = c.fp_dm and a.fphxuuid = ?

select dbtk.pcdbtkuuid, dbtk.pccluuid, dbtk.sqsx_dm, dbtk.fpzl_dm, dbtk.fp_dm, dbtk.dwsl_dm, dbtk.fpqshm, dbtk.sl, dbtk.fpzzhm, dbtk.clbz, dbtk.sjgsdq, dbtk.lrr_dm, dbtk.lrrq, dbtk.xgr_dm, dbtk.xgrq, dbtk.fpckkf_dm, dbtk.sjtb_sj, dbtk.fprkkf_dm, dbtk.fpsyyylx_dm from fp_pcsyclqk_dbtk dbtk where 1=1 #macroparam#
select zl.fpzl_dm, zl.skbz, zl.fpzlmc, zl.fplb_dm, zl.jeb_dm, zl.TKFS_DM, 99999999 kgpsl, zl.tdhy_dm, 5 dffpzgkpxe_dm, zl.zppz_dm from dm_fp_fpzl zl where zl.fplb_dm = ? order by fpzl_dm
select a.tdhy_dm, a.tdhymc tdhyhc from dm_fp_tdhy a where a.xybz = 'Y' and a.yxbz = 'Y' and (1 = #macroparam# or a.fplb_dm = ?) order by a.tdhy_dm
select sum(jc.fs) fs from fp_nsrfpjc jc, dm_fp_fpzl zl where jc.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm and jc.djxh = ? and zl.skbz = 'Y' and zl.zppz_dm = ? and fpzt_dm = ?

select t.djxh, mx.fpzl_dm, mx.fpzl_dm, mx.fp_dm, mx.fpsl, mx.fpqshm, mx.fpzzhm, t.lrrq, zl.defpbz, zl.zppz_dm, fp.mbfs, fp.fpme from fp_tp t, fp_tp_mx mx, dm_fp_fpzl zl, dm_fp_fp fp where t.fptpuuid = mx.fptpuuid and mx.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm and mx.fpzl_dm = fp.fpzl_dm and zl.fpzl_dm = fp.fpzl_dm and mx.fp_dm = fp.fp_dm and t.djxh = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or to_date(mx.lrrq,'yyyy-mm-dd') >= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or to_date(mx.lrrq,'yyyy-mm-dd') <= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or mx.fpzl_dm in (#macroparam#)) order by mx.fpzl_dm, mx.fp_dm, mx.fpqshm
select jcrq, uuid, swjg_dm from fp_fpjc_rqsz where jcrq = ? and swjg_dm = ?
select dy.djxh, dy.fsyjtphs, dy.jxhs, dy.swjg_dm, dy.hdhs, dy.lrr_dm, dy.lrrq, dy.xgr_dm, dy.xgrq, dy.sjgsdq from fp_lgb_dyhsxx dy where dy.djxh = ?

select * from fp_swjgkfkc a where exists (select 1 from fp_yybdwmczzsptfpba b, fp_yybdwmczzsptfpba_mx c where b.yybdwmczzsptfpuuid = c.yybdwmczzsptfpuuid and a.fpzl_dm = c.fpzl_dm and a.fp_dm = c.fp_dm and a.fpqshm >= c.fpqshm and a.fpzzhm <= c.fpzzhm and b.djxh = ? and (1 = ? or b.yybdwmczzsptfpuuid = ?))

delete from fp_yrzzzskspzqd_zyfpdkxx where yrzzzskspzqduuid in (select yrzzzskspzqduuid from fp_yrzzzskspzqd_zzszyfp where waqsbdkzzskspzdksqduuid=(select waqsbdkzzskspzdksqduuid from fp_waqsbdkzzskspzdksqd where lcslid = ?))

select t.fpkf_dm, t.fpzl_dm, t.fp_dm, t.fpqshm, t.fpzzhm, t.fpkf_dm, '01' fphd_dm, '期初采集' fphdmc, kf.fpkfgtmc, zl.fpzlmc from fp_swjgqckccj t,fp_fpkf kf,dm_fp_fpzl zl where t.swjgqckccjuuid = ? and t.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm(+) and t.fpkf_dm = kf.fpkf_dm

select mx.fpzl_dm, mx.fp_dm, mx.fpqshm, mx.fpzzhm, mx.kpje, mx.se from fp_yjjcyqk yj, dm_fp_fpzl zl, fp_yjjcyqk_mx mx where yj.fpcyuuid = mx.fpcyuuid and zl.fpzl_dm = mx.fpzl_dm and yj.djxh = ? and mx.kpqsrq >= ? and mx.kpjzrq <= ? and zl.fplb_dm = ? and mx.fpyjjg_dm = ? and mx.zfbz_1 != 'Y'
select fplgbuuid, djxh, swzjzl_dm, swzjhm, swzjglzt_dm, ffrq, yxqq, yxqz, lrrq, lrr_dm, sjgsdq from fp_lgb where djxh = ?
select qh.xzqhsz_dm code, qh.xzqhmc caption, qh.sjxzqhsz_dm pcode from dm_gy_xzqh qh where yxbz = 'Y' and xybz = 'Y' start with qh.xzqhsz_dm = ? connect by prior qh.xzqhsz_dm = sjxzqhsz_dm
select zl.fpzl_dm, zl.skbz, zl.fpzlmc, zl.fplb_dm, zl.jeb_dm, zl.TKFS_DM, 99999999 kgpsl, zl.tdhy_dm, 5 dffpzgkpxe_dm, zl.zppz_dm from dm_fp_fpzl zl order by fpzl_dm
select pm.zspm_dm from cs_fp_bkxdzspm pm where pm.yxbz = 'Y' and pm.xybz = 'Y'
select * from fp_yrzzzskspzqd_sqdkxx where yrzzzskspzqduuid = ?
select pm.zspm_dm from CS_FP_FPDKKXZSPM pm where pm.yxbz = 'Y' and pm.xybz = 'Y' AND pm.dkfplb_dm=?
select srdc.* from fp_dcscsrdcxx srdc where nvl(srdc.zfbz_1,'N')='N' and srdc.lsrwbh = ?

select a.jhbzmxuuid, a.jhbzuuid, a.fpjhlx_dm, a.fpzl_dm, a.d1jdjhsl, a.d2jdjhsl, a.d3jdjhsl, a.d4jdjhsl, a.d1jdhzsl, a.d2jdhzsl, a.d3jdhzsl, a.d4jdhzsl, a.sbnhj, a.xbnhj, a.qnjhhj, b.tbswjg_dm, c.swjgmc tbswjgmc, d.fpzlmc, d.jldw_dm, d.lc_dm, d.jeb_dm, d.wzb_dm, b.tbswjg_dm as sbdw_dm, b.sssqq, b.sssqz, b.bz, b.sjjhbzuuid from fp_fpjhbz_zzsmx a, fp_fpjhbz b, dm_gy_swjg c, dm_fp_fpzl d where a.jhbzuuid = b.jhbzuuid and b.tbswjg_dm = c.swjg_dm and a.fpzl_dm=d.fpzl_dm and b.zfbz_1 = 'N' and (1 = ? or b.jhbzuuid = ?) and (1 = ? or b.fpjhfl_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or b.tbswjg_dm in (#macroparam#)) and (1 = ? or b.sssqq = ?) and (1 = ? or b.sssqz = ?) and (1 = ? or a.fpjhlx_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or b.fpjhzt_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or a.fpzl_dm in (#macroparam#)) order by a.lrrq desc

select distinct kj.wlfpuuid, kj.djxh, kj.fpzl_dm, zl.fpzlmc, kj.fp_dm, kj.fs, (kj.fs / fp.mbfs) as bs, fp.mbfs, kj.fpqshm, kj.fpzzhm, kj.kpje, kj.se, kj.fpkjqk_dm, kj.kpqsrq, kj.kpjzrq, kj.swjg_dm, kj.lrr_dm, kj.lrrq, kj.xgr_dm, kj.xgrq, kj.sjgsdq, kj.sfyyj, kj.kpscsj, (case when hd.fpgpfs_dm = 1 or hd.fpgpfs_dm = 3 or hd.fpgpfs_dm = 9 then 10 when hd.fpgpfs_dm = 2 then 20 end) as cyfs_dm, fp.fpdmmc, fp.yspc, fp.fpzg from fp_wlfp_kjxx kj,dm_fp_fpzl zl, fp_pzhdxx hd,dm_fp_fp fp where kj.djxh = hd.djxh and kj.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm and kj.fpzl_dm = hd.fpzl_dm and kj.fpzl_dm = fp.fpzl_dm and kj.fp_dm = fp.fp_dm and zl.fpzl_dm = hd.fpzl_dm and zl.fpzl_dm = fp.fpzl_dm and hd.fpzl_dm = fp.fpzl_dm and kj.djxh = ? and (kj.fpkjqk_dm in (#macroparam#) or #macroparam#) and kj.sfyyj = 'N' and hd.yxbz='Y' and (1=#macroparam# or kj.fpzl_dm = ?) and (1=#macroparam# or kj.fp_dm = ?) and (1=#macroparam# or to_number(kj.fpqshm) <= to_number(?)) and (1=#macroparam# or to_number(kj.fpzzhm) >= to_number(?)) order by kj.fpzl_dm, kj.fp_dm, kj.fpqshm

select a.fpzl_dm, a.fp_dm, a.nd, a.yspc, a.fphy_dm, a.zz_dm, a.phcd, a.fpjj, a.fpxj, a.dkj, a.fpzg, a.xybz, a.yxbz, a.mxbfs, a.fpzlxl, a.pjzdfs_dm, a.fpxzqh_dm, a.gg_dm, a.djbz, a.fpdmmc, a.gdsbz, a.gg, a.jldw_dm, a.mbfs, a.fpme, a.djxh, b.nsrmc, b.nsrsbh from dm_fp_fp a,dj_nsrxx b where a.djxh=b.djxh(+) and a.yxbz = 'Y' and a.xybz = 'Y' and a.gdsbz in ('0', ?) and a.fpzl_dm = ? order by a.fp_dm asc

select distinct zl.fpzlmc, kc.fpzl_dm, fp.jldw_dm, fp.mbfs, kc.fp_dm, fp.fpdmmc, kc.bs, kc.fpqshm, kc.fpzzhm, fp.fpzg, fp.fpxj, kc.fpzt_dm, zl.jeb_dm, zl.tkfs_dm, zl.fplb_dm, zl.tdhy_dm, zl.skbz, fp.fpjj, fp.phcd, fp.fpme, kc.fpkf_dm from fp_swjgkfkc kc, fp_pzhdxx hd, dm_fp_fpzl zl, dm_fp_fp fp where kc.fpzl_dm = hd.fpzl_dm and kc.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm and kc.fpzl_dm = fp.fpzl_dm and hd.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm and hd.fpzl_dm = fp.fpzl_dm and zl.fpzl_dm = fp.fpzl_dm and kc.fp_dm = fp.fp_dm and hd.djxh = ? and kc.fpkf_dm = ? and kc.fpzt_dm = ? and hd.yxbz = 'Y' order by kc.fpzl_dm, kc.fp_dm, kc.fpqshm

select m.fpzl_dm, zl.fpzlmc, m.fp_dm,fp.fpdmmc from fp_yjjcyqk z inner join fp_yjjcyqk_mx m on z.fpcyuuid = m.fpcyuuid left join dm_fp_fpzl zl on m.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm left join dm_fp_fp fp on m.fp_dm = fp.fp_dm where z.djxh = ? group by m.fpzl_dm, zl.fpzlmc, m.fp_dm,fp.fpdmmc
select distinct t.dcsx_dm from cs_fp_dcxcpz t where 1=1 #macroparam#

select t.yqkspzdksqduuid, t.lcslid, t.djxh, t.cwry, t.lxfs, t.yqzzsdkpzzzzszyfpfs, t.yqzzsdkpzzzzszyfpse, t.yqzzsdkpzzhgjkzzszyjksfs, t.yqzzsdkpzzhgjkzzszyjksse, t.yqzzskspzzglnhhwysytyfpfs, t.yqzzskspzhjfs, t.yqzzskspzhjse, t.nsrsm, t.qysmr, t.qyjbr, t.sqrq, t.slswjg_dm, t.yqzzskspzzglnhhwysytyfpse from fp_yqzzskspzdksqd t where t.lcslid = ?

with jcuuid as( select t.fpjcuuid from (SELECT mx.fpjcuuid, jc.jcrq, mx.fpkf_dm, row_number() over(partition by mx.fpkf_dm order by jc.jcrq desc) rn FROM FP_JC_MX mx, fp_jc jc where mx.fpjcuuid = jc.fpjcuuid and jc.zfbz_1 = 'N' and jc.jcrq < to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and mx.fpkf_dm in(#macroparam#) ) t where t.rn = 1 ) select t.fpzl_dm, zl.fpzlmc, t.fp_dm, zl.jldw_dm as dwsl_dm, sum(t.sqjcsl) sqjcsl, sum(t.sqjcje) sqjcje, sum(t.bqsdsl) bqsdsl, sum(t.bqsdje) bqsdje, sum(t.bqfssl) bqfssl, sum(t.bqfsje) bqfsje, sum(t.bqfcsl) bqfcsl, sum(t.bqfcje) bqfcje, sum(t.bqhxsl) bqhxsl, sum(t.bqhxje) bqhxje, sum(t.bqtpsl) bqtpsl, sum(t.bqtpje) bqtpje, sum(t.bqgssl) bqgssl, sum(t.bqgsje) bqgsje, sum(t.bqdksl) bqdksl, sum(t.bqdkje) bqdkje, sum(t.bqjcsl) bqjcsl, sum(t.bqjcje) bqjcje, Case When sum(t.sqjcsl) + sum(t.bqsdsl) - sum(t.bqfssl) - sum(t.bqfcsl) - sum(t.bqhxsl) + sum(t.bqtpsl) - sum(t.bqdksl) - sum(t.bqgssl) - sum(t.bqjcsl) = 0 Then 'Y' Else 'N' End As sfph from fp_sfcqkbg z, fp_sfcqkbg_mx t, dm_fp_fpzl zl where z.sfcuuid = t.sfcuuid and t.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm and z.fpjcuuid in (select fpjcuuid from jcuuid) Group by t.fpzl_dm, zl.fpzlmc, t.fp_dm, zl.jldw_dm
select * from fp_waqsbdkzzskspzyxjxdk_tzs where lcslid = ?

select distinct t.sfcuuid, t.fpjcuuid, t.ssswjg_dm, t.sssqq, t.zfbz_1, t.sssqz, t.zfr_dm, t.zfrq_1, t.jbr_dm, t.zbrq, t.sjgsdq, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.xgr_dm, t.fzr_dm_1 from fp_sfcqkbg t,fp_sfcqkbg_mx mx where t.sfcuuid = mx.sfcuuid and mx.sfph='N' and (t.zfbz_1 = 'N' or t.zfbz_1 is null) and (1 = ? or t.sssqq > to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')) and (1 = ? or t.sssqz < to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')) and (1 = ? or mx.fpkf_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or t.sfcuuid = ?)
select * from dm_fp_fpzl where fpzl_dm=? and yxbz='Y' and xybz='Y'

SELECT T.SWXZXKUUID, T.SWXZXKXM_DM, to_char(t.xkyxqq,'YYYY-MM-DD') XKYXQQ, to_char(t.xkyxqz,'YYYY-MM-DD') XKYXQZ FROM FP_SWXZXK T WHERE T.SWXZXKZT_DM = '1' and t.swxzxkxm_dm not in ('02','05') AND T.DJXH = ? and T.xkyxqz >= SYSDATE
select count(1) from fp_yzrkxx a where a.zfbz_1 = 'N' and a.fpzl_dm = ? and a.fp_dm = ? and to_number(a.fpqshm) #macroparam# and to_number(a.fpzzhm) #macroparam#

select ly.djxh, mx.fpzl_dm, mx.fpzl_dm, mx.fp_dm, mx.fpsl, mx.fpqshm, mx.fpzzhm, ly.lrrq, zl.defpbz, zl.zppz_dm, fp.mbfs, fp.fpme, zl.zkdklx_dm, zl.fplb_dm, zl.tdhy_dm from fp_ly ly, fp_ly_mx mx, dm_fp_fpzl zl, dm_fp_fp fp where ly.fplyuuid = mx.fplyuuid and mx.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm and mx.fpzl_dm = fp.fpzl_dm and zl.fpzl_dm = fp.fpzl_dm and mx.fp_dm = fp.fp_dm and ly.djxh = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or to_date(mx.lrrq,'yyyy-mm-dd') >= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or to_date(mx.lrrq,'yyyy-mm-dd') <= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or mx.fpzl_dm in (#macroparam#)) order by mx.fpzl_dm, mx.fp_dm, mx.fpqshm
DELETE FROM fp_yqzzskspzdksqd_hyfp WHERE yqkspzdksqduuid = (select yqkspzdksqduuid FROM fp_yqzzskspzdksqd where lcslid = ?)

select mx.fptpmxuuid, mx.fptpuuid, mx.fpzl_dm, mx.fp_dm, mx.fpqshm, mx.fpzzhm, mx.fpsl, zl.fpzlmc, fp.fpdmmc, zl.defpbz, zl.zppz_dm, mx.lrrq as tpsj from fp_tp_mx mx, dm_fp_fpzl zl, dm_fp_fp fp where mx.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm and mx.fpzl_dm = fp.fpzl_dm and mx.fp_dm = fp.fp_dm and zl.fpzl_dm = fp.fpzl_dm and mx.fpzl_dm = ? and mx.fp_dm = ? and to_number(mx.fpqshm)<=to_number(?) and to_number(mx.fpzzhm)>=to_number(?) order by fpqshm
SELECT WFBG.* FROM FP_SSWFAJDCBG WFBG, FP_SSSXDCB DCB WHERE WFBG.SSSXDCUUID = DCB.SSSXDCUUID #macroparam#

SELECT l.djxh, l.gprxm, l.sfzjlx_dm, l.sfzjhm, l.xydj FROM fp_ly l WHERE l.fplyuuid IN (SELECT fplyuuid FROM fp_ly_mx m WHERE m.fpzl_dm = ? AND m.fp_dm = ? AND m.fpqshm <= ? AND m.fpzzhm >= ?) AND l.djxh = ?
delete fp_dcxcqdb qdb where qdb.qdpch=?

SELECT QDMX.DCXCQDMXUUID, QDMX.DCXCQDUUID, TO_CHAR(QDMX.DJXH) DJXH, QDMX.DCSX_DM, QDMX.DCXM_DM, QDMX.NSRTBNR, QDMX.LRR_DM, QDMX.LRRQ, QDMX.XGR_DM, QDMX.XGRQ, QDMX.SJGSDQ FROM FP_DCXCQDB_MX QDMX WHERE QDMX.DCXCQDUUID = ? AND QDMX.DJXH = ?
select l.djxh from fp_ly l, fp_ly_mx m where l.fplyuuid = m.fplyuuid and m.fpzl_dm = ? and m.fp_dm = ? and to_number(m.fpqshm) <= ? and to_number(m.fpzzhm) >= ?
select kpxeuuid, swxzxkuuid, swxzxkxm_dm, fpzgkpxe_dm, fpzl_dm, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sjtb_sj, sjgsdq from fp_swxzxk_zgxe where swxzxkuuid= ?

select * from fp_dk_sq order by lrrq desc; select t.dksquuid, t.djxh, t.dkfplb_dm, t.kpje, t.lcslid, t.sqrxm, t.sqrq, t.slr_dm, t.slrq, t.zfbz_1, t.slswjg_dm, t.zfrq_1, t.zfr_dm, t.zrrbz, t.kjbz, t.pzxh, t.sjgsdq, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.xgr_dm, t.xgrq, t.sqdhm, t.jdxz_dm, t.zgswskfj_dm, t.xzqhsz_dm, t.hy_dm, t.dksqje, t.ybsfe, t.jmsbz, t.jmslx_dm, t.kplx_dm, t.jmyy, t.zsbz, t.zjsrsfft, t.qxq, t.qxz from fp_dk_sq t where t.djxh = ? and t.zjsrsfft = 'Y' and t.qxq is not null and t.qxz is not null and t.zfbz_1 = 'N' and t.zsbz = 'Y'

select t.uuid, t.swxzxkuuid, t.bhzrscjydz, t.hzrscjydz, t.bhzrqysdszgswjg_dm, t.hzrqysdszgswjg_dm, t.djxh, t.nsrmc, t.nsrsbh, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.xgr_dm, t.xgrq, t.sjgsdq, t.sjtb_sj, t.xkyxqq, t.xkyxqz, t.czlx_dm, t.bhzrqysdszgswjgmc, xk.djxh hzr_djxh from fp_swxzxk_hzjnqysds t,fp_swxzxk xk where t.swxzxkuuid = xk.swxzxkuuid and t.djxh=? and t.xkyxqz >= sysdate and t.xkyxqq <= sysdate
select t.jyfuuid, t.djxh, t.kpje, t.dksqje, t.dksquuid, t.fcjycjxxuuid, t.uuid from fp_fc_dkje t where t.fcjycjxxuuid = ? and t.zfbz_1 = ?
select count(dkfpsz.dkptfpszuuid) isexist from fp_dkptfpsz dkfpsz where dkfpsz.dkfplb_dm = ? and dkfpsz.fpzl_dm = ?

select gtgsh.mxuuid, gtgsh.uuid, gtgsh.xh, gtgsh.tssjcjsjx_dm, gtgsh.tssjcjsjxlb, gtgsh.hs, gtgsh.se, gtgsh.bz_1, gtgsh.bz, gtgsh.lrrq, gtgsh.lrr_dm, gtgsh.xgrq, gtgsh.xgr_dm, gtgsh.sjgsdq from fp_tssjcj_gtgshjmsrcsb gtgsh,fp_tssjcj cj where gtgsh.uuid = cj.tssjcjuuid #macroparam# order by gtgsh.tssjcjsjx_dm,gtgsh.tssjcjsjxlb
delete from fp_nsrfpjc c where c.nsrjcuuid = ? and djxh = ? and fpzl_dm = ? and fp_dm = ? and fpqshm = ? and fpzzhm = ?

select a.fpgsmxuuid, a.fpgsuuid, a.fpzl_dm, b.fpzlmc, a.fp_dm, c.fpdmmc, a.bfs, a.fpqshm, a.fpzzhm, a.fpgslx_dm, a.dsbdrq, c.mbfs from fp_swjgfpgs_mx_jgb a, dm_fp_fpzl b, dm_fp_fp c where a.fpzl_dm = b.fpzl_dm and a.fp_dm = c.fp_dm and a.fpgsuuid = ?

select distinct mx.jcmxuuid, mx.fpjcuuid, mx.fpzl_dm, zl.fpzlmc, mx.fp_dm, mx.fpqshm, mx.fpzzhm, mx.sl, mx.jbr_dm, mx.dwsl_dm, mx.je, mx.sjgsdq, mx.lrrq, mx.lrr_dm, mx.fpkf_dm, fp.mbfs, fp.fpdmmc, kf.fpkfgtmc from fp_jc_mx mx, dm_fp_fpzl zl, dm_fp_fp fp,fp_fpkf kf where mx.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm and mx.fpkf_dm=kf.fpkf_dm and mx.fpzl_dm = fp.fpzl_dm and zl.fpzl_dm = fp.fpzl_dm and mx.fp_dm = fp.fp_dm and fpjcuuid = ?

SELECT DCBMX.SSSXDCMXUUID, DCBMX.SSSXDCUUID, DCBMX.DCSX_DM, DCBMX.DCXM_DM, DCBMX.DCHSNR, DCBMX.NSRQR_DM, DCBMX.CZYYQKSM, DCBMX.LRR_DM, DCBMX.LRRQ, DCBMX.XGR_DM, DCBMX.XGRQ, DCBMX.SJGSDQ, DCBMX.NSRTBNR, SX.DCSXMC, XM.DCXMMC, (SELECT DCSX.DCSXMC FROM DM_ZH_DCSX DCSX WHERE DCSX.DCSX_DM = SX.SJDCSX_DM AND DCSX.YXBZ = 'Y') SJDCSX_DM FROM FP_SSSXDCMX DCBMX, FP_SSSXDCB DCB, DM_ZH_DCSX SX, DM_ZH_DCXM XM WHERE DCBMX.SSSXDCUUID = DCB.SSSXDCUUID AND DCBMX.DCSX_DM = SX.DCSX_DM AND DCBMX.DCXM_DM = XM.DCXM_DM #macroparam#

select cy.djxh, cymx.fpzl_dm, cymx.fp_dm, cymx.fs, cymx.fpqshm, cymx.fpzzhm, cymx.lrrq, cymx.kpqsrq, cymx.kpjzrq, cymx.kpje, fp.phcd, cymx.cyfpmxuuid, cymx.fpyjjg_dm from fp_yjjcyqk cy, fp_yjjcyqk_mx cymx, dm_fp_fp fp where cy.fpcyuuid = cymx.fpcyuuid and cymx.fpzl_dm = fp.fpzl_dm and cymx.fp_dm = fp.fp_dm and (1=#macroparam# or cy.djxh = ?) and cymx.fpzl_dm = ? and cymx.fp_dm = ? and to_number(cymx.fpqshm) <= to_number(?) and to_number(cymx.fpzzhm) >= to_number(?) and cymx.zfbz_1 <> 'Y' and cymx.fpyjjg_dm in (#macroparam#) order by cymx.fpzl_dm, cymx.fp_dm, cymx.fpqshm
select distinct d.zspm_dm from cs_fp_bkxdzspm d where d.dkfplb_dm = ? and d.swjg_dm in (select j.swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg j start with j.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior j.sjswjg_dm = j.swjg_dm)

select ly.fplyuuid, ly.djxh, ly.sfzjlx_dm, ly.gprxm, ly.sfzjhm, ly.fpkf_dm, ly.slr_dm, ly.slrq, ly.slswjg_dm, ly.lrr_dm, ly.lrrq, ly.sjgsdq, ly.sytgtpje, ly.sycxltpje from fp_ly ly where ly.djxh = ? and (1 = ? or ly.lrrq >= ?) and (1 = ? or ly.lrrq < (?+1))
delete from fp_waqsbdkzzskspzdksqd where lcslid = ?

select ck.czrykfkcuuid, ck.czry_dm, ck.fpkf_dm, ck.fpzl_dm, ck.fp_dm, ck.bs, ck.fpqshm, ck.fpzzhm, ck.fpzt_dm, ck.swjg_dm, ck.sjgsdq, ck.lrr_dm, ck.lrrq, zl.fpzlmc, zl.defpbz, zl.skbz, zl.defpxebz, zl.zppz_dm, zl.zkdklx_dm, zl.fplb_dm, zl.tdhy_dm, zl.jeb_dm, fp.fpdmmc, fp.jldw_dm, fp.mbfs, fp.phcd, fp.yspc, fp.fpme, fp.fpxj, fp.fpjj, fp.fpzg from fp_czrykfkc ck left join dm_fp_fpzl zl on ck.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm left join dm_fp_fp fp on ck.fp_dm = fp.fp_dm where ck.czry_dm = ? order by ck.fpzl_dm, ck.fp_dm, ck.fpqshm
select jx.fpzl_dm, jx.fp_dm from FP_HBJXQXSZ jx where jx.swjg_dm = ? and jx.fpzl_dm in (#macroparam#) and jx.jxrqq <= ? and jx.jxrqz >= ?
delete from fp_fwyphxsq_mx where fwhxuuid = (select fwhxuuid from fp_fwyphxsq where lcslid = ?)

select * from (select distinct a.jcrq, a.lrrq from fp_jc a, fp_jc_mx b where a.fpjcuuid = b.fpjcuuid and (1=#macroparam# or a.ssswjg_dm=?) and (1=#macroparam# or b.fpkf_dm=?) order by a.lrrq desc) where rownum <3

select gs.gssquuid as uuid, gs.lrrq as rq, gs.slswjg_dm as swjg_dm, swjg.swjgmc, '6' as dylx_dm from fp_gsshsqbg gs, dm_gy_swjg swjg where gs.slswjg_dm = swjg.swjg_dm and gs.djxh = ? and to_date(to_char(gs.lrrq, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') >= ? and to_date(to_char(gs.lrrq, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') <= ? order by gs.lrrq desc
delete from fp_zwjd_mx where zwjduuid = (select zwjduuid from fp_zwjd where lcslid = ?)
select dcb.sssxdcuuid from fp_sssxdcb dcb where dcb.dcjl_dm='05' and dcb.djxh=? and (dcb.clbz <>'Y' or dcb.clbz is null)
select dy.djxh, dy.lyhs, dy.tphs, dy.yjhs, dy.gshs, dy.jxhs, dy.hdhs, dy.swjg_dm, dy.lrr_dm, dy.lrrq, dy.xgr_dm, dy.xgrq, dy.sjgsdq, dy.sjtb_sj from fp_lgb_dyhs dy where dy.djxh = ?

select cy.djxh, cymx.fpzl_dm, cymx.fp_dm, cymx.fs, cymx.fpqshm, cymx.fpzzhm, cymx.lrrq, cymx.kpqsrq, cymx.kpjzrq, cymx.kpje, fp.phcd, cymx.cyfpmxuuid, cymx.fpyjjg_dm, cymx.zfbz_1 from fp_yjjcyqk cy, fp_yjjcyqk_mx cymx, dm_fp_fp fp where cy.fpcyuuid = cymx.fpcyuuid and cymx.fpzl_dm = fp.fpzl_dm and cymx.fp_dm = fp.fp_dm and (1 = #macroparam# or cy.djxh = ?) and cymx.fpzl_dm = ? and cymx.fp_dm = ? and to_number(cymx.fpqshm) <= ? and to_number(cymx.fpzzhm) >= ?

select mx.fplyuuid, mx.fplymxuuid, mx.fpzl_dm, mx.fp_dm, mx.fpqshm, mx.fpzzhm, mx.fpsl, mx.wtdkbz, mx.xpbz, mx.lrrq, zl.fpzlmc, fp.fpdmmc, zl.defpbz, zl.zppz_dm, fp.fpjj, fp.fpxj, zl.fplb_dm, zl.tdhy_dm, ly.gprxm, ly.fpdzxxlqfs_dm from fp_ly ly, fp_ly_mx mx, dm_fp_fpzl zl, dm_fp_fp fp where ly.fplyuuid = mx.fplyuuid and mx.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm and mx.fpzl_dm = fp.fpzl_dm and mx.fp_dm = fp.fp_dm and zl.fpzl_dm = fp.fpzl_dm and ly.djxh = ? and mx.lrrq > = ? and mx.lrrq < (? +1) and (1 = #macroparam# or exists (select tp.fptpuuid from fp_tp tp, fp_tp_mx tpmx where tp.fptpuuid = tpmx.fptpuuid and tp.djxh = ly.djxh and tpmx.fpzl_dm = mx.fpzl_dm and tpmx.fp_dm = mx.fp_dm and to_number(tpmx.fpqshm) <= to_number(mx.fpzzhm) and to_number(tpmx.fpzzhm) >= to_number(mx.fpqshm) and tpmx.lrrq >= mx.lrrq)) and mx.xpbz in (#macroparam#)

select gptp.tpjguuid, gptp.gptplx_dm, gptp.djxh, gptp.zgqxq, gptp.zgqxz, gptp.ljgpje, gptp.lrr_dm, gptp.lrrq, gptp.xgr_dm, gptp.xgrq, gptp.sjgsdq, gptp.sjtb_sj, gptp.sygpje from fp_gptp_ljje gptp where gptp.djxh = ? and gptp.zgqxq <= ? and gptp.zgqxz >= ? and gptp.gptplx_dm = ? order by gptp.lrrq

select distinct qk.fpcyuuid as uuid, qk.lrrq as rq, qk.cyswjg_dm as swjg_dm, swjg.swjgmc, '5' as dylx_dm from fp_yjjcyqk qk, fp_yjjcyqk_mx mx, dm_gy_swjg swjg where qk.fpcyuuid = mx.fpcyuuid and qk.cyswjg_dm = swjg.swjg_dm and qk.djxh = ? and mx.zfbz_1<>'Y' and qk.lrrq >= ? and qk.lrrq < (?+1) and qk.yjjsjly_dm not in ('05','06') order by qk.lrrq desc

select fp.fpzl_dm, fp.fp_dm, fp.fpdmmc, fp.nd, fp.yspc, fp.fphy_dm, fp.zz_dm, fp.phcd, fp.fpjj, fp.fpxj, fp.dkj, fp.fpzg, fp.mbfs, fp.mxbfs, fp.fpzlxl, fp.pjzdfs_dm, fp.gg, fp.fpxzqh_dm from dm_fp_fp fp where fp.fpzl_dm = ? and substr(fp.fpxzqh_dm, 0, 2) = substr(?, 0, 2) and fp.yxbz = 'Y' AND fp.xybz = 'Y'
delete fp_dcxcqdb qdb where qdb.dcxcqduuid=?

select r.cyfpmxuuid, r.ywuuid, r.fpzl_dm, r.fp_dm, r.fs, r.fpqshm, r.fpzzhm, r.fpkjqk_dm, r.fpyjjg_dm, r.kpqsrq, r.kpjzrq, r.kpje, r.se, r.zfbz_1, r.sjgsdq, r.lrr_dm, r.lrrq, r.xgr_dm, r.xgrq, r.fpcyuuid, r.sjtb_sj, r.zgswskfj_dm from fp_yjjcyqk_mx r where r.cyfpmxuuid = ?

select a.jhbzuuid, a.tbswjg_dm, b.swjgmc tbswjgmc, a.sssqq, a.sssqz, a.bz, a.zbr_dm,
a.zbrq, a.fpjhzt_dm, a.hzbz_1, a.hzrq_1, a.hzjg_dm, a.fpthyy, a.fpjhfl_dm, a.swjg_dm, a.sjjhbzuuid from fp_fpjhbz a, dm_gy_swjg b where a.tbswjg_dm = b.swjg_dm
and (1 = ? or a.tbswjg_dm in (#macroparam#))
and (1 = ? or a.fpjhfl_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or a.sssqq = ?) and (1 = ? or a.sssqz = ?) and (1 = ? or a.ZFBZ_1 = ?) and (1 = ? or a.fpjhzt_dm in (#macroparam#))
select zl.* from dm_fp_fpzl zl where zl.fplb_dm in (#macroparam#) and zl.yxbz = 'Y' and zl.xybz = 'Y'

select ly.djxh, mx.fpzl_dm, mx.fpzl_dm, mx.fp_dm, mx.fpsl, mx.fpqshm, mx.fpzzhm, mx.lrrq, ly.lrr_dm, zl.defpbz, zl.zppz_dm, fp.mbfs, fp.fpme, zl.zkdklx_dm, zl.fplb_dm, zl.tdhy_dm, fp.phcd, mx.sytggptpsl, mx.sycxlgptpsl from fp_ly ly inner join fp_ly_mx mx on ly.fplyuuid = mx.fplyuuid left join dm_fp_fpzl zl on mx.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm left join dm_fp_fp fp on mx.fp_dm = fp.fp_dm where ly.djxh = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or mx.lrrq >= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or mx.lrrq < (?+1))
select distinct jc.fpzl_dm, jc.fp_dm from fp_nsrfpjc jc where jc.djxh = ? and jc.fpzl_dm in (#macroparam#) and jc.fpzt_dm = ?

select wt.wtdkfpxxcjuuid, wt.wtfswjg_dm, wt.stfdjxh, wt.fpzl_dm, wt.fp_dm, wt.fphm, wt.kprq, wt.fkfsfsbh, wt.fkfdjxh, wt.fkfmc, wt.skfsfsbh, wt.skfdjxh, wt.skfmc, wt.hwlwmc, wt.je, wt.fpkjqk_dm, wt.zfbz_1, wt.zfr_dm, wt.zfrq_1, wt.sjgsdq, wt.lrrq, wt.lrr_dm, wt.xgrq, wt.xgr_dm from fp_wtdkfpxxcjb wt where wt.fpzl_dm = ? and wt.fp_dm = ? and wt.fphm = ? and (wt.ZFBZ_1 != 'Y' or wt.ZFBZ_1 is null)

select * from (select jc.fpjcuuid, jc.ssswjg_dm, jc.jbr_dm, jc.jcrq, jc.zfr_dm, jc.zfrq_1, jc.zfbz_1, jc.sjgsdq, jc.lrr_dm, jc.lrrq from fp_jc jc, fp_jc_mx mx where jc.fpjcuuid = mx.fpjcuuid and (1 = ? or ssswjg_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or fpkf_dm = ?) and zfbz_1!='Y' order by jcrq desc) where rownum = 1
SELECT T.SWXZXKUUID, T.SWXZXKXM_DM, t.xkyxqq, t.xkyxqz FROM FP_SWXZXK T WHERE T.SWXZXKZT_DM = '1' AND T.DJXH = ? and t.swxzxkxm_dm in ('01','04') and T.xkyxqz >= SYSDATE
select fplgbuuid, djxh, swzjzl_dm, swzjhm, swzjglzt_dm, ffrq, yxqq, yxqz, lrrq, lrr_dm, sjgsdq, fplgbhm from fp_lgb where djxh=?

select a.yzfpuuid, a.yzcsdjxh, a.fpr_dm, b.swryxm fprxm, a.fprq, a.wszg, a.ysdw_dm, a.fprq as wszzrq, a.fprq, a.cycsmc, a.ysdw_1, a.jsdwmc_1, a.fpyzysbz from fp_yzjhfp a, dm_gy_swry b where a.fpr_dm = b.swry_dm and (1 = ? or a.yzcsdjxh = ?) and (1 = ? or a.fpswjg_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or a.rkswjg_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or a.fpyzysbz = ?) and (1 = ? or a.zfbz_1 = ?) and (1 = ? or a.fprq >= ?) and (1 = ? or a.fprq-1 <= ? )

select kc.*, fp.mbfs, fp.phcd from fp_swjgkfkc kc, dm_fp_fp fp where kc.fpzl_dm = fp.fpzl_dm and kc.fp_dm = fp.fp_dm and kc.fpkf_dm = ? and kc.fpzl_dm = ? and kc.fp_dm = ? and to_number(kc.fpqshm) <= ? and to_number(kc.fpzzhm) >= ? order by kc.fpzl_dm, kc.fp_dm, kc.fpqshm
delete from fp_fpjhbz_zzsmx a where a.jhbzuuid = ?
select b.* from fp_cglcj a, fp_cglcj_escfp b where a.fpcglcjuuid = b.fpcglcjuuid and a.fpcglcjuuid = ? and b.esccgluuid = ? and b.fp_dm = ? and b.fphm = ?

select b.fpcglcjuuid, b.jzcgluuid, b.lrr_dm, swry.swryxm lrrxm, b.lrrq, b.fpzl_dm, b.fp_dm, fp.fpdmmc, b.fphm, trim(a.cglsjcjlx_dm) cglsjcjlxDm from fp_cglcj a, fp_cglcj_jzyfp b, dm_gy_swry swry, dm_fp_fp fp where a.fpcglcjuuid = b.fpcglcjuuid and b.lrr_dm = swry.swry_dm and b.fp_dm = fp.fp_dm and b.zfbz_1 = 'N' and a.djxh = ? and a.fpcglcjuuid = ?

select distinct zh.lsrwbh, to_char(zh.djxh) djxh, nvl(pf.xgrq, pf.lrrq) pfrq, pf.sssxdcnsruuid, pf.lsrwbh, pf.dcswjg_dm, pf.pfr_dm, pf.pfswjg_dm, pf.dcr_dm, pf.lrr_dm, pf.lrrq, pf.xgr_dm, pf.xgrq, pf.sjgsdq, pf.blzt_dm, pf.lcslid, pf.jsr_dm, pf.jsjg_dm, pf.dcrjh, pf.xguuid, pf.jsrjh from fp_dcxczhb zh, fp_sssxdcnsrpfb pf where zh.lsrwbh = pf.lsrwbh #macroparam#

select zb.ywslxh, zb.djxh, zb.wslpuuid, zb.nsrsbh, zb.gprxm, mx.fpzl_dm, mx.wslpmxuuid, zl.fpzlmc, mx.fp_dm, mx.bs, mx.fpqshm, mx.fpzzhm, zb.zgswskfj_dm, zl.zppz_dm, zl.fplb_dm, zl.tdhy_dm, zl.skbz from fp_wslp_mx mx inner join dm_fp_fpzl zl on mx.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm and mx.zfbz_1 = 'N' and mx.sjtbbz = 'N' and mx.wslpsjmxzt_dm = '02' and (zl.zppz_dm in ('1', '2', '3', '6', '7') or (zl.fplb_dm = '8' and zl.tdhy_dm = '02')) inner join fp_wslp zb on mx.wslpuuid = zb.wslpuuid and zb.wslpywzt_dm = '04' and zb.wslpqrfs_dm = '01' inner join fp_wslp_gxswjg jg on zb.zgswskfj_dm = jg.swjg_dm
select distinct trunc(mx.kpqsrq, 'MM') ssqq, last_day(trunc(mx.kpjzrq)) ssqz from fp_yjjcyqk_mx mx where mx.fpcyuuid in (#macroparam#) and trim(mx.fpyjjg_dm) = ? and mx.zfbz_1 <> 'Y'

select gpr.gprxm, gpr.sfzjzl_dm, gpr.sfzjhm, gpr.lxdh, gpr.gprqcuuid, gpr.djxh, gpr.yxqq, gpr.yxqz, gpr.yxbz, gpr.swjg_dm, gpr.lrrq, gpr.lrr_dm, gpr.xgr_dm, gpr.xgrq, gpr.sjtb_sj, gpr.sjgsdq from fp_pzhdgprxx gpr where gpr.djxh = ? and gpr.yxbz = 'Y' and gpr.yxqq <= ? and gpr.yxqz >= ? order by gpr.lrrq desc

SELECT DCB.SSSXDCUUID, DCB.LSRWBH, DCB.RWBH, TO_CHAR(DCB.DJXH) DJXH, DCB.FDDBRGDDH, DCB.FDDBRYDDH, DCB.BSRXM, DCB.BSRGDDH, DCB.BSRYDDH, DCB.DCSWJG_DM, DCB.DCR_DM, DCB.DCRQ, DCB.DCJSRQ, DCB.DCJL_DM, DCB.DCJLSM, DCB.DCRYQTQKSM, DCB.DYBZ, DCB.LRR_DM, DCB.LRRQ, DCB.XGR_DM, DCB.XGRQ, DCB.SJGSDQ, DCB.SFFK, DCB.FDDBRXM FROM FP_SSSXDCB DCB WHERE 1 = 1 #macroparam#

select tbns.mxuuid, tbns.uuid, tbns.nsrsbh, tbns.djxh, tbns.tbnsjkglhj_dm, tbns.tbnsdcajbh, tbns.ajmc, tbns.yydjapajmc, tbns.yydjapajbh, tbns.nsrmc, tbns.jknd, tbns.tbnstzdclx_dm, tbns.jkqqk, tbns.jkhqk, tbns.gtzrmbje, tbns.qysdstzqkmbkse, tbns.qysdstzqktzynsdse, tbns.ybsdse, tbns.tzzzsyssre, tbns.ybzzse, tbns.tzxfsyssre, tbns.ybxfse, tbns.tzyysyssre, tbns.ybyyse, tbns.ybqtse, tbns.qtsyssre, tbns.lrrq, tbns.xgrq, tbns.lrr_dm, tbns.xgr_dm, tbns.sjgsdq from fp_tssjcj_tbnsjkglkhtjb tbns,fp_tssjcj cj where tbns.uuid = cj.tssjcjuuid #macroparam#

select fp.fpzl_dm, fp.fp_dm, fp.fpdmmc, fp.nd, fp.yspc, fp.fphy_dm, fp.zz_dm, fp.phcd, fp.fpjj, fp.fpxj, fp.dkj, fp.fpzg, fp.mbfs, fp.mxbfs, fp.fpzlxl, fp.pjzdfs_dm, fp.gg, fp.fpxzqh_dm from dm_fp_fp fp where fp.fpzl_dm = ? and substr(fp.fpxzqh_dm, 0, 2) = substr(?, 0, 2) and fp.yxbz = 'Y' AND fp.xybz = 'Y'
