select * from ( select T.SWXZXKUUID, T.SWXZXKXM_DM, t.xkyxqq, t.xkyxqz, T.djxh, T.swjg_dm, T.swxzxkzt_dm, T.lrr_dm, T.lrrq, T.xgr_dm, T.xgrq, T.sjgsdq, t.lssqbz, xe.kpxeuuid, xe.fpzl_dm, xe.fpzgkpxe_dm, xe.yxbz from FP_SWXZXK T,fp_swxzxk_zgxe xe WHERE T.SWXZXKZT_DM = '1' and t.swxzxkuuid = xe.swxzxkuuid and xe.fpzl_dm='1130' and t.lssqbz ='Y' and t.djxh = ? and t.swxzxkxm_dm='03' and xe.yxbz='Y' and t.xkyxqz < SYSDATE order by lrrq desc ) where rownum=1 union select * from ( select T.SWXZXKUUID, T.SWXZXKXM_DM, t.xkyxqq, t.xkyxqz, T.djxh, T.swjg_dm, T.swxzxkzt_dm, T.lrr_dm, T.lrrq, T.xgr_dm, T.xgrq, T.sjgsdq, t.lssqbz, xe.kpxeuuid, xe.fpzl_dm, xe.fpzgkpxe_dm, xe.yxbz from FP_SWXZXK T,fp_swxzxk_zgxe xe WHERE T.SWXZXKZT_DM = '1' and t.swxzxkuuid = xe.swxzxkuuid and xe.fpzl_dm='1160' and t.lssqbz ='Y' and xe.yxbz='Y' and t.djxh = ? and t.swxzxkxm_dm='03' and t.xkyxqz < SYSDATE order by lrrq desc ) where rownum=1

select zl.fpzl_dm, zl.skbz, zl.fpzlmc, zl.fplb_dm, zl.jeb_dm, zl.TKFS_DM, 99999999 kgpsl, zl.tdhy_dm, 5 dffpzgkpxe_dm, zl.zppz_dm from dm_fp_fpzl zl where zl.fplb_dm = ? and zl.tdhy_dm in (#macroparam#) order by fpzl_dm

Select t.fpkf_dm, t.fpzl_dm, t.fp_dm, zl.jldw_dm, sum(t.syjcsl) syjcsl, sum(t.syjcje) syjcje, sum(t.bysdsl) bysdsl, sum(t.bysdje) bysdje, sum(t.byfssl) byfssl, sum(t.byfsje) byfsje, sum(t.byfcsl) byfcsl, sum(t.byfcje) byfcje, sum(t.byhxsl) byhxsl, sum(t.byhxje) byhxje, sum(t.bytpsl) bytpsl, sum(t.bytpje) bytpje, sum(t.bygssl) bygssl, sum(t.bygsje) bygsje, sum(t.bydksl) bydksl, sum(t.bydkje) bydkje, sum(t.byjcsl) byjcsl, sum(t.byjcje) byjcje, Case When sum(t.syjcsl) + sum(t.bysdsl) - sum(t.byfssl) - sum(t.byfcsl) - sum(t.byhxsl) + sum(t.bytpsl) - sum(t.bydksl) - sum(t.bygssl) - sum(t.byjcsl) = 0 Then 'Y' Else 'N' End As sfph From TMP_FP_SFCQKBGB t,dm_fp_fpzl zl Where t.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm Group By t.fpkf_dm, t.fpzl_dm, t.fp_dm, zl.jldw_dm
select DISTINCT a.fpzl_dm, a.fp_dm, a.xqshm, a.xzzhm, a.xs, a.bs, a.fpqshm, a.fpzzhm, a.fpzt_dm, a.swjg_dm, a.lrrq from fp_swjgkfkc_jc a where a.fpkf_dm=? and lrrq >=? and lrrq <=?
SELECT n.nsrmc, t.dz, t.zfrq, t.djgfbz FROM fp_yjfpdjsq t, dj_nsrxx n WHERE t.djrdjxh = n.djxh AND t.djrdjxh=? AND t.zfbz_1 != ? and t.sqrq = to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')

select gs.slr_dm, gs.slrq, gs.slswjg_dm, gs.skqj, gs.gsshqksm, gs.gssm, gs.lrr_dm, gs.lrrq, gs.sjgsdq, gs.sqrxm, mx.fpzl_dm, mx.fp_dm, ltrim(rtrim(mx.bglx_dm_1)) as bglxDm1, mx.fs, mx.fs as lgsl, mx.fpqshm, mx.fpzzhm, mx.fpjxlx_dm, zl.jldw_dm, fp.fpzg, fp.yspc, fp.fpdmmc, swry.swryxm from fp_gsshsqbg_mx mx, fp_gsshsqbg gs, dm_fp_fpzl zl, dm_fp_fp fp, dm_gy_swry swry where gs.gssquuid = mx.gssquuid and mx.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm and mx.fp_dm = fp.fp_dm and swry.swry_dm = gs.lrr_dm and mx.gssquuid = ? order by gs.lrrq

select ws.wslpuuid, ws.ywslxh, ws.djxh, ws.nsrsbh, ws.gprxm, ws.sfzjzl_dm, ws.sfzjhm, ws.wslpywzt_dm, ws.wslpqrfs_dm, ws.shbtgyy, ws.zgswskfj_dm, ws.slcs, ws.lxdh, ws.yjyjsdsj, ws.sycxltpje, ws.sytgtpje, ws.dz, ws.bz, ws.version, mx.wslpmxuuid, mx.fpzl_dm, mx.fp_dm, mx.fpqshm, mx.bs, mx.fpzzhm, mx.zgswskfj_dm, mx.zfbz_1, mx.wslpsjmxzt_dm, mx.sycxlgptpsl, mx.sytggptpsl, mx.sjgsdq, fp.mbfs, fp.jldw_dm, fp.fpme, fp.fpdmmc, zl.fpzlmc, zl.zppz_dm, zl.tdhy_dm, zl.fplb_dm, zl.skbz, zl.defpbz from fp_wslp ws, fp_wslp_mx mx, dm_fp_fpzl zl, dm_fp_fp fp where ws.wslpuuid = mx.wslpuuid and mx.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm and mx.fpzl_dm = fp.fpzl_dm and zl.fpzl_dm = fp.fpzl_dm and mx.fp_dm = fp.fp_dm and (1 = #macroparam# or ws.wslpuuid = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or ws.wslpywzt_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or mx.wslpsjmxzt_dm = ?) and mx.zfbz_1 <> 'Y'

with jcuuid as( SELECT sfcuuid FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY fpkf_dm ORDER BY sssqq desc) LEV, t.sfcuuid FROM (select distinct a.sfcuuid, b.fpkf_dm, a.sssqq from fp_sfcqkbg a, fp_sfcqkbg_mx b where a.sfcuuid = b.sfcuuid and (a.zfbz_1 = 'N' or a.zfbz_1 is null) and a.sssqq >= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and a.sssqz <= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and b.fpkf_dm in(#macroparam#) ) t) WHERE LEV = 1 ) select t.fpzl_dm, zl.fpzlmc, t.fp_dm, zl.jldw_dm as dwsl_dm, sum(t.sqjcsl) sqjcsl, sum(t.sqjcje) sqjcje, sum(t.bqsdsl) bqsdsl, sum(t.bqsdje) bqsdje, sum(t.bqfssl) bqfssl, sum(t.bqfsje) bqfsje, sum(t.bqfcsl) bqfcsl, sum(t.bqfcje) bqfcje, sum(t.bqhxsl) bqhxsl, sum(t.bqhxje) bqhxje, sum(t.bqtpsl) bqtpsl, sum(t.bqtpje) bqtpje, sum(t.bqgssl) bqgssl, sum(t.bqgsje) bqgsje, sum(t.bqdksl) bqdksl, sum(t.bqdkje) bqdkje, sum(t.bqjcsl) bqjcsl, sum(t.bqjcje) bqjcje, Case When sum(t.sqjcsl) + sum(t.bqsdsl) - sum(t.bqfssl) - sum(t.bqfcsl) - sum(t.bqhxsl) + sum(t.bqtpsl) - sum(t.bqdksl) - sum(t.bqgssl) - sum(t.bqjcsl) = 0 Then 'Y' Else 'N' End As sfph from fp_sfcqkbg z, fp_sfcqkbg_mx t, dm_fp_fpzl zl where z.sfcuuid = t.sfcuuid and t.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm and z.sfcuuid in (select sfcuuid from jcuuid) Group by t.fpzl_dm, zl.fpzlmc, t.fp_dm, zl.jldw_dm
select count(a.jhbzuuid) from fp_fpjhbz a where a.zfbz_1 = 'N' and (1 = ? or a.tbswjg_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or a.fpjhfl_dm = ?) and a.sssqq #macroparam# and a.sssqz #macroparam#
select XGRQ, XGR_DM, LRRQ, LRR_DM, SJGSDQ, NSSBRQ, BSRQ, SE, JE, SL, DJ, YSHWXX, FYXM, HWLWMC, FPHM, FP_DM, DSUUID, MXUUID from FP_DSZZSZYFPYBSZM_MX mx where mx.dsuuid = ?
select zhb.lsrwbh from fp_dcxczhb zhb where zhb.dcxczhuuid = ? and zhb.djxh = ? and zhb.pfbz='Y'
delete fp_tssjcj_gtgshjmsrcsb gtgsh where 1=1 #macroparam#
select yqzzskspzdksqdhgjksuuid, zyjkshm, tfrq, wsjg, skje from fp_yqzzskspzdksqd_hgjks t where t.yqkspzdksqduuid = ?
select b.* from fp_yybdwmczzsptfpba a, fp_yybdwmczzsptfpba_mx b where a.yybdwmczzsptfpuuid = b.yybdwmczzsptfpuuid and a.yybdwmczzsptfpuuid = ? and b.zfbz_1 = 'N'
delete from fp_gptp_sqsp where lcslid=?

select yj.cyrq, yj.cyr_dm, yj.cyswjg_dm, yj.fpwzjl, yj.yjjsjly_dm, yj.lrr_dm, yj.lrrq, yj.sjgsdq, mx.fpzl_dm, mx.fp_dm, mx.fs, mx.fs as lgsl, mx.fpqshm, mx.fpzzhm, mx.kpje, mx.kpqsrq, mx.kpjzrq, mx.se, mx.fpkjqk_dm, zl.jldw_dm, fp.fpzg, fp.fpdmmc, fp.yspc, fp.mbfs, swry.swryxm from fp_yjjcyqk_mx mx, fp_yjjcyqk yj, dm_fp_fpzl zl, dm_fp_fp fp, dm_gy_swry swry where yj.fpcyuuid = mx.fpcyuuid and mx.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm and mx.fp_dm = fp.fp_dm and swry.swry_dm = yj.cyr_dm and mx.fpcyuuid = ? and mx.zfbz_1!='Y' order by yj.lrrq

select rygw.swrysf_dm,rygw.gwxh,jggw.gw_dm from qx_jggw_swrysf rygw, qx_swjg_gw jggw, qx_gw_xtgn gwxtgn where jggw.gwxh = rygw.gwxh and jggw.gw_dm = gwxtgn.gw_dm and rygw.yxbz ='Y' and jggw.yxbz ='Y' and gwxtgn.yxbz ='Y' and jggw.swjg_dm = ? and gwxtgn.xtgn_dm = ? UNION ALL select rygw.swrysf_dm,rygw.gwxh,jggw.gw_dm from qx_jggw_swrysf rygw, qx_swjg_gw jggw, qx_gw_gnj gwgnj,qx_gnj_xtgn gnjxtgn where jggw.gwxh = rygw.gwxh and jggw.gw_dm = gwgnj.gw_dm and gwgnj.gnj_dm = gnjxtgn.gnj_dm and rygw.yxbz ='Y' and jggw.yxbz ='Y' and gwgnj.yxbz ='Y' and gnjxtgn.yxbz ='Y' and jggw.swjg_dm = ? and gnjxtgn.xtgn_dm = ?

select mx.fpzl_dm, mx.fp_dm, mx.fpqshm, mx.fpzzhm from fp_jxsq_mx mx where mx.fpzl_dm=? and mx.fp_dm=? and to_number(mx.fpqshm)<=to_number(?) and to_number(mx.fpzzhm)>=to_number(?) and (mx.zfbz_1 != 'Y' or mx.zfbz_1 is null)

select distinct jc.fpzl_dm, zl.fpzlmc, zl.tkfs_dm, zl.tdhy_dm, zl.wzb_dm, zl.lc_dm, zl.jeb_dm, zl.fwskbz, zl.skbz, zl.fplb_dm, zl.zppz_dm, zl.defpbz, zl.jldw_dm, 'N' wtdkbz, zl.defpxebz from fp_nsrfpjc jc, dm_fp_fpzl zl where jc.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm and jc.djxh = ? and zl.yxbz = 'Y'
SELECT T.ZZSJYLB_DM, T.ZZSJYLBMC, T.ZSPM_DM, T.ZSPMMC, T.FLBZ FROM CS_FP_YGZJYLBYZSPMDZ T WHERE T.XYBZ = 'Y' AND T.YXBZ = 'Y'

select jc.nsrjcuuid, jc.djxh, jc.fpzl_dm, jc.fp_dm, jc.fs, jc.fpqshm, jc.fpzzhm, jc.fpzt_dm, jc.swjg_dm, jc.lrr_dm, jc.lrrq, jc.xgr_dm, jc.xgrq, jc.sjgsdq, jc.zgswskfj_dm from fp_nsrfpjc jc where jc.djxh = ? and jc.fpzl_dm in (#macroparam#) and jc.fpzt_dm = ?

select count(*) sl from fp_swjgkfkc_jc kc, dm_fp_fp fp, dm_fp_fpzl zl, fp_fpkf kf where kc.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm and kc.fpzl_dm = fp.fpzl_dm and zl.fpzl_dm = fp.fpzl_dm and kc.fp_dm = fp.fp_dm and zl.yxbz = 'Y' and fp.yxbz = 'Y' and kc.fpkf_dm = kf.fpkf_dm and (1= ? or kc.swjg_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or kc.fpkf_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or kc.lrrq > ?) and (1 = ? or kc.lrrq < ?) and kc.fpzt_dm = '20' order by kc.fpzl_dm, kc.fp_dm, kc.fpqshm

select a.zspm_dm, a.tddj_dm, c.tddjmc, b.dwse from cs_dj_tddjzspmdzb a, cs_dj_tddwseszb b, dm_dj_tddj c where a.tddj_dm = b.tddj_dm and b.tddj_dm = c.tddj_dm and a.swjg_dm = ? and a.zspm_dm = ? and b.xzqhsz_dm = ? and (b.jdxz_dm = ? or b.jdxz_dm is null) and b.yxqq < = to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and b.yxqz > = to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and b.yxqq < = b.yxqz and a.xybz = 'Y' and a.yxbz = 'Y' and b.xybz = 'Y' and b.yxbz = 'Y' and c.xybz = 'Y' and c.yxbz = 'Y'

select ly.fplyuuid as uuid, ly.lrrq as rq, ly.slswjg_dm as swjg_dm, jg.swjgmc, '3' as dylx_dm from fp_ly ly, dm_gy_swjg jg where ly.slswjg_dm = jg.swjg_dm and ly.djxh = ? and to_date(to_char(ly.lrrq, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') >= ? and to_date(to_char(ly.lrrq, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') <= ? order by ly.lrrq desc

select tj.lx, sum(kpje) kpje, sum(se) se, sum(fs) fs from ( with yjxx as (select qk.yjjsjly_dm, mx.cyfpmxuuid, mx.ywuuid, mx.fpyjjg_dm, mx.kpje, mx.se, mx.fs from fp_yjjcyqk qk, fp_yjjcyqk_mx mx, dm_fp_fpzl zl where qk.fpcyuuid = mx.fpcyuuid and mx.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm and qk.djxh = ? and zl.skbz = 'Y' and zl.zppz_dm = ? and mx.kpqsrq >= ? and mx.kpjzrq <= (?+1) and (mx.zfbz_1 <> 'Y' or mx.zfbz_1 is null)), skskjxx as (select distinct skj.skskjfpyjjuuid, skj.fpkjqk_dm, skj.fplx_dm, skj.fs, skj.je, skj.se from yjxx yj, fp_fpyjj_skskj skj where yj.ywuuid = skj.skskjfpyjjuuid and yj.yjjsjly_dm in ('13', '14')) select 'ZCLZFP' lx, nvl(sum(sks.je),0) kpje, nvl(sum(sks.fs),0) fs, nvl(sum(sks.se),0) se from skskjxx sks where sks.fpkjqk_dm = '10' and sks.fplx_dm = '01' union all select 'ZCHZFP' lx, nvl(sum(sks.je),0) kpje, nvl(sum(sks.fs),0) fs, nvl(sum(sks.se),0) se from skskjxx sks where sks.fpkjqk_dm = '10' and sks.fplx_dm = '02' union all select 'FZCLZFP' lx, nvl(sum(sks.je),0) kpje, nvl(sum(sks.fs),0) fs, nvl(sum(sks.se),0) se from skskjxx sks where sks.fpkjqk_dm = '21' and sks.fplx_dm = '01' union all select 'ZCLZFP' lx, nvl(sum(yj.kpje),0) kpje, nvl(sum(yj.fs),0) fs, nvl(sum(yj.se),0) from yjxx yj where yj.yjjsjly_dm not in ('13','14') and trim(yj.fpyjjg_dm) = '1' and yj.kpje >= 0 union all select 'ZCHZFP' lx, nvl(sum(yj.kpje),0) kpje, nvl(sum(yj.fs),0) fs, nvl(sum(yj.se),0) from yjxx yj where yj.yjjsjly_dm not in ('13','14') and trim(yj.fpyjjg_dm) = '1' and yj.kpje < 0 union all select 'FZCLZFP' lx, nvl(sum(yj.kpje),0) kpje, nvl(sum(yj.fs),0) fs, nvl(sum(yj.se),0) from yjxx yj where yj.yjjsjly_dm not in ('13','14') and trim(yj.fpyjjg_dm) = '2') tj group by tj.lx
SELECT JJGF.* FROM FP_JJGFJFPG JJGF, FP_SSSXDCB DCB WHERE JJGF.SSSXDCUUID = DCB.SSSXDCUUID #macroparam#
select b.* from fp_cglcj a, fp_cglcj_jzyfp b where a.fpcglcjuuid = b.fpcglcjuuid and a.fpcglcjuuid = ? and b.jzcgluuid = ? and b.fp_dm = ? and b.fphm = ?

select yj.cglcjfpyjuuid, yj.djxh, yj.fpzl_dm, yj.fp_dm, yj.fpqshm, yj.fpzzhm, yj.fs, yj.kpqsrq, yj.kpzzrq, yj.kpje, yj.se, yj.fpkjqk_dm, yj.swjg_dm, yj.sfyyj, yj.cglsjcjlx_dm, yj.zfbz_1, yj.bz, yj.lrr_dm, yj.lrrq, yj.xgr_dm, yj.xgrq, yj.sjgsdq, yj.fpcglcjuuid, yj.sjtb_sj from fp_cglcj_fpyj yj where 1 = 1 #macroparam# and (yj.zfbz_1 != 'Y' or yj.zfbz_1 is null) order by yj.cglcjfpyjuuid
delete from fp_tmp_yzfp

select zffs.pczfuuid, zffs.djxh, zffs.pccluuid, zffs.fpzl_dm, zffs.fp_dm, zffs.zffssl, zffs.dwsl_dm, zffs.fpqshm, zffs.fpzzhm, zffs.clbz, zffs.sjgsdq, zffs.lrrq, zffs.lrr_dm, zffs.xgr_dm, zffs.xgrq, zffs.sjtb_sj from fp_pcsyclqk_zffsjl zffs where 1=1 #macroparam#
SELECT ZSXM_DM, ZSPM_Dm, ZFSBZ, SFHBBZ FROM CS_FP_FPDKSFZPZB t WHERE t.zszsxm_dm = ? AND SUBSTR(t.zszspm_dm, 0, 7) = ? AND t.swjg_dm = ? AND Instr(t.zszspm_dm, '%') <> 0

select t.fpkf_dm, t.fpzl_dm, t.fp_dm, t.fpqshm, t.fpzzhm, '03' fphd_dm, '印制入库' fphdmc, kf.fpkfgtmc, zl.fpzlmc, t.fpkf_dm from fp_yzrkxx t,fp_fpkf kf,dm_fp_fpzl zl where t.yzrkuuid = ? and t.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm(+) and t.fpkf_dm = kf.fpkf_dm
delete fp_dcxczhb zhb where 1 = 1 #macroparam#

with yssqsj as (select mx.fpzl_dm fpzl, sum(mx.bs) bs from fp_wslp_mx mx where mx.wslpuuid = ? and mx.wslpsjmxzt_dm in ('01') and mx.zfbz_1 <> 'Y' group by fpzl_dm), sqsj as (select mx.fpzl_dm fpzl, sum(mx.bs) bs from fp_wslp_mx mx where mx.wslpuuid = ? and mx.wslpsjmxzt_dm in ('02') and mx.zfbz_1 <> 'Y' group by fpzl_dm) select ys.fpzl fpzl_dm, (case when ys.bs = sq.bs then 'XF' when ys.bs < sq.bs then 'X' else 'D' end) sfxf from yssqsj ys, sqsj sq where ys.fpzl = sq.fpzl(+)
SELECT DBSQCCUUID, DBSQUUID, GG, SL, DJ, JE, DBCCMC, LRR_DM, LRRQ, XGR_DM, XGRQ, SJGSDQ FROM FP_DBCCQD T WHERE T.DBSQUUID = ?

select a.yzybdwmcfpbauuid, a.djxh, a.swjg_dm, a.bazt, a.jbr, a.sbrq_1, a.fpzl_dm, a.gg_dm, a.bfs, a.mbfs, a.jeb_dm, a.lc_dm, a.zz_dm, a.wzb_dm, a.pjzdfs_dm, a.fpdmmc, a.bz, a.gmfplqfs_dm, a.ysswjg_dm, a.fpyzmc, a.fpme, a.lrr_dm, a.xgr_dm, a.sjgsdq, a.gg, a.zfbz_1, a.zfr_dm, b.yzjhuuid, c.jldw_dm from fp_yzybdwmcfpbaxx a, fp_yzjh b,dm_fp_fpzl c where a.yzybdwmcfpbauuid = b.jhbzuuid and a.fpzl_dm=c.fpzl_dm and a.zfbz_1 = 'N' and b.yxbz = 'Y' and b.syfpsl = b.hzfpsl and (1 = ? or a.lrr_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or a.lrrq >= ?) and (1 = ? or a.lrrq-1 <= ? )

delete from FP_YRZZZSKSPZQD_SQDKHYFP where HYFPUUID in (select HYFPUUID from FP_YRZZZSKSPZQD_HYFP where waqsbdkzzskspzdksqduuid = (select waqsbdkzzskspzdksqduuid from fp_waqsbdkzzskspzdksqd where lcslid = ?))

select distinct mx.fpzl_dm, mx.fpzl_dm, mx.fp_dm, mx.fpsl, mx.fpqshm, mx.fpzzhm, mx.lrr_dm, mx.lrrq, mx.sytggptpsl, mx.sycxlgptpsl from fp_ly ly, fp_ly_mx mx where ly.fplyuuid = mx.fplyuuid and ly.djxh = ? and mx.lrrq >= ? and mx.lrrq < (? +1)

select a.yzjhuuid, a.swjg_dm, a.sssqq, a.sssqz, a.fpjhfl_dm, a.fpzl_dm, b.fpzlmc, b.jldw_dm, a.hzfpsl, a.djxh, a.syfpsl, a.spswjg_dm, a.jhbzuuid, a.fpyzmc, d.nsrmc as ysdw1, b.lc_dm, b.jeb_dm, b.wzb_dm, a.swjg_dm as sbdw_dm, e.gmfplqfs_dm from fp_yzjh a, dm_fp_fpzl b,dj_nsrxx d,fp_yzybdwmcfpbaxx e where a.fpzl_dm = b.fpzl_dm(+) and a.djxh = d.djxh(+) and a.jhbzuuid=e.yzybdwmcfpbauuid(+) and a.syfpsl > 0 and (1 = ? or a.swjg_dm in (#macroparam#)) and a.yxbz = 'Y' and (1 = ? or a.fpjhfl_dm in (#macroparam#)) and (1 = ? or b.fpzlmc like '%'|| ? || '%') and (1 = ? or d.nsrsbh like '%'|| ? || '%' or d.shxydm like '%'|| ? || '%') and (1 = ? or b.fpzl_dm like '%'|| ? || '%') and (1 = ? or a.jzdw=?)

SELECT QD.LCSLID, QD.DCXCQDUUID, TO_CHAR(QDMXXX.DJXH) DJXH, QD.QDSWJG_DM, QD.QDR_DM, QD.QDTJ, QD.QDRQ, QD.LRR_DM, QD.LRRQ, QD.XGR_DM, QD.XGRQ, QD.SJGSDQ, QD.DCXCZHUUID, QD.ZHSWJG_DM, QD.LSRWBH, QD.QDPCH, qdmxxx.dcrwfkuuid FROM FP_DCXCQDB QD, (SELECT DISTINCT QDMX.DCXCQDUUID, QDMX.DJXH,qdmx.dcrwfkuuid FROM FP_DCXCQDB_MX QDMX) QDMXXX WHERE QD.DCXCQDUUID = QDMXXX.DCXCQDUUID #macroparam#
select mx.fpsl from fp_ly ly, fp_ly_mx mx where ly.fplyuuid = mx.fplyuuid and ly.djxh = ? and mx.fpzl_dm = ? and mx.lrrq >= ? and mx.lrrq <= ? order by mx.fpzl_dm, mx.fp_dm, mx.fpqshm
delete fp_tssjcj_snyrlyddzgjhb sny where 1=1 #macroparam#

select t.SWXZXKYQUUID, t.LCSLID, t.HDSLID, t.SQDBH, t.DJXH, t.SQYCTS, t.SQJDRQ, t.YQYY, t.QRYCTS, t.QRJDRQ, t.SWJG_DM, t.LRR_DM, t.LRRQ, t.XGR_DM, t.XGRQ, t.SJGSDQ, t.scjgscyj_dm, t.scjgscyjsm, t.scr_dm, t.scswjg_dm, t.scrq, t.sqrq, t.swxzxkxm_dm, t.zstybz, t.sqlcslid from FP_SWXZXK_YQ_SQSP t where t.lcslid = ?

SELECT T.HDQCUUID, T.DJXH, ZL.FPLB_DM, T.FPZL_DM, ZL.TDHY_DM, T.MYZGGPSL, T.MCZGGPSL, T.CPZGSL, T.YXQQ, T.YXQZ, T.YXBZ, T.SWJG_DM, T.FPGPFS_DM, T.DFFPZGKPXE_DM, T.DFFPZGKPXE, T.WTDKBZ, ZL.FPZLMC, ZL.TKFS_DM, ZL.SKBZ, ZL.DEFPBZ, ZL.ZPPZ_DM, T.WTDKBZ, ZL.JLDW_DM, ZL.JEB_DM, J.FPME, T.LRRQ AS hdrqxx, T.LXKPSX, T.LXKPLJXE, ZL.DEFPXEBZ, LB.FPLBMC, zl.fpzlbb_dm FROM FP_PZHDXX T, DM_FP_FPZL ZL, DM_GY_JEB J, DM_FP_FPLB LB WHERE T.FPZL_DM = ZL.FPZL_DM AND ZL.JEB_DM = J.JEB_DM AND ZL.FPLB_DM = LB.FPLB_DM AND T.DJXH = ? AND T.YXQQ <= ? AND T.YXQZ >= ? AND T.YXBZ = 'Y' ORDER BY T.FPZL_DM

select dhnsr.mxuuid, dhnsr.uuid, dhnsr.djxh, dhnsr.nsrsbh, dhnsr.zsxmcxbz_dm, dhnsr.nsrmc, dhnsr.qygm_dm, dhnsr.lrrq, dhnsr.sbms_dm, dhnsr.lrr_dm, dhnsr.xgrq, dhnsr.xgr_dm, dhnsr.sjgsdq from fp_tssjcj_dhnsr dhnsr,fp_tssjcj cj where dhnsr.uuid = cj.tssjcjuuid #macroparam#
select r.djxh, r.xydj, r.lprqq, r.lprqz, r.lpslsx from fp_ly_xydjlq r where r.djxh = ?

SELECT T.SWXZXKUUID, T.SWXZXKXM_DM, t.xkyxqq, t.xkyxqz, T.djxh, T.swjg_dm, T.swxzxkzt_dm, T.lrr_dm, T.xgr_dm, T.lrrq, T.xgrq, T.sjgsdq FROM FP_SWXZXK T WHERE T.SWXZXKZT_DM = '1' AND T.DJXH = ? and swxzxkxm_dm=?
select uuid, nsrsbh, djxh, nsrmc, swjg_dm from fp_swfpyzqywh where (1 = ? or nsrsbh=?) and (1 = ? or nsrmc=?) and (1 = ? or swjg_dm=?) and yxbz='Y'

select zb.djxh, zb.uuid, zb.spfdjxh, zb.jbr_dm, zb.sqrq, zb.slr_dm, zb.slrq, zb.slswjg_dm, zb.sjgsdq, zb.lrrq, zb.bz, zb.zt, zb.spfnsrsbh, zb.spfnsrmc, zb.jbr, zb.fzr, mx.mxuuid, mx.fp_dm, mx.fphm, mx.hwlwmc, mx.fyxm, mx.yshwxx, mx.dj, mx.sl, mx.je, mx.se, mx.bsrq, mx.nssbrq from fp_dszzszyfpybszm zb, fp_dszzszyfpybszm_mx mx where zb.uuid = mx.dsuuid and zb.zfbz_1 = 'N' and mx.zfbz_1 = 'N' and zb.djxh = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or mx.fp_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or mx.fphm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or mx.bsrq >= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or mx.bsrq <= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or zb.slrq >= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or zb.slrq <= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or mx.nssbrq >= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or mx.nssbrq <= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or zb.spfnsrsbh= ?)

select zb.pzhdxxuuid, zb.djxh, zb.ljgpje, zb.fpdbbz, zb.yxqq, zb.yxqz, zb.yxbz, zb.lrr_dm, zb.lrrq, zb.sjgsdq, zb.fpdblx_dm, zb.dbje, zb.sjbnsrbz from fp_pzhdxxzb zb where zb.djxh = ? and zb.yxqq <= ? and zb.yxqz >= ? and zb.yxbz = ?
delete fp_dcxcqdb_mx qdbmx where qdbmx.dcxcqduuid=? and qdbmx.djxh=?
delete fp_sssxdcmx dcmx where 1 = 1 #macroparam#
SELECT JC.FWYP_DM, SUM(JC.SL) JZSQRZKCFWYPSL FROM FP_NSRFWYPJC JC WHERE JC.DJXH = ? GROUP BY JC.FWYP_DM

select sny.mxuuid, sny.uuid, sny.nd, sny.scqynsrsbh, sny.scqymc, sny.syqynsrsbh, sny.syqymc, sny.snyjhgysl, sny.lrrq, sny.rlyjhgysl, sny.lrr_dm, sny.xgrq, sny.xgr_dm, sny.sjgsdq from fp_tssjcj_snyrlyddzgjhb sny,fp_tssjcj cj where sny.uuid = cj.tssjcjuuid #macroparam#
select b.* from fp_cglcj a, fp_cglcj_jdcfp b where a.fpcglcjuuid = b.fpcglcjuuid and a.fpcglcjuuid = ? and b.jdccgluuid = ? and b.fp_dm = ? and b.fphm = ?

select y.djxh, n.nsrsbh, n.nsrmc from fp_yjjcyqk_mx ym, fp_yjjcyqk y, dj_nsrxx n where ym.fpcyuuid = y.fpcyuuid and y.djxh = n.djxh and ym.fpzl_dm = ? and ym.fp_dm = ? and ym.fpqshm <= ? and ym.fpzzhm >= ? #macroparam# and ym.zfbz_1 != 'Y' union select j.djxh, n.nsrsbh, n.nsrmc from fp_nsrfpjc j, dj_nsrxx n where j.djxh = n.djxh and j.fpzt_dm in (12,20,21) and j.fpzl_dm = ? and j.fp_dm = ? and j.fpqshm <= ? and j.fpzzhm >= ? #macroparam#

select cy.djxh, cymx.fpzl_dm, cymx.fp_dm, cymx.fs, cymx.fpqshm, cymx.fpzzhm, cymx.lrrq, cymx.kpqsrq, cymx.kpjzrq, cymx.kpje, fp.phcd, cymx.cyfpmxuuid, cymx.fpyjjg_dm, cymx.zfbz_1 from fp_yjjcyqk cy, fp_yjjcyqk_mx cymx, dm_fp_fp fp where cy.fpcyuuid = cymx.fpcyuuid and cymx.fpzl_dm = fp.fpzl_dm and cymx.fp_dm = fp.fp_dm and (1 = #macroparam# or cy.djxh = ?) and cymx.fpzl_dm = ? and cymx.fp_dm = ? and to_number(cymx.fpqshm) <= ? and to_number(cymx.fpzzhm) >= ? and cymx.zgswskfj_dm like ? and cy.zgswskfj_dm like ?

select CYFPSQSPUUID, DJXH, LCSLID, HDSLID, FPBMYXM, FPJYYXM, FPBGYXM, FPYWYXM, FPPBYXM, CYYCMC, CYBZMC, CYSCTJ, SCJGSCYJ_DM, SCJGSCYJSM, SCR_DM, SCSWJG_DM, SCRQ, XKYXQQ, XKYXQZ, LRR_DM, LRRQ, XGR_DM, XGRQ, SJGSDQ, NSRMC from fp_swxzxk_cyfpxx_sqsp cy where cy.lcslid = ?

SELECT T.ZFRQ_1, T.ZFR_DM, T.ZFBZ_1, T.GLDKSQUUID, T.SJGSDQ, T.XGRQ, T.XGR_DM, T.LRRQ, T.LRR_DM, T.JMSPJGUUID, T.ZSZSZM_DM, T.ZSZSPM_DM, T.ZSZSXM_DM, T.YBSFE, T.JMSFE, T.YJSFE, T.YNSFE, T.SSKCS, T.SFL, T.JSFYJ, T.YXKCJE, T.SRZE, T.ZSZM_DM, T.ZSPM_DM, T.ZSXM_DM, T.SKSSQZ, T.SKSSQQ, T.DKFPLB_DM, T.DKSQUUID, T.SFMXUUID, T.HY_DM, T.NSQNYJSE, T.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, T.ZJSRSFFT, T.QXQ, T.QXZ, T.BZ, T.SFZCZF, T.SSJMXZ_DM, T.SSJMXZMC FROM FP_DK_SFMX T WHERE GLDKSQUUID = ?

select qd.lcslid, qd.dcxcqduuid, to_char(qdmxxx.djxh) djxh, qd.qdswjg_dm, qd.qdr_dm, qd.qdtj, qd.qdrq, qd.lrr_dm, qd.lrrq, qd.xgr_dm, qd.xgrq, qd.sjgsdq, qd.dcxczhuuid, qd.zhswjg_dm, qd.lsrwbh from fp_dcxcqdb qd, (select distinct qdmx.dcxcqduuid, qdmx.djxh from fp_dcxcqdb_mx qdmx) qdmxxx where qd.dcxcqduuid = qdmxxx.dcxcqduuid and qd.dcxcqduuid = ? and qdmxxx.djxh = ?
select yj.fpzl_dm, yj.fpyjbs from fp_kfyjxx yj, fp_pzhdxx hd where hd.fpzl_dm = yj.fpzl_dm and hd.djxh = ? and yj.fpkf_dm = ?
select t.dcxm_dm as code, t.dcxmmc as caption,t.dcsx_dm as pcode from dm_zh_dcxm t where t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.xybz = 'Y' and dcsx_dm in (#macroparam#)

SELECT N.Fpzl_Dm, Z.fpzlmc, N.Fp_Dm, D.FPDMMC, N.Fpqshm, N.Fpzzhm, N.Fpzt_Dm FROM FP_NSRFPJC N, DM_FP_FPZL Z, DM_FP_FP D WHERE N.FPZL_DM = Z.FPZL_DM AND N.FP_DM = D.FP_DM AND N.DJXH = ? AND TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(N.LRRQ, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') >= ? AND TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(N.LRRQ, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') <= ? AND (1 = ? or Z.ZPPZ_DM IN (#macroparam#)) ORDER BY N.fpzl_dm,N.fp_dm DESC
select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg t where t.yxbz = 'Y' Start with t.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior t.sjswjg_dm = t.swjg_dm order by swjg_dm desc
SELECT BDSWXZXKXMMXUUID, BDSWXZXKUUID, SWXZXKUUID, SWXZXKXM_DM, YY, FPCLQK, XQGZQX, SFGZ, QTYY, HCRQ, ZZQX, FYSWJG_DM FROM FP_SWXZXK_BDQK_XMMX WHERE BDSWXZXKUUID = ?

select t.fpzl_dm, zl.fpzlmc, t.fp_dm, zl.jldw_dm as dwsl_dm, 0 as sqjcsl, 0 as sqjcje, sum(t.bqsdsl) bqsdsl, sum(t.bqsdje) bqsdje, sum(t.bqfssl) bqfssl, sum(t.bqfsje) bqfsje, sum(t.bqfcsl) bqfcsl, sum(t.bqfcje) bqfcje, sum(t.bqhxsl) bqhxsl, sum(t.bqhxje) bqhxje, sum(t.bqtpsl) bqtpsl, sum(t.bqtpje) bqtpje, sum(t.bqgssl) bqgssl, sum(t.bqgsje) bqgsje, sum(t.bqdksl) bqdksl, sum(t.bqdkje) bqdkje, 0 as bqjcsl, 0 as bqjcje, Case When sum(t.sqjcsl) + sum(t.bqsdsl) - sum(t.bqfssl) - sum(t.bqfcsl) - sum(t.bqhxsl) + sum(t.bqtpsl) - sum(t.bqdksl) - sum(t.bqgssl) - sum(t.bqjcsl) = 0 Then 'Y' Else 'N' End As sfph from fp_sfcqkbg z, fp_sfcqkbg_mx t, dm_fp_fpzl zl where z.sfcuuid = t.sfcuuid and t.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm and t.fpkf_dm in (#macroparam#) and z.sssqq >= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and z.sssqz <= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and (z.zfbz_1 is null or z.zfbz_1 = 'N') Group by t.fpzl_dm, zl.fpzlmc, t.fp_dm, zl.jldw_dm

select a.nsrmc ysdw_1, c.fpzlmc, b.fpzl_dm, b.fp_dm, d.fpdmmc, c.jldw_dm, d.gg_dm, c.jeb_dm, c.wzb_dm, c.lc_dm, d.nd, d.yspc, d.zz_dm, d.mxbfs, d.mbfs, d.fpjj, d.fpxj, b.sl, b.dj, b.je, b.fs, b.fpqshm, b.fpzzhm, b.djxh, b.syfpsl, b.gmfplqfs_dm, b.yzfpmxuuid, d.phcd from fp_yzjhfp_mx b, dj_nsrxx a, dm_fp_fpzl c, dm_fp_fp d where b.djxh = a.djxh(+) and b.fpzl_dm = c.fpzl_dm and b.fp_dm = d.fp_dm and b.syfpsl > 0 and b.yzfpuuid = ?
select * from fp_dk_sq where gsdksquuid=? and zfbz_1='N'

select zl.fpzl_dm, zl.fpzlmc, zl.tkfs_dm, zl.tdhy_dm, zl.wzb_dm, zl.lc_dm, zl.jeb_dm, zl.fwskbz, zl.skbz, zl.fplb_dm, zl.zppz_dm, zl.defpbz, zl.jldw_dm, jeb.fpme, zl.defpxebz from dm_fp_fpzl zl, dm_gy_jeb jeb where zl.jeb_dm = jeb.jeb_dm and zl.fpzl_dm in (#macroparam#) order by zl.fpzl_dm
select count(zmmx.fphm) fphmjs from fp_dszzszyfpybszm zm, fp_dszzszyfpybszm_mx zmmx where zm.uuid = zmmx.dsuuid and zm.zfbz_1 = 'N' and zmmx.zfbz_1 = 'N' #macroparam#
select 1 from fp_nsrfpjc j where j.fpzt_dm in (12,20,21) and j.fpzl_dm = ? and j.fp_dm = ? and to_number(j.fpqshm) <= to_number(?) and to_number(j.fpzzhm) >= to_number(?) and j.djxh = ?
select * from fp_yrzzzskspzqd_hyfpdkxx where hyfpuuid = ?

select kc.kfkcuuid, kc.fpzl_dm, zl.fpzlmc, kc.fp_dm, fp.fpdmmc, kc.fpkf_dm, kc.xs, kc.bs, (to_number(kc.fpzzhm) - to_number(kc.fpqshm) + 1) kcfs, kc.fpqshm, kc.fpzzhm, kc.xqshm, kc.xzzhm, kc.fpzt_dm, kc.swjg_dm, kc.sjgsdq, kc.lrr_dm, kc.xgr_dm, fp.phcd, fp.fpjj, fp.fpxj, fp.mbfs, kc.fpkf_dm from fp_swjgkfkc kc, fp_kfgly ry, fp_fpkf kf,dm_fp_fpzl zl, dm_fp_fp fp where ry.fpkf_dm = kc.fpkf_dm and zl.fpzl_dm = kc.fpzl_dm and fp.fp_dm = kc.fp_dm and kf.fpkf_dm = kc.fpkf_dm and kc.fpzt_dm='20' and kf.kflx_dm = '3' and ry.yxbz='Y' and kf.yxbz='Y' and ry.kfgly_dm = ? and (1 = ? or kc.fpzl_dm in (#macroparam#)) order by kc.fpzl_dm, kc.fp_dm, kc.fpqshm
select lx.cglcjlx_dm, lx.cglcjlxmc, lx.xybz, lx.yxbz from dm_fp_cglcjlx lx order by lx.cglcjlx_dm

select jzy.jzcgluuid, jzy.djxh, jzy.gcxmbh, jzy.gcxmmc, jzy.wspzhm, jzy.jsxm, jzy.fp_dm, jzy.fphm, jzy.kprq, jzy.fkfsfsbh, jzy.fkfmc, jzy.skfsfsbh, jzy.skfmc, jzy.je, jzy.fpkjqk_dm, jzy.cglcjfpyjuuid, jzy.sjgsdq, jzy.lrr_dm, jzy.lrrq, jzy.xgr_dm, jzy.xgrq, jzy.fpzl_dm from fp_cglcj_jzyfp jzy where jzy.fpzl_dm = ? and jzy.fp_dm = ? and jzy.fphm = ? and (jzy.zfbz_1 != 'Y' or jzy.zfbz_1 is null)
select a.fpzl_dm, a.swjg_dm from fp_fpjh_fpzlspsz a where (1 = ? or a.swjg_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or a.fpzl_dm = ?)
delete fp_tssjcj_tbnsjkglkhtjb tbns where 1=1 #macroparam#
select fp.fp_dm code, fp.fpdmmc caption from dm_fp_fp fp, dm_fp_fpzl fpzl where fp.fpzl_dm = fpzl.fpzl_dm and fpzl.fpzl_dm = ? order by fp.fp_dm

select XZXKUUID, DJXH, SQRLX_DM, SQDBH, DLRMC, DLRSFZJHM_1, WTDLRZZ, DLRLXDH, DLRSFZJZL_DM_1, LRR_DM, LRRQ, XGR_DM, XGRQ, SJGSDQ, LXDH, DZ, YZBM, LCSLID, BJJZRQ, SWXZXKXM_DM, SLSWJG_DM, SLR_DM, SLRQ, BLZT_DM, QRJDRQ from fp_swxzxk_sqxx t where t.sqdbh = ? and t.blzt_dm <> '3'

SELECT ZHBMX.DCXCZHMXUUID, ZHBMX.LSRWBH, ZHBMX.DCXM_DM, ZHBMX.DCSX_DM, ZHBMX.NSRTBNRJH, ZHBMX.LRR_DM, ZHBMX.LRRQ, ZHBMX.XGR_DM, ZHBMX.XGRQ, ZHBMX.SJGSDQ, ZHBMX.DCXCZHUUID, SX.DCSXMC, XM.DCXMMC, (SELECT DCSX.DCSXMC FROM DM_ZH_DCSX DCSX WHERE DCSX.DCSX_DM = SX.SJDCSX_DM AND DCSX.YXBZ = 'Y') SJDCSX_DM FROM FP_DCXCZHB_MX ZHBMX, DM_ZH_DCSX SX, DM_ZH_DCXM XM WHERE ZHBMX.DCSX_DM = SX.DCSX_DM AND ZHBMX.DCXM_DM = XM.DCXM_DM #macroparam#

select jc.nsrjcuuid, jc.djxh, jc.fpzl_dm, jc.fp_dm, jc.fs, jc.fpqshm, jc.fpzzhm, jc.fpzt_dm, jc.swjg_dm, jc.lrr_dm, jc.lrrq, jc.xgr_dm, jc.xgrq, jc.sjgsdq, jc.zgswskfj_dm from fp_nsrfpjc jc where (1 = #macroparam# or jc.djxh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or jc.fpzl_dm in (#macroparam#)) and (1 = #macroparam# or jc.fp_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or jc.fpqshm <= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or jc.fpzzhm >= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or jc.fpzt_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or rownum <= ?)

select b.*,c.hwlwmc from fp_cglcj a, fp_cglcj_ty b,fp_cglcj_ty_mx c where a.fpcglcjuuid = b.fpcglcjuuid and b.tycgluuid = c.tycgluuid and a.fpcglcjuuid = ? and b.tycgluuid = ? and b.fp_dm = ? and b.fphm = ?

select mx.cyfpmxuuid, mx.ywuuid, mx.fpzl_dm, mx.fp_dm, mx.fs, mx.fpqshm, mx.fpzzhm, mx.fpkjqk_dm, mx.kpqsrq, mx.kpjzrq, mx.kpje, mx.se, mx.fpyjjg_dm, cy.yjjsjly_dm, mx.lrr_dm, zl.fplb_dm, zl.tdhy_dm from fp_yjjcyqk cy, fp_yjjcyqk_mx mx, dm_fp_fpzl zl where cy.fpcyuuid = mx.fpcyuuid and zl.fpzl_dm = mx.fpzl_dm and cy.djxh = ? and (1=#macroparam# or mx.kpqsrq >= ?) and (1=#macroparam# or mx.kpjzrq < (?+1)) and (1=#macroparam# or mx.fpyjjg_dm = ?) and (1=#macroparam# or zl.fplb_dm in (#macroparam#)) and (1=#macroparam# or zl.tdhy_dm in (#macroparam#)) and mx.zfbz_1 = 'N'
select * from fp_fpkf where ssswjg_dm in (#macroparam#) and yxbz='Y'
select * from dm_gy_xzqh t where xzqhjc < 3 start with t.xzqhsz_dm = ? connect by prior t.sjxzqhsz_dm = t.xzqhsz_dm

SELECT T.UUID, T.NSRSBH, T.SWRY_DM, T.DJXH, T.SWJG_DM, T.XYBZ, T.LRRQ, T.LRR_DM, T.XGR_DM, T.XGRQ, T.SJGSDQ FROM FP_DKFP_TDZSBM T WHERE (1=#macroparam# or T.DJXH=?) AND (1=#macroparam# or T.SWRY_DM=?) AND (1=#macroparam# or T.SWJG_DM=?) AND T.XYBZ = 'Y'

select b.yzfpmxuuid, b.yzfpmxuuid, b.yzrkuuid, b.rkr_dm, b.rkrq, b.ysdw_1, b.cycsmc, b.wszg, b.fpzl_dm, b.fp_dm, b.xs, b.dj, b.xsje, b.fs, b.fpqshm, b.fpzzhm, b.djxh, b.gmfplqfs_dm, b.bfjs, b.fpkf_dm, b.xs, b.xqshm, b.xzzhm, b.lrrq, b.lrr_dm, b.zfbz_1 from fp_yzrkxx b where (1 = ? or b.fp_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or to_number(b.fpqshm) <= to_number(?)) and (1 = ? or to_number(b.fpzzhm) >= to_number(?)) and (1 = ? or b.zfbz_1 = ?)
select sqspuuid, lcslid, djxh, hdslid, sqrxm, ljgpje, sqrq, slr_dm, slrq, swjg_dm, hzr_dm, hzrq, hzswjg_dm, sjgsdq, fpdbbz, fpdblx_dm, dbje, zsbz, spyj, sjbnsrbz from fp_pzhdsqsp where lcslid = ?

SELECT SQ.DKSQJE, MX.DKFPLB_DM, MX.ZSXM_DM, MX.ZSPM_DM, MX.ZSZM_DM, MX.SKSSQQ, MX.SKSSQZ, MX.SRZE, MX.YXKCJE, MX.JSFYJ, MX.SFL, MX.SSKCS, MX.YNSFE, MX.YJSFE, MX.JMSFE, MX.YBSFE, MX.HY_DM, MX.ZSZSXM_DM, MX.ZSZSPM_DM, MX.ZSZSZM_DM, MX.JMSPJGUUID, MX.GLDKSQUUID, MX.ZFBZ_1, MX.ZFR_DM, MX.ZFRQ_1, MX.LRR_DM, MX.LRRQ, MX.XGR_DM, MX.XGRQ, MX.SJGSDQ, MX.JYXM_DM, MX.NSQNYJSE, MX.LZSFMXUUID, MX.SJTB_SJ, MX.TDDJ_DM, MX.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, MX.ZJSRSFFT, MX.QXQ, MX.QXZ, MX.BZ, MX.SFZCZF, MX.DKSQUUID, MX.SFMXUUID FROM FP_DK_SQ SQ, FP_DK_SFMX MX WHERE SQ.DKSQUUID = MX.DKSQUUID AND MX.ZSXM_DM = '10101' AND MX.GLDKSQUUID IS NULL AND SQ.GSDKSQUUID IS NULL AND SQ.DJXH = ? AND SQ.SQRQ >= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND SQ.SQRQ < TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1 AND SQ.DKFPLB_DM = '09' AND SQ.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND SQ.KJBZ = 'Y'
SELECT DISTINCT XM.DCXM_DM CODE, XM.DCXMMC CAPTION, XM.DCSX_DM PCODE,t.dcrwfkuuid key5 FROM FP_DCXCQDB_MX T, DM_ZH_DCXM XM WHERE T.DCXM_DM = XM.DCXM_DM #macroparam#

select nsr.nsrsbh, nsr.nsrmc, lx.cglcjlx_dm as cglsjcjlxDm, lx.cglcjlxmc, cj.lrrq, swry.swryxm, cj.fpcglcjuuid from fp_cglcj cj, dj_nsrxx nsr, dm_fp_cglcjlx lx, dm_gy_swry swry where swry.swry_dm = cj.lrr_dm and cj.djxh = nsr.djxh and cj.cglsjcjlx_dm = lx.cglcjlx_dm and cj.zfbz_1 = 'N' and cj.djxh = ? and trim(cj.cglsjcjlx_dm) = ? and to_date(to_char(cj.lrrq, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') >= ? and to_date(to_char(cj.lrrq, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') <= ?

SELECT YBSFE, DKSQJE, HY_DM, XZQHSZ_DM, ZGSWSKFJ_DM, JDXZ_DM, SQDHM, XGRQ, XGR_DM, LRRQ, LRR_DM, SJGSDQ, PZXH, KJBZ, ZRRBZ, ZFR_DM, ZFRQ_1, ZFBZ_1, SLSWJG_DM, SLRQ, SLR_DM, SQRQ, SQRXM, KPJE, LCSLID, DKFPLB_DM, DJXH, DKSQUUID, JMSBZ, JMSLX_DM, JMYY, KPLX_DM, ZSBZ, FPLX_DM, FYBH FROM FP_DK_SQ WHERE ZFBZ_1 = 'N'

select a.fpzl_dm, a.fp_dm, a.fphm fpqshm, a.fpzl_dm, a.fphm fpzzhm, '81' fphd_dm, '发票代开开具' fphdmc, kf.fpkf_dm, kf.fpkfgtmc, fpzlmc from fp_dk_fpkjxx a, fp_fpkf kf,dm_fp_fpzl zl where a.fp_dm = ? and a.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm(+) and a.fphm = ? and a.fpkf_dm = kf.fpkf_dm
select * from GY_LCFLZL a where a.lcslid = ? and a.lcswsx_dm = ?

select x.SWXZXKUUID, x.SWXZXKXM_DM, x.xkyxqq, x.xkyxqz, x.djxh, x.swjg_dm, x.swxzxkzt_dm, x.lrr_dm, x.xgr_dm, x.lrrq, x.xgrq, x.sjgsdq from FP_SWXZXK x where x.lrrq = ( SELECT max(t.lrrq) FROM FP_SWXZXK T WHERE T.SWXZXKZT_DM = '1' AND T.DJXH = ? and swxzxkxm_dm = ? and t.xkyxqq<sysdate and t.xkyxqz>sysdate)

SELECT DBSQUUID, DJXH, FPDBLX_DM, DBJE, FPDBRSFZJZL_DM, FPDBRSFZJHM, FPDBRMC, FPDBRDJZCLX_DM, FPDBRLXDH, FPDBRZCDZ, DBCCZMFS, DBCCQDFS, SQRXM, SQRQ, SLR_DM, SLRQ, SLSWJG_DM, WSSYYJ_DM, SHR_DM, SHRQ, SHSWJG_DM, DBJCSQUUID, DBJCBZ, DBRDBJEHJ, SWDBGZJSJBH, LRR_DM, LRRQ, XGR_DM, XGRQ, SJGSDQ, LCSLID FROM FP_DBSQ T WHERE T.DJXH = ? AND T.WSSYYJ_DM = ? AND T.DBJCSQUUID IS NULL
SELECT ZSXM_DM, ZSPM_Dm, ZFSBZ, SFHBBZ FROM CS_FP_FPDKSFZPZB t WHERE t.zszsxm_dm = ? AND SUBSTR(t.zszspm_dm, 0, 6) = ? AND t.swjg_dm = ? AND Instr(t.zszspm_dm, '%') <> 0

select a.kfdbuuid, a.lcuuid, a.sqsx_dm, (select b.fpkfgtmc from fp_fpkf b where b.fpkf_dm = a.fpckkf_dm) fpckdwmc, a.fpckkf_dm, (select d.fpkfgtmc from fp_fpkf d where d.fpkf_dm = a.fprkkf_dm) fprkdwmc, a.fprkkf_dm, a.sqdw_dm, a.sqsxsm, a.ckfswry_dm, a.sqrxm, a.fpdbzt_dm, a.sqrq, a.lrr_dm, a.zfbz_1 from fp_kfdbsq a where a.lcuuid = ?

select jx.slrq, jx.sqrxm, mx.fpzl_dm, mx.fp_dm, mx.fpqshm, mx.fpzzhm, mx.jxdx_dm, mx.fpsl as fs, mx.fpsl as lgsl, mx.je, mx.fpjxlx_dm, zl.jldw_dm, fp.fpzg, fp.yspc, fp.fpdmmc, swry.swryxm from fp_jxsq_mx mx, fp_jxsq jx, dm_fp_fpzl zl, dm_fp_fp fp, dm_gy_swry swry where jx.jxsquuid = mx.jxsquuid and mx.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm and mx.fp_dm = fp.fp_dm and swry.swry_dm = jx.lrr_dm and mx.jxsquuid= ? and (mx.zfbz_1 != 'Y' or mx.zfbz_1 is null) order by jx.slrq
select * from fp_yqzzskspzdksqd_hyfp where fp_dm = ? and fphm = ?

select zcq.mxuuid, zcq.uuid, zcq.djxh, zcq.nsrsbh, zcq.jntzqymc, zcq.gjhdqsz_dm, zcq.jwqymc, zcq.ztze, zcq.zfgfzb, zcq.zftze, zcq.pznf, zcq.zgswjg_dm, zcq.lrrq, zcq.lrr_dm, zcq.xgr_dm, zcq.xgrq, zcq.sjgsdq from fp_tssjcj_zcqqyxxcjb zcq,fp_tssjcj cj where zcq.uuid = cj.tssjcjuuid #macroparam#
delete from fp_fpjhbz_ptfpmx a where a.jhbzuuid = ? and a.zsbz != 'Y'

select a.fpzl_dm, a.fp_dm, a.nd, a.yspc, a.fphy_dm, a.zz_dm, a.phcd, a.fpjj, a.fpxj, a.dkj, a.fpzg, a.xybz, a.yxbz, a.mxbfs, a.fpzlxl, a.pjzdfs_dm, a.fpxzqh_dm, a.gg_dm, a.djbz, a.fpdmmc, a.gdsbz, case a.gg_dm when '29900' then nvl(a.gg,c.ggmc) else nvl(a.gg,c.ggmc) end gg, a.jldw_dm, a.mbfs, a.fpme, a.djxh, b.nsrmc, b.nsrsbh, a.fpsx_dm from dm_fp_fp a,dj_nsrxx b,dm_fp_gg c where a.djxh=b.djxh(+) and a.gg_dm=c.gg_dm(+) and a.yxbz = 'Y' and a.xybz = 'Y' and a.gdsbz in ('0', ?) and a.fpzl_dm = ? order by a.fp_dm asc
select * from fp_swxzxk t where t.lcslid = ? and t.swxzxkzt_dm = '1'

select t.swxzxkuuid, t.djxh, t.xkyxqq, t.swxzxkxm_dm, t.xkyxqz, t.swjg_dm, t.swxzxkzt_dm from fp_swxzxk t where t.djxh = ? and t.swxzxkxm_dm = ? and t.swxzxkzt_dm = '1' and ((to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') >= t.xkyxqq and to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') <= t.xkyxqz) or (to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') >= t.xkyxqq and to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') <= t.xkyxqz) or (to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') <= t.xkyxqq and to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') >= t.xkyxqz))

select distinct zl.fpzlmc, kc.fpzl_dm, fp.jldw_dm, fp.mbfs, kc.fp_dm, fp.fpdmmc, kc.bs, kc.fpqshm, kc.fpzzhm, fp.fpzg, fp.fpxj, kc.fpzt_dm, zl.jeb_dm, zl.tkfs_dm, zl.fplb_dm, zl.tdhy_dm, zl.skbz, fp.fpjj, fp.phcd, fp.fpme, fp.yspc, kc.fpkf_dm from fp_swjgkfkc kc, dm_fp_fpzl zl, dm_fp_fp fp where kc.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm and kc.fpzl_dm = fp.fpzl_dm and zl.fpzl_dm = fp.fpzl_dm and fp.fp_dm = kc.fp_dm and kc.fpkf_dm = ? and kc.fpzt_dm = ? and fp.yxbz = 'Y' order by kc.fpzl_dm,kc.fp_dm,kc.fpqshm
delete fp_sssxdcb dcb where 1 = 1 #macroparam#
delete fp_tssjcj_zcqqyxxcjb_mx zcqmx where 1=1 #macroparam#
SELECT DISTINCT SX.DCSX_DM CODE, SX.DCSXMC CAPTION, SX.SJDCSX_DM PCODE,t.dcrwfkuuid key5 FROM FP_DCXCQDB_MX T, DM_ZH_DCSX SX WHERE T.DCSX_DM = SX.DCSX_DM #macroparam#

select a.fphxuuid, a.lcslid, a.sqswjg_dm, a.hxyy, a.fpszkfgt_dm, a.sqr_dm, a.sqrxm, a.sqrq, b.fpkfgtmc, a.lrr_dm from fp_swjgfphx_jgb a, fp_fpkf b where a.fpszkfgt_dm = b.fpkf_dm and (1 = ? or a.fphxuuid = ?) and (1 = ? or a.lcslid = ?)

select a.fpzl_dm, a.fp_dm, a.fpqshm, a.fpzzhm, '12' fphd_dm, kf.fpkf_dm, kf.fpkfgtmc, '调拨出库撤销' fphdmc, zl.fpzlmc, a.fpzl_dm from fp_dbckd_mx a, fp_dbckd b, fp_kfdbsq c, fp_fpkf kf, dm_fp_fpzl zl where b.KFDBUUID = c.kfdbuuid and c.zfbz_1 = 'Y' and a.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm(+) and b.dbckuuid = a.dbckuuid and b.fpckkf_dm = kf.fpkf_dm and b.kfdbuuid = ?
delete fp_dcxcqdb_mx qdbmx where qdbmx.dcxcqduuid in (select qdb.dcxcqduuid from fp_dcxcqdb qdb where qdb.qdpch = ?)

select ws.wslpuuid, ws.ywslxh, ws.djxh, ws.nsrsbh, ws.gprxm, ws.sfzjzl_dm, ws.sfzjhm, ws.wslpywzt_dm, ws.wslpqrfs_dm, ws.shbtgyy, ws.zgswskfj_dm, ws.slcs, ws.lxdh, ws.yjyjsdsj, ws.sycxltpje, ws.sytgtpje, ws.dz, ws.bz, ws.version from fp_wslp ws where (1 = #macroparam# or ws.djxh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or ws.ywslxh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or ws.wslpuuid = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or ws.wslpywzt_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or ws.lrrq >= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or ws.lrrq < ?+1) order by ws.lrrq

SELECT N.Fpzl_Dm, Z.fpzlmc, N.Fp_Dm, D.FPDMMC, N.Fpqshm, N.Fpzzhm, N.Fpzt_Dm FROM FP_NSRFPJC N, DM_FP_FPZL Z, DM_FP_FP D WHERE N.FPZL_DM = Z.FPZL_DM AND N.FP_DM = D.FP_DM AND N.DJXH = ? AND TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(N.LRRQ, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') > = ? AND TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(N.LRRQ, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') < = ? AND FPLB_DM = ? ORDER BY N.fpzl_dm, N.fp_dm DESC
delete from fp_fwyphxsq where lcslid = ?
select m.fpzl_dm, m.fp_dm, m.fphm from fp_yjfpdjsq_mx m, fp_yjfpdjsq y where m.djsquuid = y.djsquuid and m.fpzl_dm = ? and m.fp_dm = ? and m.fphm = ? and y.zfbz_1 != 'Y'

select kc.kfkcuuid, kc.fpzl_dm, zl.fpzlmc, kc.fp_dm, fp.fpdmmc, kc.fpkf_dm, kc.xs, kc.bs, (to_number(kc.fpzzhm) - to_number(kc.fpqshm) + 1) kcfs, kc.fpqshm, kc.fpzzhm, kc.xqshm, kc.xzzhm, '99' fpzt_dm, kc.swjg_dm, kc.sjgsdq, kc.lrr_dm, kc.xgr_dm, fp.phcd, fp.fpjj, fp.fpxj, fp.mbfs, fp.mxbfs, zl.jldw_dm from fp_swjgkfkc_pc kc, dm_fp_fpzl zl, dm_fp_fp fp where kc.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm and kc.fpkf_dm = ? and kc.lcslid = ? and kc.fp_dm = fp.fp_dm and exists (select 1 from fp_dbckd a,fp_dbckd_mx b where a.fpckkf_dm = kc.fpkf_dm and a.dbckuuid = b.dbckuuid and b.fpqshm = kc.fpqshm and b.fpzzhm = kc.fpzzhm and b.fp_dm = kc.fp_dm and a.hzfpdbckdbz = 'N') and kc.fpzt_dm = '21' union select kc.kfkcuuid, kc.fpzl_dm, zl.fpzlmc, kc.fp_dm, fp.fpdmmc, kc.fpkf_dm, kc.xs, kc.bs, (to_number(kc.fpzzhm) - to_number(kc.fpqshm) + 1) kcfs, kc.fpqshm, kc.fpzzhm, kc.xqshm, kc.xzzhm, '98' fpzt_dm, kc.swjg_dm, kc.sjgsdq, kc.lrr_dm, kc.xgr_dm, fp.phcd, fp.fpjj, fp.fpxj, fp.mbfs, fp.mxbfs, zl.jldw_dm from fp_swjgkfkc_pc kc, dm_fp_fpzl zl, dm_fp_fp fp where kc.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm and kc.fp_dm = fp.fp_dm and exists (select 1 from fp_dbckd a,fp_dbckd_mx b where a.fpckkf_dm = kc.fpkf_dm and a.dbckuuid = b.dbckuuid and b.fpqshm = kc.fpqshm and b.fpzzhm = kc.fpzzhm and b.fp_dm = kc.fp_dm and a.fprkkf_dm = ? and a.hzfpdbckdbz = 'N') and kc.fpzt_dm = '21' and kc.lcslid = ? union select kc.kfkcuuid, kc.fpzl_dm, zl.fpzlmc, kc.fp_dm, fp.fpdmmc, kc.fpkf_dm, kc.xs, kc.bs, (to_number(kc.fpzzhm) - to_number(kc.fpqshm) + 1) kcfs, kc.fpqshm, kc.fpzzhm, kc.xqshm, kc.xzzhm, kc.fpzt_dm, kc.swjg_dm, kc.sjgsdq, kc.lrr_dm, kc.xgr_dm, fp.phcd, fp.fpjj, fp.fpxj, fp.mbfs, fp.mxbfs, zl.jldw_dm from fp_swjgkfkc_pc kc, dm_fp_fpzl zl, dm_fp_fp fp where kc.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm and kc.fp_dm = fp.fp_dm and kc.fpkf_dm = ? and kc.lcslid = ? and kc.fpzt_dm != '20' and not exists (select 1 from fp_dbckd a,fp_dbckd_mx b where a.fpckkf_dm = kc.fpkf_dm and a.dbckuuid = b.dbckuuid and b.fpqshm = kc.fpqshm and kc.fpzt_dm = '21' and b.fpzzhm = kc.fpzzhm and b.fp_dm = kc.fp_dm and a.hzfpdbckdbz = 'N')

select a.yzjhuuid, a.swjg_dm, a.sssqq, a.sssqz, a.fpjhfl_dm, a.fpzl_dm, b.fpzlmc, b.jldw_dm, a.hzfpsl, a.djxh, a.syfpsl, a.spswjg_dm, a.jhbzuuid, a.fpyzmc, d.nsrmc as ysdw1, b.lc_dm, b.jeb_dm, b.wzb_dm, a.swjg_dm as sbdw_dm, e.gmfplqfs_dm from fp_yzjh a, dm_fp_fpzl b,dj_nsrxx d,fp_yzybdwmcfpbaxx e where a.fpzl_dm = b.fpzl_dm(+) and a.djxh = d.djxh(+) and a.jhbzuuid=e.yzybdwmcfpbauuid(+) and (1 = ? or a.syfpsl > ?) and (1 = ? or a.swjg_dm in (#macroparam#)) and (1 = ? or a.yxbz = ?) and (1 = ? or a.fpjhfl_dm in (#macroparam#)) and (1 = ? or a.sssqq = ?) and (1 = ? or a.sssqz = ?) and (1 = ? or a.fpzl_dm = ?) order by a.sssqq

select t.djxh, t.yqzzsdkpzzzzszyfpfs, t.yqzzsdkpzzzzszyfpse, t.yxdkdyqzzszyfpfs, t.yxdkdyqzzszyfpse, t.yqzzskspzzglnhhwysytyfpfs, t.yqzzskspzzglnhhwysytyfpse, t.yxdkdyqglnhhwysytyfpfs, t.yxdkdyqglnhhwysytyfpse, t.yqzzsdkpzzhgjkzzszyjksfs, t.yqzzsdkpzzhgjkzzszyjksse, t.yxdkdyqhgjkzzszyjksse, t.wszzrq, t.wszzswjg_dm, t.sssq from fp_yqzzsdkpzdktz t where t.lcslid = ?

select ty.tycgluuid, ty.djxh, ty.fp_dm, ty.fphm, ty.kprq, ty.fkfsfsbh, ty.fkfmc, ty.skfsfsbh, ty.skfmc, ty.jehj, ty.sfskskjkj, ty.fpkjqk_dm, ty.cglcjfpyjuuid, ty.sjgsdq, ty.lrr_dm, ty.lrrq, ty.xgr_dm, ty.xgrq, ty.fpzl_dm from fp_cglcj_ty ty where fpzl_dm = ? and fp_dm = ? and fphm = ? and (ty.zfbz_1 != 'Y' or ty.zfbz_1 is null)

select t.djxh, mx.fpzl_dm, mx.fpzl_dm, mx.fp_dm, mx.fpsl, mx.fpqshm, mx.fpzzhm, t.lrrq, zl.defpbz, zl.zppz_dm, fp.mbfs, fp.fpme, fp.phcd from fp_tp t, fp_tp_mx mx, dm_fp_fpzl zl, dm_fp_fp fp where t.fptpuuid = mx.fptpuuid and mx.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm and mx.fpzl_dm = fp.fpzl_dm and zl.fpzl_dm = fp.fpzl_dm and mx.fp_dm = fp.fp_dm and t.djxh = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or mx.lrrq >= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or mx.lrrq < (?+1))
select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg t where t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.xybz = 'Y' and t.swjgbz='1' and t.sjswjg_dm=?

select ck.czrykfkcuuid, ck.czry_dm, ck.fpkf_dm, ck.fpzl_dm, ck.fp_dm, ck.bs, ck.fpqshm, ck.fpzzhm, ck.fpzt_dm, ck.swjg_dm, ck.sjgsdq, ck.lrrq, ck.lrr_dm, fp.mbfs, fp.phcd from fp_czrykfkc ck left join dm_fp_fp fp on ck.fp_dm = fp.fp_dm where ck.czry_dm = ? and ck.fpzl_dm = ? and ck.fp_dm = ? and to_number(ck.fpqshm) <= to_number(?) and to_number(ck.fpzzhm) >= to_number(?) and (1 = #macroparam# or ck.fpzt_dm = ?) order by ck.fpzl_dm, ck.fp_dm, ck.fpqshm
select a.kfdbmxuuid,a.kfdbuuid,a.fpzl_dm,b.fpzlmc,a.dwsl_dm,a.fpsl from fp_kfdbsq_mx a,dm_fp_fpzl b where a.fpzl_dm = b.fpzl_dm and a.kfdbuuid=?
select a.* from fp_yzrkxx a where a.fp_dm = ? and a.fpqshm <= ? and a.fpzzhm >= ?

select b.fpckkf_dm fpkf_dm, t.fpzl_dm, t.fp_dm, t.fpqshm, t.fpzzhm, '11' fphd_dm, '调拨出库' fphdmc, kf.fpkfgtmc, zl.fpzlmc, kf.fpkf_dm from fp_dbckd_mx t,fp_fpkf kf, fp_dbckd b,dm_fp_fpzl zl where b.kfdbuuid = ? and t.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm(+) and b.dbckuuid = t.dbckuuid and b.fpckkf_dm = kf.fpkf_dm

update fp_swxzxk_zgxe xe set xe.sfhy='Y' , xe.yxbz='N',xe.xgrq=sysdate where (1=? or xe.fpzl_dm = ?) and xe.swxzxkuuid in ( select t.swxzxkuuid from fp_swxzxk t where t.lssqbz='Y' and t.djxh=? and t.swxzxkzt_dm='1' )

select t.uuid, t.ywuuid, t.fphd_dm, t.sflzlsz, t.fpzl_dm, t.fp_dm, t.fpqshm, t.lrrq, t.fpzzhm, t.lrr_dm, t.xgrq, t.xgr_dm, t.sjgsdq, t.fpkf_dm, t.sjtb_sj, t.swjg_dm, to_char(t.fxssq,'YYYY-MM-DD') fxssq, to_char(t.fxssz,'YYYY-MM-DD') fxssz, zl.fpzlmc, hd.fphdmc, kf.fpkfgtmc from fp_fpjcbphfxjgb t,dm_fp_fpzl zl,dm_fp_fphd hd,fp_fpkf kf where t.fpkf_dm = kf.fpkf_dm and t.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm(+) and t.fphd_dm = hd.fphd_dm and t.fxssq = ? and t.fxssz = ? and t.fpkf_dm = ?

select cy.djxh, cymx.fpzl_dm, cymx.fp_dm, cymx.fs, cymx.fpqshm, cymx.fpzzhm, cymx.lrrq, cymx.kpqsrq, cymx.kpjzrq, cymx.kpje, fp.phcd, cymx.cyfpmxuuid, cymx.fpyjjg_dm from fp_yjjcyqk cy, fp_yjjcyqk_mx cymx, dm_fp_fp fp where cy.fpcyuuid = cymx.fpcyuuid and cymx.fpzl_dm = fp.fpzl_dm and cymx.fp_dm = fp.fp_dm and (1=#macroparam# or cy.djxh = ?) and cymx.fpzl_dm = ? and cymx.fp_dm = ? and to_number(cymx.fpqshm) <= to_number(?) and to_number(cymx.fpzzhm) >= to_number(?) and cymx.zfbz_1 <> 'Y' order by cymx.fpzl_dm, cymx.fp_dm, cymx.fpqshm

select t.* from (select jc.fpzl_dm, jc.fp_dm, jc.fpqshm, jc.fpzzhm,jc.fs, jc.zgswskfj_dm from fp_nsrfpjc jc, dm_fp_fpzl zl where jc.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm and jc.djxh = ? and zl.skbz = 'Y' and zl.zppz_dm = ? and fpzt_dm = ? order by jc.fpzl_dm, jc.fp_dm, jc.fpqshm) t where rownum <= ?
select m.djsqmxuuid, m.djsquuid, m.fpzl_dm, z.fpzlmc, m.fp_dm, m.fphm, m.zjje, m.kpje, m.fpmm, m.kjrq, m.kpje from fp_yjfpdjsq_mx m, dm_fp_fpzl z where m.fpzl_dm = z.fpzl_dm and m.djsquuid = ?

select distinct kc.fpzl_dm, zl.fpzlmc, kc.fp_dm, fp.fpdmmc, fp.mbfs, fp.jldw_dm, fp.phcd from fp_swjgkfkc kc left join dm_fp_fpzl zl on kc.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm left join dm_fp_fp fp on kc.fp_dm = fp.fp_dm where kc.fpkf_dm = ? and kc.fpzt_dm = ?
delete from fp_zwjd where lcslid = ?
select zmmx.* from fp_dszzszyfpybszm zm, fp_dszzszyfpybszm_mx zmmx where zm.uuid = zmmx.dsuuid and zm.zfbz_1 = 'N' and zmmx.fp_dm = ? and zmmx.fphm = ? and zm.djxh=?

select t.SWXZXKYQUUID, t.LCSLID, t.HDSLID, t.SQDBH, t.DJXH, t.SQYCTS, t.SQJDRQ, t.YQYY, t.QRYCTS, t.QRJDRQ, t.SWJG_DM, t.LRR_DM, t.LRRQ, t.XGR_DM, t.XGRQ, t.SJGSDQ, t.scjgscyj_dm, t.scjgscyjsm, t.scr_dm, t.scswjg_dm, t.scrq, t.sqrq, t.swxzxkxm_dm, t.zstybz, t.sqlcslid from FP_SWXZXK_YQ_SQSP t where t.sqlcslid = ?
select t.fpzl_dm code, t.fpzlmc caption, t.fpzljc, t.fplb_dm, t.tdhy_dm from dm_fp_fpzl t where 1 = 1 and t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.xybz = 'Y' #macroparam#

select a.yzybdwmcfpbauuid, a.djxh, a.swjg_dm, a.fpyzmc, a.bazt, a.jbr, a.lrrq sbrq_1, a.fpzl_dm, a.gg_dm, a.bfs, a.mbfs, a.jeb_dm, a.lc_dm, a.zz_dm, a.wzb_dm, a.pjzdfs_dm, a.fpdmmc, a.bz, a.gmfplqfs_dm, a.ysswjg_dm, a.fpme, a.lrr_dm, a.xgr_dm, a.sjgsdq, a.gg, a.zfbz_1, a.zfr_dm, a.bz ,a.lxr,a.lxdh from fp_yzybdwmcfpbaxx a where (1 = ? or a.djxh = ?) and (1 = ? or a.fpzl_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or a.zfbz_1 = ?) and (1 = ? or a.yzybdwmcfpbauuid = ?)

select a.dbckuuid, a.kfdbuuid, a.lcuuid, a.spfzr_dm, (select b.fpkfgtmc from fp_fpkf b where b.fpkf_dm = a.fpckkf_dm) fpckdwmc, a.fpckkf_dm, (select d.fpkfgtmc from fp_fpkf d where d.fpkf_dm = a.fprkkf_dm) fprkdwmc, a.fprkkf_dm, a.ckr_dm, a.ckrq, a.bz, a.hzfpdbckdbz, a.fpdbzt_dm, a.dbwcbz, a.swjg_dm, a.xgr_dm, a.lrr_dm from fp_dbckd a where a.lcuuid = ?

select distinct z.zsxm_dm, z.zsxmmc from cs_fp_fpdkszdzb d, dm_gy_zsxm z where d.zsxm_dm = z.zsxm_dm And d.dkfplb_dm = ? and d.swjg_dm in (select j.swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg j start with j.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior j.sjswjg_dm = j.swjg_dm)

select zl.fpzl_dm, zl.fpzlmc, zl.tkfs_dm, zl.tdhy_dm, zl.wzb_dm, zl.lc_dm, zl.jeb_dm, zl.fwskbz, zl.skbz, zl.fplb_dm, zl.zppz_dm, zl.defpbz, zl.jldw_dm, 'N' wtdkbz, jeb.fpme, zl.defpxebz from dm_fp_fpzl zl, dm_gy_jeb jeb where zl.jeb_dm = jeb.jeb_dm and zl.yxbz = 'Y' order by zl.fpzl_dm
delete from fp_waqsbdkzzskspzyxjxdk_tzs where lcslid = ?
select mx.fpsl from fp_tp tp, fp_tp_mx mx where tp.fptpuuid = mx.fptpuuid and tp.djxh = ? and mx.fpzl_dm = ? and mx.lrrq >= ? and mx.lrrq <= ? order by mx.fpzl_dm, mx.fp_dm, mx.fpqshm
select hxmx.fpzl_dm, hxmx.fp_dm, hxmx.fpqshm, hxmx.fpzzhm, hxmx.bfs from fp_swjgfphx_jgb hx, fp_swjgfphx_mx_jgb hxmx where hx.fphxuuid = hxmx.fphxuuid #macroparam#

select uuid, a.swxzxkuuid, a.hzrscjydz, a.bhzrscjydz, a.bhzrqysdszgswjg_dm, a.nsrsbh, a.hzrqysdszgswjg_dm, a.djxh, a.nsrmc, a.lrr_dm, a.lrrq, a.xgr_dm, a.xgrq, a.sjgsdq, a.sjtb_sj, a.xkyxqq, a.xkyxqz, a.bhzrqysdszgswjgmc, a.czlx_dm from fp_swxzxk_hzjnqysds a, fp_swxzxk b where a.swxzxkuuid = b.swxzxkuuid and b.swxzxkzt_dm = '1' and a.nsrsbh = ?

select ly.lrrq as sprq, ly.lrr_dm as spry_dm, swry.swryxm as sprxm, ly.gprxm, mx.fpzl_dm, mx.fp_dm, mx.fpsl, mx.fpsl * fp.mbfs as lgsl, mx.fpqshm, mx.fpzzhm, fp.jldw_dm, fp.fpzg, fp.fpdmmc, fp.yspc from fp_ly ly, fp_ly_mx mx, dm_fp_fpzl zl, dm_fp_fp fp, dm_gy_swry swry where ly.fplyuuid = mx.fplyuuid and mx.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm and mx.fpzl_dm = fp.fpzl_dm and zl.fpzl_dm = fp.fpzl_dm and mx.fp_dm = fp.fp_dm and swry.swry_dm = ly.lrr_dm and ly.fplyuuid = ? order by ly.lrrq desc
select sqspuuid, lcslid, djxh, hdslid, sqrxm, ljgpje, sqrq, slr_dm, slrq, swjg_dm, hzr_dm, hzrq, hzswjg_dm, sjgsdq, fpdbbz, fpdblx_dm, dbje, zsbz, spyj, sjbnsrbz from fp_pzhdsqsp where lcslid = ?

select swxzxkyquuid, lcslid, sqdbh, hdslid, djxh, sqycts, sqjdrq, yqyy, qrjdrq, qrycts, swjg_dm, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgrq, xgr_dm, sjgsdq, scjgscyj_dm, scjgscyjsm, scr_dm, scswjg_dm, scrq, sjtb_sj from fp_swxzxk_yq_sqsp where sqdbh = ?
select kfkcuuid, fpkf_dm, fpzl_dm, fp_dm, xqshm, xzzhm, xs, bs, fpqshm, fpzzhm, fpzt_dm, swjg_dm, sjgsdq, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, lcslid from fp_swjgkfkc_pc where fpkf_dm = ? and lcslid = ?

select kc.kfkcuuid, kc.fpzl_dm, zl.fpzlmc, kc.fp_dm, fp.fpdmmc, kc.fpkf_dm, kc.xs, kc.bs, (to_number(kc.fpzzhm) - to_number(kc.fpqshm) + 1) kcfs, kc.fpqshm, kc.fpzzhm, kc.xqshm, kc.xzzhm, kc.fpzt_dm, kc.swjg_dm, kc.sjgsdq, kc.lrr_dm, kc.xgr_dm, fp.phcd, fp.fpjj, fp.fpxj, fp.mbfs, fp.mxbfs, zl.jldw_dm, kc.lrrq, kc.xgrq from fp_swjgkfkc_pc kc, dm_fp_fpzl zl, dm_fp_fp fp where kc.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm and kc.fp_dm = fp.fp_dm and (1 = ? or kc.swjg_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or kc.fpkf_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or kc.fpzl_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or kc.fp_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or to_number(kc.fpqshm) <= to_number(?)) and (1 = ? or to_number(kc.fpzzhm) >= to_number(?)) and (1 = ? or kc.fpzt_dm = ?) and kc.lcslid = ? order by kc.fpzl_dm, kc.fp_dm, kc.fpqshm
select distinct kjxx.swjg_dm from fp_wlfp_kjxx kjxx where kjxx.sfyyj = 'N' and kjxx.fpkjqk_dm in (#macroparam#) order by kjxx.swjg_dm

select 1 from fp_swjgqckccj a where a.zfbz_1 = 'N' and a.fp_dm = ? and ((a.fpqshm <= ? and a.fpzzhm >= ?) or (a.fpqshm >= ? and a.fpzzhm <= ?) or (a.fpqshm <= ? and a.fpzzhm >= ?)) union select 1 from fp_yzrkxx a where a.zfbz_1 = 'N' and a.fp_dm = ? and ((a.fpqshm <= ? and a.fpzzhm >= ?) or (a.fpqshm >= ? and a.fpzzhm <= ?) or (a.fpqshm <= ? and a.fpzzhm >= ?)) union select 1 from fp_yzjhfp_mx a, fp_yzjhfp d where a.yzfpuuid = d.yzfpuuid and d.zfbz_1 = 'N' and a.fp_dm = ? and ((a.fpqshm <= ? and a.fpzzhm >= ?) or (a.fpqshm >= ? and a.fpzzhm <= ?) or (a.fpqshm <= ? and a.fpzzhm >= ?)) union select 1 from fp_yybdwmczzsptfpba a, fp_yybdwmczzsptfpba_mx d where a.YYBDWMCZZSPTFPUUID = d.YYBDWMCZZSPTFPUUID and a.zfbz_1 = 'N' and d.zfbz_1 = 'N' and d.fp_dm = ? and ((d.fpqshm <= ? and d.fpzzhm >= ?) or (d.fpqshm >= ? and d.fpzzhm <= ?) or (d.fpqshm <= ? and d.fpzzhm >= ?))
select b.* from fp_cglcj a, fp_wtdkfpxxcjb b where a.fpcglcjuuid = b.fpcglcjuuid and a.fpcglcjuuid = ? and b.wtdkfpxxcjuuid = ? and b.fp_dm = ? and b.fphm = ?

select b.fpzl_dm, b.fp_dm, b.fpqshm, b.fpzl_dm, b.fpzzhm, '22' fphd_dm, '税务机关挂失撤销' fphdmc, kf.fpkf_dm, kf.fpkfgtmc, fpzlmc from fp_swjgfpgs_jgb a, fp_swjgfpgs_mx_jgb b, fp_fpkf kf,dm_fp_fpzl zl where b.fpgsuuid = a.fpgsuuid and b.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm(+) and a.gsfpszkfgt_dm = kf.fpkf_dm and a.zstybz = 'N' and a.fpgsuuid = ?

select count(kc.kfkcuuid) from fp_swjgkfkc kc where (1 = ? or kc.fpzl_dm = ? ) and kc.fp_dm = ? and (1 = ? or kc.fpzt_dm = ? ) and to_number(kc.fpqshm) #macroparam# and to_number(kc.fpzzhm) #macroparam#

select count(c.cyfpmxuuid) cnt from fp_yjjcyqk z, fp_yjjcyqk_mx c where z.fpcyuuid = c.fpcyuuid and z.djxh = ? and c.kpqsrq >= ? and c.kpjzrq < (? +1) and c.fpyjjg_dm = ? and c.yjms_dm = ? and c.zfbz_1<>'Y' and (1=#macroparam# or c.zgswskfj_dm is null or c.zgswskfj_dm like ?) and (1=#macroparam# or z.zgswskfj_dm is null or z.zgswskfj_dm like ?)

select t.fpzl_dm, t.fphd_dm, t.fp_dm, t.fpqshm, t.fpzzhm, t.fpkf_dm, kf.fpkfgtmc, hd.fphdmc, zl.fpzlmc, t.fpzl_dm from fp_fplsz t, fp_fpkf kf, dm_fp_fphd hd, dm_fp_fpzl zl where t.fpkf_dm = kf.fpkf_dm and t.fphd_dm = hd.fphd_dm and t.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm(+) and t.fp_dm = ? and t.fpqshm = ? and t.fpzzhm = ?

select distinct kj.wlfpuuid, kj.djxh, kj.fpzl_dm, zl.fpzlmc, kj.fp_dm, kj.fs, (kj.fs / fp.mbfs) as bs, fp.mbfs, kj.fpqshm, kj.fpzzhm, kj.kpje, kj.se, kj.fpkjqk_dm, kj.kpqsrq, kj.kpjzrq, kj.swjg_dm, kj.lrr_dm, kj.lrrq, kj.xgr_dm, kj.xgrq, kj.sjgsdq, kj.sfyyj, kj.kpscsj, (case when hd.fpgpfs_dm = 1 or hd.fpgpfs_dm = 3 or hd.fpgpfs_dm = 9 then 10 when hd.fpgpfs_dm = 2 then 20 end) as cyfs_dm, fp.fpdmmc, fp.yspc, fp.fpzg from fp_wlfp_kjxx kj,dm_fp_fpzl zl, fp_pzhdxx hd,dm_fp_fp fp where kj.djxh = hd.djxh and kj.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm and kj.fpzl_dm = hd.fpzl_dm and kj.fpzl_dm = fp.fpzl_dm and kj.fp_dm = fp.fp_dm and zl.fpzl_dm = hd.fpzl_dm and zl.fpzl_dm = fp.fpzl_dm and hd.fpzl_dm = fp.fpzl_dm and kj.djxh = ? and (kj.fpkjqk_dm in (#macroparam#) or #macroparam#) and kj.sfyyj = 'N' and hd.yxbz='Y' order by kj.fpzl_dm, kj.fp_dm, kj.fpqshm

select swxzxkuuid, bgswxzxkmxuuid, bdswxzxkuuid, swxzxkxm_dm, xkyxqq, xkyxqz, bgxm_dm, bgqxmnr, bghxmnr, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sjgsdq, sjtb_sj, swxzxkmxuuid from fp_swxzxk_bdqk_bgmx where bdswxzxkuuid = ?
select * from fp_yrzzzskspzqd_hyfp where waqsbdkzzskspzdksqduuid = ?

select kc.kfkcuuid, kc.fpzl_dm, zl.fpzlmc, kc.fp_dm, fp.fpdmmc, kc.fpkf_dm, kc.xs, kc.bs, (to_number(kc.fpzzhm) - to_number(kc.fpqshm) + 1) kcfs, kc.fpqshm, kc.fpzzhm, kc.xqshm, kc.xzzhm, kc.fpzt_dm, kc.swjg_dm, kc.sjgsdq, kc.lrr_dm, kc.xgr_dm, fp.phcd, fp.fpjj, fp.fpxj, fp.mbfs, fp.mxbfs from fp_swjgkfkc kc, dm_fp_fpzl zl, dm_fp_fp fp where kc.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm and kc.fp_dm = fp.fp_dm #macroparam# order by kc.fpzl_dm, kc.fp_dm, kc.fpqshm

select * from fp_fpjhbz t where t.zfbz_1 = 'N' and t.sssqq = ? and t.sssqz = ? and bz is not null and t.tbswjg_dm in (select swjg_dm from qx_swjg_zns where zn_dm='04' and yxbz='Y' start with swjg_dm = ? connect by prior swjg_dm = sjswjg_dm)

select yj.fplyyjuuid, yj.lyuuid, yj.pslsh, yj.djxh, yj.gprxm, yj.sfzjlx_dm, yj.sfzjhm, yj.wtdkbz, yj.fpkf_dm, yj.fpzl_dm, yj.fp_dm, yj.fpqshm, yj.fpzzhm, yj.bs, yj.fpzt_dm, yj.swjg_dm, yj.yjlqzt_dm, yj.yxbz, yj.sjgsdq, yj.lrr_dm, yj.lrrq from fp_lyyj yj where (1 = #macroparam# or yj.pslsh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or yj.djxh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or yj.fpzl_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or yj.fp_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or to_number(yj.fpqshm) <= to_number(?)) and (1 = #macroparam# or to_number(yj.fpzzhm) >= to_number(?)) and (1 = #macroparam# or yj.yjlqzt_dm in (#macroparam#)) and (1 = #macroparam# or yj.yxbz = ?) order by yj.pslsh, yj.djxh, yj.fpzl_dm, yj.fp_dm, yj.fpqshm, yj.fpzzhm

select distinct mx.fpzl_dm, mx.fp_dm, mx.fpqshm, mx.fpzzhm from fp_yybdwmczzsptfpba zb, fp_yybdwmczzsptfpba_mx mx where zb.yybdwmczzsptfpuuid = mx.yybdwmczzsptfpuuid and zb.djxh = ? and mx.fpzl_dm = ? and mx.fp_dm = ? and mx.fpqshm <= ? and mx.fpzzhm >= ? and mx.zfbz_1 <> 'Y'
select * from FP_DCXCYCLXXB where lyuuid = ? and bz_1='0'

select a.fpzl_dm, a.fp_dm, a.nd, a.yspc, a.fphy_dm, a.zz_dm, a.phcd, a.fpjj, a.fpxj, a.dkj, a.fpzg, a.xybz, a.yxbz, a.mxbfs, a.fpzlxl, a.pjzdfs_dm, a.fpxzqh_dm, a.gg_dm, a.djbz, a.fpdmmc, a.gdsbz, a.gg, a.jldw_dm, a.mbfs, a.fpme, a.djxh, b.nsrmc, b.nsrsbh, a.fpsx_dm from dm_fp_fp a, dj_nsrxx b where a.djxh = b.djxh(+) and a.yxbz = 'Y' and a.xybz = 'Y' and a.gdsbz in ('0', ?) and substr(a.fpxzqh_dm, 0, 2) = substr(?, 0, 2) and a.fpzl_dm = ? order by a.fp_dm asc

select distinct jc.fpzl_dm, nvl2(hd.hdqcuuid, 'Y', 'N') hdbz from fp_nsrfpjc jc left join fp_pzhdxx hd on jc.djxh = hd.djxh and jc.fpzl_dm = hd.fpzl_dm and hd.yxbz = 'Y' and hd.yxqq < = to_date(to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') and hd.yxqz > = to_date(to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') where jc.djxh = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or jc.fpzt_dm = ?)

select x.skssqq,x.skssqz,x.zspm_dm,t.lsmxid, sum(x.ybtse) as ybtse from sb_ls_sbxx t, sb_sbxx x where t.djxh = x.djxh and t.zsxm_dm = x.zsxm_dm and t.zspm_dm = x.zspm_dm and t.sbsx_dm_1 = x.sbsx_dm_1 and t.rdpzuuid = x.rdpzuuid and x.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1', '4', '5') and x.zfbz_1 = 'N' and t.ssqq <= x.skssqz and t.ssqz >= x.skssqq and t.hhljid = ? group by x.skssqq,x.skssqz,x.zspm_dm,t.lsmxid

select * from dm_gy_xzqh a where a.xzqhjc < 3 and a.sjxzqhsz_dm = ( select xzqhsz_dm from dm_gy_xzqh t where xzqhjc = 1 start with t.xzqhsz_dm = ? connect by prior t.sjxzqhsz_dm = t.xzqhsz_dm) union select * from dm_gy_xzqh t where xzqhjc = 1 start with t.xzqhsz_dm = ? connect by prior t.sjxzqhsz_dm = t.xzqhsz_dm

select rygw.swrysf_dm,rygw.gwxh,jggw.gw_dm from qx_jggw_swrysf rygw, qx_swjg_gw jggw, qx_gw_xtgn gwxtgn where jggw.gwxh = rygw.gwxh and jggw.gw_dm = gwxtgn.gw_dm and rygw.yxbz ='Y' and jggw.yxbz ='Y' and gwxtgn.yxbz ='Y' and jggw.swjg_dm = ? and gwxtgn.xtgn_dm = ? UNION ALL select rygw.swrysf_dm,rygw.gwxh,jggw.gw_dm from qx_jggw_swrysf rygw, qx_swjg_gw jggw, qx_gw_gnj gwgnj,qx_gnj_xtgn gnjxtgn where jggw.gwxh = rygw.gwxh and jggw.gw_dm = gwgnj.gw_dm and gwgnj.gnj_dm = gnjxtgn.gnj_dm and rygw.yxbz ='Y' and jggw.yxbz ='Y' and gwgnj.yxbz ='Y' and gnjxtgn.yxbz ='Y' and jggw.swjg_dm = ? and gnjxtgn.xtgn_dm = ?

select a.fpzl_dm, a.fpzlmc, a.fpzljc, a.fplb_dm, a.tkfs_dm, a.tdhy_dm, a.wzb_dm, a.lc_dm, a.jeb_dm, a.jldw_dm, a.fwskbz, a.yxbz, a.xybz, a.skbz, a.gdsbz, a.zppz_dm, a.zkdklx_dm, a.swjg_dm, a.zgkpxedmbz, a.defpbz, a.gg_dm, b.fpme, c.ggmc from dm_fp_fpzl a,dm_gy_jeb b,dm_fp_gg c,fp_fpjh_fpzlspsz d where a.fpzl_dm= d.fpzl_dm and a.jeb_dm=b.jeb_dm(+) and a.gg_dm=c.gg_dm(+) and a.yxbz = 'Y' and a.xybz = 'Y' and a.gdsbz in ('0', ?) and (1 = ? or a.fplb_dm in (#macroparam#)) and (1 = ? or d.swjg_dm in (#macroparam#)) order by a.fpzl_dm asc

select a.fpzl_dm, a.fpzlmc, a.fpzljc, a.fplb_dm, a.tkfs_dm, a.tdhy_dm, a.wzb_dm, a.lc_dm, a.jeb_dm, a.jldw_dm, a.fwskbz, a.yxbz, a.xybz, a.skbz, a.gdsbz, a.zppz_dm, a.zkdklx_dm, a.swjg_dm, a.zgkpxedmbz, a.defpbz, a.gg_dm, b.fpme, c.ggmc from dm_fp_fpzl a,dm_gy_jeb b,dm_fp_gg c where a.jeb_dm=b.jeb_dm(+) and a.gg_dm=c.gg_dm(+) and a.yxbz = 'Y' and a.xybz = 'Y' and a.gdsbz in ('0', ?) and (1 = ? or a.fplb_dm in (#macroparam#)) order by a.fpzl_dm asc

select a.ywuuid, a.fpkf_dm, e.fpkfgtmc, e.kflx_dm, a.fphd_dm, b.fphdmc, a.fpzl_dm, c.fpzlmc, a.fp_dm, d.fpdmmc, a.fpqshm, a.fpzzhm, a.swjg_dm, a.lrr_dm, a.lrrq from fp_fplsz a, dm_fp_fphd b, dm_fp_fpzl c, dm_fp_fp d, fp_fpkf e where a.fphd_dm = b.fphd_dm(+) and a.fpzl_dm = c.fpzl_dm(+) and a.fp_dm = d.fp_dm(+) and a.fpkf_dm = e.fpkf_dm(+) and (1 = ? or a.fpkf_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or a.fpzl_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or a.fp_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or to_number(a.fpqshm) <= to_number(?)) and (1 = ? or to_number(a.fpzzhm) >= to_number(?)) and (1 = ? or a.lrrq >= ?) and (1 = ? or a.lrrq-1 <= ? ) #macroparam# order by a.lrrq desc
SELECT BG.* FROM FP_AYCLJGFKSQ BG, FP_SSSXDCB DCB WHERE BG.SSSXDCUUID = DCB.SSSXDCUUID #macroparam#
select a.fplbbs_dm, a.fplbbsmc,a.gg from dm_fp_fplbbs a where a.yxbz = 'Y' and a.xybz = 'Y' order by a.fplbbs_dm
select * from fp_waqsbdkzzskspzdksqd where lcslid = ?
delete fp_dcxczhb_mx zhbmx where 1 = 1 #macroparam#
select pz.swjg_dm, pz.fpzl_dm, pz.fpkpxexx, pz.fpkpxesx, pz.yxbz from cs_fp_fpkpxepz pz where pz.fpzl_dm = ? and pz.swjg_dm = ?
select c.fpdzxxlqfs_dm from (select r.fpdzxxlqfs_dm from fp_ly r where r.djxh = ? order by lrrq desc) c where rownum <= 1
select zb.pzhdxxuuid, zb.djxh, zb.ljgpje, zb.fpdbbz, zb.yxqq, zb.yxqz, zb.sjgsdq from fp_pzhdxxzb zb where zb.lcslid = ?

select a.dbckuuid, a.dbckmxuuid, a.fpzl_dm, b.fpzlmc, a.fp_dm, c.fpdmmc, a.xqshm, a.xzzhm, a.xs, a.mxbfs, a.bs, a.mbfs, a.fs, a.fpqshm, a.fpzzhm, a.dj, a.xsje, a.sfrk, a.sjgsdq, a.lrr_dm, a.xgr_dm, c.phcd from fp_dbckd_mx a, dm_fp_fpzl b, dm_fp_fp c where a.fpzl_dm = b.fpzl_dm and a.fp_dm = c.fp_dm and a.dbckuuid = ?

select fpzl.fpzl_dm, fpzl.fpzlmc,fpzl.swjg_dm from dm_fp_fpzl fpzl where not exists (select 1 from fp_kfgly_dbfpzl gly where gly.fpzl_dm = fpzl.fpzl_dm and (1 = #macroparam# or gly.kfgly_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or gly.fpkf_dm = ?)) and fpzl.yxbz='Y' and fpzl.xybz='Y' and (1 = #macroparam# or fpzl.gdsbz in('0', ?)) and (1 = #macroparam# or fpzl.fpzl_dm = ?)

select t.fpzl_dm, zl.fpzlmc, z.sfcuuid, t.fp_dm, zl.jldw_dm as dwsl_dm, sum(t.sqjcsl) sqjcsl, sum(t.sqjcje) sqjcje, sum(t.bqsdsl) bqsdsl, sum(t.bqsdje) bqsdje, sum(t.bqfssl) bqfssl, sum(t.bqfsje) bqfsje, sum(t.bqfcsl) bqfcsl, sum(t.bqfcje) bqfcje, sum(t.bqhxsl) bqhxsl, sum(t.bqhxje) bqhxje, sum(t.bqtpsl) bqtpsl, sum(t.bqtpje) bqtpje, sum(t.bqgssl) bqgssl, sum(t.bqgsje) bqgsje, sum(t.bqdksl) bqdksl, sum(t.bqdkje) bqdkje, sum(t.bqjcsl) bqjcsl, sum(t.bqjcje) bqjcje, Case When sum(t.sqjcsl) + sum(t.bqsdsl) - sum(t.bqfssl) - sum(t.bqfcsl) - sum(t.bqhxsl) + sum(t.bqtpsl) - sum(t.bqdksl) - sum(t.bqgssl) - sum(t.bqjcsl) = 0 Then 'Y' Else 'N' End As sfph from fp_sfcqkbg z, fp_sfcqkbg_mx t, dm_fp_fpzl zl where z.sfcuuid = t.sfcuuid and t.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm and z.fpjcuuid = ? and (1 = ? or t.fpkf_dm = ?) Group by t.fpzl_dm, zl.fpzlmc, t.fp_dm, zl.jldw_dm,z.sfcuuid

with jcuuid as( SELECT sfcuuid FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY fpkf_dm ORDER BY sssqq) LEV, t.sfcuuid FROM (select distinct a.sfcuuid, b.fpkf_dm, a.sssqq from fp_sfcqkbg a, fp_sfcqkbg_mx b where a.sfcuuid = b.sfcuuid and (a.zfbz_1 = 'N' or a.zfbz_1 is null) and a.sssqq >= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and a.sssqz <= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and b.fpkf_dm in(#macroparam#) ) t) WHERE LEV = 1 ) select t.fpzl_dm, zl.fpzlmc, t.fp_dm, zl.jldw_dm as dwsl_dm, sum(t.sqjcsl) sqjcsl, sum(t.sqjcje) sqjcje, sum(t.bqsdsl) bqsdsl, sum(t.bqsdje) bqsdje, sum(t.bqfssl) bqfssl, sum(t.bqfsje) bqfsje, sum(t.bqfcsl) bqfcsl, sum(t.bqfcje) bqfcje, sum(t.bqhxsl) bqhxsl, sum(t.bqhxje) bqhxje, sum(t.bqtpsl) bqtpsl, sum(t.bqtpje) bqtpje, sum(t.bqgssl) bqgssl, sum(t.bqgsje) bqgsje, sum(t.bqdksl) bqdksl, sum(t.bqdkje) bqdkje, sum(t.bqjcsl) bqjcsl, sum(t.bqjcje) bqjcje, Case When sum(t.sqjcsl) + sum(t.bqsdsl) - sum(t.bqfssl) - sum(t.bqfcsl) - sum(t.bqhxsl) + sum(t.bqtpsl) - sum(t.bqdksl) - sum(t.bqgssl) - sum(t.bqjcsl) = 0 Then 'Y' Else 'N' End As sfph from fp_sfcqkbg z, fp_sfcqkbg_mx t, dm_fp_fpzl zl where z.sfcuuid = t.sfcuuid and t.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm and z.sfcuuid in (select sfcuuid from jcuuid) Group by t.fpzl_dm, zl.fpzlmc, t.fp_dm, zl.jldw_dm

select cy.djxh, cymx.fpzl_dm, cymx.fp_dm, cymx.fs, cymx.fpqshm, cymx.fpzzhm, cymx.lrrq, cymx.kpqsrq, cymx.kpjzrq, cymx.kpje, fp.phcd, cymx.cyfpmxuuid, cymx.fpyjjg_dm, cymx.zfbz_1 from fp_yjjcyqk cy, fp_yjjcyqk_mx cymx, dm_fp_fp fp where cy.fpcyuuid = cymx.fpcyuuid and cymx.fpzl_dm = fp.fpzl_dm and cymx.fp_dm = fp.fp_dm and (1=#macroparam# or cy.djxh = ?) and cymx.fpzl_dm = ? and cymx.fp_dm = ? and to_number(cymx.fpqshm) <= ? and to_number(cymx.fpzzhm) >= ? and (1=#macroparam# or cymx.zgswskfj_dm is null or cymx.zgswskfj_dm like ?) and (1=#macroparam# or cy.zgswskfj_dm is null or cy.zgswskfj_dm like ?)

select ly.djxh, mx.fpzl_dm, mx.fpzl_dm, mx.fp_dm, mx.fpsl, mx.fpqshm, mx.fpzzhm, mx.lrrq, ly.lrr_dm, zl.defpbz, zl.zppz_dm, fp.mbfs, fp.fpme, zl.zkdklx_dm, zl.fplb_dm, zl.tdhy_dm, fp.phcd, mx.sytggptpsl, mx.sycxlgptpsl from fp_ly ly, fp_ly_mx mx, dm_fp_fpzl zl, dm_fp_fp fp where ly.fplyuuid = mx.fplyuuid and mx.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm and mx.fpzl_dm = fp.fpzl_dm and zl.fpzl_dm = fp.fpzl_dm and mx.fp_dm = fp.fp_dm and ly.djxh = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or mx.lrrq >= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or mx.lrrq < (?+1))

select a.jhbzmxuuid, a.jhbzuuid, a.fpjhlx_dm, a.fpzl_dm, a.jhlgsl, a.sntqxssl, a.sjhzsl, b.tbswjg_dm, c.swjgmc tbswjgmc, d.fpzlmc, d.jldw_dm, d.lc_dm, d.jeb_dm, d.wzb_dm, b.tbswjg_dm as sbdw_dm, b.bz, b.sjjhbzuuid from fp_fpjhbz_ptfpmx a, fp_fpjhbz b, dm_gy_swjg c, dm_fp_fpzl d where a.jhbzuuid = b.jhbzuuid and b.tbswjg_dm = c.swjg_dm and a.fpzl_dm=d.fpzl_dm and b.zfbz_1 = 'N' and (1 = ? or b.jhbzuuid = ?) and (1 = ? or b.fpjhfl_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or a.zsbz = ?) and (1 = ? or b.tbswjg_dm in (#macroparam#)) and (1 = ? or b.sssqq = ?) and (1 = ? or b.sssqz = ?) and (1 = ? or a.fpjhlx_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or b.fpjhzt_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or a.fpzl_dm in (#macroparam#))

select b.kfgly_dm, b.fpkf_dm, a.fpkfgtmc, a.kflx_dm, c.swryxm, b.yxbz, a.kflx_dm, a.ssswjg_dm, d.swjgmc ssswjgmc, a.sfgmfpzdfsgt from fp_fpkf a, fp_kfgly b, dm_gy_swry c, dm_gy_swjg d where a.fpkf_dm = b.fpkf_dm and b.kfgly_dm = c.swry_dm and a.ssswjg_dm=d.swjg_dm and (1 = ? or a.ssswjg_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or b.fpkf_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or b.kfgly_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or a.kflx_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or b.yxbz = ?) and a.yxbz='Y' order by b.yxbz desc, a.kflx_dm, a.fpkfgtmc
select b.* from fp_cglcj a, fp_cglcj_bdcfp b where a.fpcglcjuuid = b.fpcglcjuuid and a.fpcglcjuuid = ? and b.bdccgluuid = ? and b.fp_dm = ? and b.fphm = ?
select swjg_dm, sjswjg_dm, uuid, lrr_dm, lrrq, sjgsdq, xgr_dm, xgrq, yxbz from fp_dbswjgszdzb where (1=? or swjg_dm = ?) and (1=? or sjswjg_dm = ?) and yxbz='Y'
select b.fpzl_dm, b.fp_dm, b.sl, b.dj, b.je, b.fs, b.fpqshm, b.fpzzhm, b.djxh, b.syfpsl, b.gmfplqfs_dm, b.yzfpmxuuid from fp_yzjhfp_mx b where b.yzfpuuid = ?
select count(pf.lsrwbh) isbj from fp_sssxdcnsrpfb pf where pf.lsrwbh = ? and pf.blzt_dm != ?

select jdc.jdccgluuid, jdc.djxh, jdc.fp_dm, jdc.fphm, jdc.kprq, jdc.ghfmc, jdc.ghfsfsbh, jdc.cllx_dm, jdc.cpxh, jdc.cd, jdc.hgzh, jdc.jkzmh, jdc.sjdh, jdc.fdjhm, jdc.clsbdh, jdc.jshj, jdc.slzsl, jdc.se, jdc.bhsj, jdc.zgswjg_dm, jdc.fpkjqk_dm, jdc.cglcjfpyjuuid, jdc.sjgsdq, jdc.lrr_dm, jdc.lrrq, jdc.xgr_dm, jdc.xgrq, jdc.fpzl_dm from fp_cglcj_jdcfp jdc where 1 = 1 #macroparam# and (jdc.zfbz_1 != 'Y' or jdc.zfbz_1 is null)

select jc.nsrjcuuid, jc.djxh, jc.fpzl_dm, jc.fp_dm, jc.fs, jc.fpqshm, jc.fpzzhm, jc.fpzt_dm, jc.swjg_dm, jc.sjgsdq from fp_nsrfpjc jc where jc.fpzl_dm = ? and jc.fp_dm = ? and to_number(jc.fpqshm) <= ? and to_number(jc.fpzzhm) >= ? and (1 = #macroparam# or jc.fpzt_dm = ?)
delete from FP_YRZZZSKSPZQD_HYFP where waqsbdkzzskspzdksqduuid = (select waqsbdkzzskspzdksqduuid from fp_waqsbdkzzskspzdksqd where lcslid = ?)

select sf.zspm_dm, sum(case when trunc(sq.lrrq) = trunc(sysdate) then sf.srze else 0 end) drhjje, sum(case when sq.zjsrsfft = 'Y' then case when trunc(sq.qxq) <= trunc(sysdate) and trunc(sq.qxz) >= trunc(sysdate) then sf.srze / (to_number(to_char(sq.qxz, 'YYYYMM')) - to_number(to_char(sq.qxq, 'YYYYMM')) + 1) else 0 end else sf.srze end) dyhjje from fp_dk_sq sq, fp_dk_sfmx sf where sq.dksquuid = sf.dksquuid and sq.djxh = ? and sq.zfbz_1 = 'N' and sf.zsxm_dm = '10101' and sf.skssqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and sf.skssqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and sf.gldksquuid is null group by sf.zspm_dm

select mx.fplyuuid, mx.fplymxuuid, mx.fpzl_dm, mx.fp_dm, mx.fpqshm, mx.fpzzhm, mx.fpsl, mx.wtdkbz, mx.xpbz, mx.lrrq, zl.fpzlmc, fp.fpdmmc, zl.defpbz, zl.zppz_dm, fp.fpjj, fp.fpxj, zl.fplb_dm, zl.tdhy_dm, ly.gprxm, ly.fpdzxxlqfs_dm from fp_ly ly, fp_ly_mx mx, dm_fp_fpzl zl, dm_fp_fp fp where ly.fplyuuid = mx.fplyuuid and mx.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm and mx.fpzl_dm = fp.fpzl_dm and mx.fp_dm = fp.fp_dm and zl.fpzl_dm = fp.fpzl_dm and ly.djxh = ? and mx.lrrq >= ? and mx.lrrq < (? +1) and mx.xpbz in (#macroparam#)
select a.swxzxkuuid, a.lcslid,a.sqrq,b.slrq from fp_swxzxk a, fp_swxzxk_sbzs b where a.lcslid = ? and a.swxzxkuuid = b.swxzxkuuid
select cj.tssjcjuuid, cj.lcslid, cj.zstybz, cj.shr_dm, cj.shsj, cj.swjg_dm, cj.cjbwz, cj.sjgsdq, cj.lrr_dm, cj.lrrq, cj.xgr_dm, cj.xgrq, cj.cjbd_dm from fp_tssjcj cj where 1 = 1 #macroparam#
select yqzzskspzdksqdzpuuid, fp_dm, fphm, kprq, je, se, xhfnsrsbh, xhfnsrmc from fp_yqzzskspzdksqd_zzszyfp t where t.yqkspzdksqduuid = ?

select a.fpkf_dm, a.fpkfgtmc, a.ssswjg_dm, a.kflx_dm, a.sjgsdq, a.lrr_dm, a.lrrq, a.xgr_dm, a.xgrq, a.yxbz,
a.sfgmfpzdfsgt from fp_fpkf a where a.fpkf_dm = ?
select sx.dcsx_dm, sx.dcsx_dm code, sx.dcsxmc, sx.dcsxmc caption, sx.sjdcsx_dm, sx.sjdcsx_dm pcode from dm_zh_dcsx sx where sx.yxbz = 'Y' and sx.sjdcsx_dm = ?
delete from fp_swjgkfkc c where c.kfkcuuid = ? and c.fpkf_dm = ? and c.fpzl_dm = ? and c.fp_dm = ? and c.fpqshm = ? and c.fpzzhm = ?
delete fp_tssjcj_dhnsr dhnsr where 1=1 #macroparam#

select uuid, swxzxkuuid, hzrscjydz, bhzrscjydz, bhzrqysdszgswjg_dm, hzrqysdszgswjg_dm, nsrsbh, djxh, nsrmc, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sjgsdq, sjtb_sj, xkyxqq, xkyxqz, bhzrqysdszgswjgmc, czlx_dm from fp_swxzxk_hzjnqysds where swxzxkuuid = ? and xkyxqz >= trunc(sysdate)
delete fp_tssjcj_zcqqyxxcjb zcq where 1=1 #macroparam#

select gptp.djxh, gptp.fpzl_dm, zl.fpzlmc, gptp.gptplx_dm, zl.defpbz, zl.zppz_dm, sum(gptp.sygpsl) sygpsl, sum(gptp.hzzggpsl) hzzggpsl from fp_gptpxx gptp, dm_fp_fpzl zl where gptp.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm and gptp.djxh = ? and gptp.zgqxq <= ? and gptp.zgqxz >= ? and gptp.gptplx_dm = ? group by gptp.djxh,gptp.fpzl_dm,zl.fpzlmc,gptp.gptplx_dm,zl.defpbz,zl.zppz_dm

SELECT t.fpzl_dm,t.fp_dm,t.fphm,t.zjje FROM fp_yjfpdjsq_mx t WHERE t.fpzl_dm = ? and t.fp_dm = ? and t.fphm = ? and djsquuid IN (SELECT djsquuid FROM fp_yjfpdjsq WHERE djrdjxh = ?) order by t.fphm asc

select * from fp_nsrfpjc a where exists (select 1 from fp_yybdwmczzsptfpba b, fp_yybdwmczzsptfpba_mx c where b.yybdwmczzsptfpuuid = c.yybdwmczzsptfpuuid and a.fpzl_dm = c.fpzl_dm and a.fp_dm = c.fp_dm and a.fpqshm >= c.fpqshm and a.fpzzhm <= c.fpzzhm and a.djxh = b.djxh) and a.djxh = ?
select * from fp_yqzzskspzdksqd_hyfp t where t.yqkspzdksqduuid = ?

SELECT ZHBMX.DCXCZHMXUUID, ZHBMX.LSRWBH, ZHBMX.DCXM_DM, ZHBMX.DCSX_DM, ZHBMX.NSRTBNRJH, ZHBMX.LRR_DM, ZHBMX.LRRQ, ZHBMX.XGR_DM, ZHBMX.XGRQ, ZHBMX.SJGSDQ, ZHBMX.DCXCZHUUID FROM FP_DCXCZHB_MX ZHBMX WHERE 1 = 1 #macroparam#

select a.jhbzuuid, a.tbswjg_dm, b.swjgmc tbswjgmc, a.sssqq, a.sssqz, a.bz, a.zbr_dm, c.swryxm zbrxm, a.zbrq, a.fpjhzt_dm, a.hzbz_1, a.hzrq_1, a.hzjg_dm, a.fpthyy, a.fpjhfl_dm, a.swjg_dm, a.sjjhbzuuid from fp_fpjhbz a, dm_gy_swjg b, dm_gy_swry c where a.tbswjg_dm = b.swjg_dm and a.zbr_dm = c.swry_dm and (1 = ? or a.tbswjg_dm in (#macroparam#))
and (1 = ? or a.fpjhfl_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or a.sssqq = ?) and (1 = ? or a.sssqz = ?) and (1 = ? or a.ZFBZ_1 = ?) and (1 = ? or a.fpjhzt_dm in (#macroparam#))
delete from fp_yrzzzskspzqd_hgjks where waqsbdkzzskspzdksqduuid = (select waqsbdkzzskspzdksqduuid from fp_waqsbdkzzskspzdksqd where lcslid = ?)
delete from fp_pzhdsqsp where lcslid=?

select a.swjgcycsdzbuuid, a.swjg_dm, b.swjgmc, a.fpzl_dm, d.fpzlmc, a.djxh, c.nsrmc, c.nsrsbh, a.lrr_dm, a.xgr_dm, a.sjgsdq from fp_swjgcycsdzb a, dm_gy_swjg b, dj_nsrxx c, dm_fp_fpzl d where a.swjg_dm = b.swjg_dm and a.fpzl_dm = d.fpzl_dm(+) and a.djxh = c.djxh and (1 = ? or a.swjg_dm in (#macroparam#)) union select a.swjgcycsdzbuuid, a.swjg_dm, b.swjgmc, a.fpzl_dm, d.fpzlmc, a.djxh, c.nsrmc, c.nsrsbh, a.lrr_dm, a.xgr_dm, a.sjgsdq from fp_swjgcycsdzb a, dm_gy_swjg b, fp_swfpyzqywh c, dm_fp_fpzl d where a.swjg_dm = b.swjg_dm and a.fpzl_dm = d.fpzl_dm(+) and to_char(a.djxh) = c.nsrsbh and (1 = ? or a.swjg_dm in (#macroparam#))

select a.fpzl_dm, a.fpzlmc, a.fpzljc, a.fplb_dm, a.tkfs_dm, a.tdhy_dm, a.wzb_dm, a.lc_dm, a.jeb_dm, a.jldw_dm, a.fwskbz, a.yxbz, a.xybz, a.skbz, a.gdsbz, a.zppz_dm, a.zkdklx_dm, a.swjg_dm, a.zgkpxedmbz, a.defpbz, a.gg_dm, b.fpme, c.ggmc from dm_fp_fpzl a,dm_gy_jeb b,dm_fp_gg c where a.jeb_dm=b.jeb_dm(+) and a.gg_dm=c.gg_dm(+) and a.yxbz = 'Y' and a.xybz = 'Y' and a.gdsbz in ('0', ?) and (1 = ? or a.fplb_dm in (#macroparam#)) order by a.fpzl_dm asc

select kc.fpzl_dm, zl.fpzlmc, kc.fp_dm, fp.fpdmmc, kc.fpqshm, kc.fpzzhm, kc.bs as sl, (kc.bs * fp.fpjj) as je, fp.mbfs, zl.jldw_dm as dwsl_dm, kc.fpkf_dm, kf.fpkfgtmc from fp_swjgkfkc_jc kc, dm_fp_fp fp, dm_fp_fpzl zl, fp_fpkf kf where kc.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm and kc.fpzl_dm = fp.fpzl_dm and zl.fpzl_dm = fp.fpzl_dm and kc.fp_dm = fp.fp_dm and zl.yxbz = 'Y' and fp.yxbz = 'Y' and kc.fpkf_dm = kf.fpkf_dm and (1= ? or kc.swjg_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or kc.fpkf_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or kc.lrrq > ?) and (1 = ? or kc.lrrq < ?) and kc.fpzt_dm = '20' order by kc.fpzl_dm, kc.fp_dm, kc.fpqshm

select t.fpzl_dm, t.fphd_dm, t.fp_dm, t.fpqshm, t.fpzzhm, t.fpkf_dm, kf.fpkfgtmc, hd.fphdmc, zl.fpzlmc, t.fpzl_dm from fp_fplsz t,fp_fpkf kf,dm_fp_fphd hd,dm_fp_fpzl zl where t.fpkf_dm = kf.fpkf_dm and t.fphd_dm = hd.fphd_dm and t.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm(+) and t.ywuuid = ?

select jx.fpzl_dm, jx.fp_dm, jx.swjg_dm from FP_HBJXQXSZ jx where jx.swjg_dm in (select jg.swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg jg connect by prior jg.sjswjg_dm = jg.swjg_dm start with jg.swjg_dm = ?) and jx.fpzl_dm in (#macroparam#) and jx.jxrqq <= ? and jx.jxrqz >= ?

select pcbgmx.pcbgmxuuid, pcbgmx.pcbguuid, pcbgmx.fp_dm, pcbgmx.fpzl_dm, pcbgmx.pcs, pcbgmx.dwsl_dm, pcbgmx.zms, pcbgmx.sybz_dm, pcbgmx.syfpqshm, pcbgmx.sys, pcbgmx.syfpzzhm, pcbgmx.fpsyyylx_dm, pcbgmx.cljy_dm, pcbgmx.bz, pcbgmx.sjgsdq, pcbgmx.lrr_dm, pcbgmx.lrrq, pcbgmx.xgr_dm, pcbgmx.xgrq, fpzl.fpzlmc, fpzl.jldw_dm, pcbg.fpkfgt_dm, pcbg.lcslid, pcbg.swjg_dm from fp_pcbg_mx pcbgmx, dm_fp_fpzl fpzl,fp_pcbg pcbg where pcbgmx.pcbguuid = pcbg.pcbguuid and pcbgmx.fpzl_dm = fpzl.fpzl_dm #macroparam# order by pcbgmx.sybz_dm desc,pcbgmx.fpzl_dm,pcbgmx.fp_dm,pcbgmx.syfpqshm

SELECT A.FWYPSQUUID, A.SQRXM, A.SQRQ, B.FWYPSQMXUUID, B.FWYP_DM, B.JZSQRZKCFWYPSL, B.DSCFPZLSL, B.SQLGSL, B.JLDW_DM, B.GG_DM, A.DJXH, B.SQLGSL AS SL, A.SLSWJG_DM AS SWJG_DM, A.LRR_DM, A.SJGSDQ FROM FP_FWYPSQ A, FP_FWYPSQ_MX B WHERE A.FWYPSQUUID = B.FWYPSQUUID AND A.DJXH = ? AND A.LCSLID = ?

select n.nsrsbh, n.djxh, n.nsrmc, m.fpzl_dm, m.fp_dm, m.fpqshm, m.fpzzhm from fp_ly_mx m, fp_ly l, dj_nsrxx n where m.fplyuuid = l.fplyuuid and l.djxh = n.djxh and m.fpzl_dm = ? and m.fp_dm = ? and ? between m.fpqshm and m.fpzzhm
delete fp_tssjcj cj where 1=1 #macroparam#

select swpc.swpcuuid, swpc.lcslid, swpc.fpkfgt_dm, fpkf.fpkfgtmc, fpkf.kflx_dm, swpc.fpzl_dm, swpc.fp_dm, swpc.dwsl_dm, swpc.bfs, swpc.fs, swpc.fpqshm, swpc.fpzzhm, swpc.bz, swpc.pcr_dm, swpc.pcrq, swpc.swjg_dm, swpc.sjgsdq, swpc.lrr_dm, swpc.lrrq, swpc.xgr_dm, swpc.pcjcrmc, swpc.pcjcrq, swpc.pcjcr_dm, swpc.zfrq_1, swpc.zfr_dm, swpc.zfbz_1, swpc.xgrq, swpc.fpzt_dm from fp_swpc swpc, fp_fpkf fpkf where swpc.fpkfgt_dm = fpkf.fpkf_dm #macroparam# order by swpc.fpzt_dm desc,swpc.fpzl_dm,swpc.fp_dm,swpc.fpqshm
delete fp_dcxcqdb qdb where 1 = 1 #macroparam#

select a.swjgcycsdzbuuid, a.swjg_dm, b.swjgmc, a.fpzl_dm, d.fpzlmc, a.djxh, c.nsrmc, c.nsrsbh, a.lrr_dm, a.xgr_dm, a.sjgsdq from fp_swjgcycsdzb a, dm_gy_swjg b, dj_nsrxx c, dm_fp_fpzl d where a.swjg_dm = b.swjg_dm and a.fpzl_dm = d.fpzl_dm(+) and a.djxh = c.djxh and (1 = ? or a.swjg_dm=?) and (1 = ? or a.fpzl_dm=?) and (1 = ? or a.djxh=?)

select mx.cyfpmxuuid, mx.ywuuid, mx.fpzl_dm, mx.fp_dm, mx.fs, mx.fpqshm, mx.fpzzhm, mx.fpkjqk_dm, mx.kpqsrq, mx.kpjzrq, mx.kpje, mx.se, mx.fpyjjg_dm, cy.yjjsjly_dm, mx.lrr_dm, zl.fplb_dm, zl.tdhy_dm from fp_yjjcyqk cy, fp_yjjcyqk_mx mx, dm_fp_fpzl zl where cy.fpcyuuid = mx.fpcyuuid and zl.fpzl_dm = mx.fpzl_dm and cy.djxh = ? and (1=#macroparam# or mx.lrrq >= ?) and (1=#macroparam# or mx.lrrq < (?+1)) and (1=#macroparam# or mx.fpyjjg_dm = ?) and (1=#macroparam# or zl.fplb_dm in (#macroparam#)) and (1=#macroparam# or zl.tdhy_dm in (#macroparam#)) and mx.zfbz_1 = 'N'

select b.yzfpmxuuid, b.yzfpmxuuid, b.yzrkuuid, b.rkr_dm, f.swryxm rkrmc, b.rkrq, b.ysdw_1, b.cycsmc, b.wszg, c.fpzlmc, b.fpzl_dm, b.fp_dm, d.fpdmmc, c.jldw_dm, d.gg_dm, c.jeb_dm, c.wzb_dm, c.lc_dm, d.nd, d.yspc, d.zz_dm, d.mxbfs, d.mbfs, d.fpjj, d.fpxj, b.xs, b.dj, b.xsje, b.fs, b.fpqshm, b.fpzzhm, b.djxh, b.gmfplqfs_dm, b.bfjs, b.fpkf_dm, b.xs, b.xqshm, b.xzzhm, d.mxbfs mxbfjs, a.fpkfgtmc from fp_yzrkxx b, dm_fp_fpzl c, dm_fp_fp d, dm_gy_swry f,fp_fpkf a where b.fpzl_dm = c.fpzl_dm and b.fp_dm = d.fp_dm and b.fpkf_dm = a.fpkf_dm(+) and b.rkr_dm = f.swry_dm and exists (select 1 from fp_swjgkfkc x where x.fpkf_dm = b.fpkf_dm and x.fpzl_dm = b.fpzl_dm and x.fp_dm = b.fp_dm and x.fpqshm = b.fpqshm and x.fpzzhm = b.fpzzhm) and b.zfbz_1 = 'N' and (1 = ? or b.rkswjg_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or b.kfgly_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or b.fpkf_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or b.cycsdjxh = ?) and (1 = ? or b.lrrq >= ?) and (1 = ? or b.lrrq-1 <= ?)

select distinct t.sfcuuid, t.fpjcuuid, t.ssswjg_dm, t.sssqq, t.zfbz_1, t.sssqz, t.zfr_dm, t.zfrq_1, t.jbr_dm, t.zbrq, t.sjgsdq, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.xgr_dm, t.fzr_dm_1 from fp_sfcqkbg t,fp_sfcqkbg_mx mx where t.sfcuuid = mx.sfcuuid and (t.zfbz_1 = 'N' or t.zfbz_1 is null) and (1 = ? or t.sssqq > to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')) and (1 = ? or t.sssqz < to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')) and (1 = ? or mx.fpkf_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or t.sfcuuid = ?)

select b.fpcglcjuuid, b.tycgluuid, b.lrr_dm, swry.swryxm lrrxm, b.lrrq, b.fpzl_dm, b.fp_dm, fp.fpdmmc, b.fphm, trim(a.cglsjcjlx_dm) cglsjcjlxDm from fp_cglcj a, fp_cglcj_ty b, dm_gy_swry swry, dm_fp_fp fp where a.fpcglcjuuid = b.fpcglcjuuid and b.lrr_dm = swry.swry_dm and b.fp_dm = fp.fp_dm and b.zfbz_1 = 'N' and a.djxh = ? and a.fpcglcjuuid = ?

select jc.nsrjcuuid, jc.fpzl_dm, jc.djxh, zl.fpzlmc, jc.fp_dm, fp.fpdmmc, fp.jldw_dm, jc.fs, jc.fpqshm, jc.fpzzhm, fp.phcd, jc.fpzt_dm, zl.zkdklx_dm, hd.wtdkbz, fp.mbfs from fp_pzhdxx hd, dm_fp_fpzl zl, dm_fp_fp fp, fp_nsrfpjc jc where hd.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm and hd.fpzl_dm = fp.fpzl_dm and hd.fpzl_dm = jc.fpzl_dm and zl.fpzl_dm = fp.fpzl_dm and zl.fpzl_dm = jc.fpzl_dm and fp.fpzl_dm = jc.fpzl_dm and fp.fp_dm = jc.fp_dm and hd.djxh = jc.djxh and jc.djxh = ? and jc.fpzt_dm='20' order by jc.fpzl_dm, jc.fp_dm, jc.fpqshm
select * from fp_yrzzzskspzqd_sqdkhyfp where hyfpuuid = ?

delete from FP_YRZZZSKSPZQD_HYFPDKXX where HYFPUUID in (select HYFPUUID from FP_YRZZZSKSPZQD_HYFP where waqsbdkzzskspzdksqduuid = (select waqsbdkzzskspzdksqduuid from fp_waqsbdkzzskspzdksqd where lcslid = ?))

SELECT YSYSKMXUUID, DKSQUUID, DKFPLB_DM, ZSXM_DM, ZSPM_DM, WSPZZL_DM, WSPZZG, WSPZHM, PMSE, BCKCSE, SKSX, GLDKSQUUID, HY_DM, ZFBZ_1, ZFR_DM, SFMXUUID, ZFRQ_1, SPUUID, SKSSQQ, SKSSQZ, LRR_DM, LRRQ, XGR_DM, XGRQ, SJGSDQ, KKCSE, JSFYJ, SFL, JSYJ, DJXH, KSYSKUUID, LZSFMXUUID, ZGSWSKFJ_DM FROM FP_DK_YSYSKMX WHERE GLDKSQUUID = ?

select jc.nsrjcuuid, jc.djxh, jc.fpzl_dm, jc.fp_dm, jc.fs, jc.fpqshm, jc.fpzzhm, jc.swjg_dm, jc.lrr_dm, jc.lrrq, jc.xgr_dm, jc.xgrq, jc.fpzt_dm, jc.sjgsdq, jc.lrrq from fp_nsrfpjc jc where jc.djxh = ? and jc.fpzl_dm = ? and jc.fp_dm = ? and to_number(jc.fpqshm) <= ? and to_number(jc.fpzzhm) >= ? and jc.fpzt_dm = ? order by jc.fpzl_dm, jc.fp_dm, jc.fpqshm || ''

select distinct zl.fpzl_dm, zl.fpzlmc, fp.fp_dm, fp.fpdmmc, fp.phcd from fp_pzhdxx t, dm_fp_fpzl zl, dm_fp_fp fp where t.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm and t.fpzl_dm = fp.fpzl_dm and (1 = #macroparam# or zl.fplb_dm in (#macroparam#)) #macroparam# and t.yxqq <= ? and t.yxqz >= ? and t.djxh = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or t.wtdkbz = ?) and t.yxbz = 'Y' order by zl.fpzl_dm, fp.fp_dm

select a.swjgcycsdzbuuid, a.swjg_dm, b.swjgmc, a.fpzl_dm, d.fpzlmc, a.djxh, c.nsrmc, c.nsrsbh, a.lrr_dm, a.xgr_dm, a.sjgsdq from fp_swjgcycsdzb a, dm_gy_swjg b, fp_swfpyzqywh c, dm_fp_fpzl d where a.swjg_dm = b.swjg_dm and a.fpzl_dm = d.fpzl_dm(+) and (to_char(a.djxh) = c.nsrsbh or a.djxh = c.djxh) and (1 = ? or a.swjg_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or a.fpzl_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or a.djxh = ?)
select t.fphbqxuuid, t.fpzl_dm, t.fp_dm, t.hbyy, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.xgr_dm, t.sjgsdq, t.xgrq, t.jxrqq, t.jxrqz, t.swjg_dm from fp_hbjxqxsz t where 1=1 #macroparam#

select sjgsdq, xgrq, xgr_dm, lrrq, lrr_dm, swxzxkzt_dm, swjg_dm, to_char(xkyxqq,'YYYY-MM-DD') XKYXQQ, to_char(xkyxqz,'YYYY-MM-DD') XKYXQZ, swxzxkxm_dm, djxh, swxzxkuuid from fp_swxzxk where swxzxkuuid = ?

SELECT T.FPKJXXUUID, T.DKSQUUID, T.KJSWJG_DM, T.KPR_DM, T.KJRQ, T.DJXH, T.FP_DM, T.FPZL_DM, T.FPHM, T.KPJE, T.LZFPDM, T.LZFPHM, T.TSNSRDJXH, T.FPKF_DM, T.BZ, T.ZFBZ_1, T.ZFR_DM, T.ZFSQR, T.ZFSQRQ, T.ZFYY, T.SJGSDQ, T.LRR_DM, T.LRRQ, T.XGR_DM, T.XGRQ, T.ZFRQ_1 FROM FP_DK_FPKJXX T, FP_DK_SQ B WHERE T.DKSQUUID = B.DKSQUUID AND T.ZFBZ_1 = ? AND B.ZFBZ_1 = ? AND B.KJBZ = ? AND B.FYBH = ?
select * from fp_yqzzskspzdksqd_zzszyfp where fp_dm = ? and fphm = ?
select yhspdssquuid, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sjgsdq, swxzxkuuid, djxh, sxfbl, xdskjjqx, sjtb_sj from fp_swxzxk_dsyhsp where swxzxkuuid = ?
select * from fp_yqzzskspzdksqd_hgjks where zyjkshm = ?

with jcuuid as( select t.fpjcuuid from (SELECT mx.fpjcuuid, jc.jcrq, mx.fpkf_dm, max(jc.jcrq) over(partition by mx.fpkf_dm) rn FROM FP_JC_MX mx, fp_jc jc where mx.fpjcuuid = jc.fpjcuuid and jc.zfbz_1 = 'N' and mx.fpkf_dm in(#macroparam#) ) t ) select t.fpzl_dm, zl.fpzlmc, t.fp_dm, zl.jldw_dm as dwsl_dm, sum(t.sqjcsl) sqjcsl, sum(t.sqjcje) sqjcje, sum(t.bqsdsl) bqsdsl, sum(t.bqsdje) bqsdje, sum(t.bqfssl) bqfssl, sum(t.bqfsje) bqfsje, sum(t.bqfcsl) bqfcsl, sum(t.bqfcje) bqfcje, sum(t.bqhxsl) bqhxsl, sum(t.bqhxje) bqhxje, sum(t.bqtpsl) bqtpsl, sum(t.bqtpje) bqtpje, sum(t.bqgssl) bqgssl, sum(t.bqgsje) bqgsje, sum(t.bqdksl) bqdksl, sum(t.bqdkje) bqdkje, sum(t.bqjcsl) bqjcsl, sum(t.bqjcje) bqjcje, Case When sum(t.sqjcsl) + sum(t.bqsdsl) - sum(t.bqfssl) - sum(t.bqfcsl) - sum(t.bqhxsl) + sum(t.bqtpsl) - sum(t.bqdksl) - sum(t.bqgssl) - sum(t.bqjcsl) = 0 Then 'Y' Else 'N' End As sfph from fp_sfcqkbg z, fp_sfcqkbg_mx t, dm_fp_fpzl zl where z.sfcuuid = t.sfcuuid and t.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm and z.fpjcuuid in (select fpjcuuid from jcuuid) Group by t.fpzl_dm, zl.fpzlmc, t.fp_dm, zl.jldw_dm
select distinct last_day(trunc(mx.kpqsrq)) ssqz from fp_yjjcyqk_mx mx where mx.fpcyuuid in (#macroparam#) and trim(mx.fpyjjg_dm) = ?

select b.*, d.phcd from fp_cglcj a, fp_cglcj_ty b left join fp_cglcj_fpyj c on b.cglcjfpyjuuid = c.cglcjfpyjuuid, dm_fp_fp d where a.fpcglcjuuid = b.fpcglcjuuid and b.zfbz_1 = 'N' and b.fp_dm = d.fp_dm and ((c.zfbz_1 = 'Y') or (b.cglcjfpyjuuid is null)) and a.fpcglcjuuid = ?
select zb.pzhdxxuuid, zb.djxh, zb.ljgpje, zb.fpdbbz, zb.yxqq, zb.yxqz, zb.sjgsdq, zb.sjbnsrbz from fp_pzhdxxzb zb where zb.djxh = ? and zb.yxqq <= ? and zb.yxqz >= ? and zb.yxbz = ?

select KPXESQSPUUID, LCSLID, HDSLID, DJXH, FPZL_DM, FPZGKPXE_DM, SQLY, SCJGSCYJ_DM, SCJGSCYJSM, XKYXQQ, XKYXQZ, SCR_DM, SCSWJG_DM, SCRQ, LRR_DM, LRRQ, XGR_DM, XGRQ, SJGSDQ from fp_swxzxk_zgxe_sqsp zgxe where zgxe.lcslid=?

select mx.sqspmxuuid, mx.sqspuuid, mx.fpzl_dm, mx.fppzhdczlx_dm, mx.dffpzgkpxe_dm, mx.myzggpsl, mx.mczggpsl, mx.cpzgsl, mx.fpgpfs_dm, mx.dffpzgkpxe, mx.wtdkbz, mx.zsbz, mx.sjgsdq, mx.lrr_dm, zl.fplb_dm, zl.tdhy_dm, zl.fpzlmc, zl.TKFS_DM, zl.SKBZ, zl.DEFPBZ, zl.ZPPZ_DM, zl.JLDW_DM, j.fpme, mx.lxkpsx, mx.lxkpljxe from fp_pzhdsqsp_mx mx, dm_fp_fpzl zl,dm_gy_jeb j where mx.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm and zl.jeb_dm = j.jeb_dm and sqspuuid = ?
