select distinct kj.fpzl_dm,kj.fp_dm,zl.fpzlmc,fp.fpdmmc from fp_wlfp_kjxx kj,dm_fp_fpzl zl, fp_pzhdxx hd,dm_fp_fp fp where kj.djxh = hd.djxh and kj.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm and kj.fpzl_dm = hd.fpzl_dm and kj.fpzl_dm = fp.fpzl_dm and kj.fp_dm = fp.fp_dm and zl.fpzl_dm = hd.fpzl_dm and zl.fpzl_dm = fp.fpzl_dm and hd.fpzl_dm = fp.fpzl_dm and kj.djxh = ? and (kj.fpkjqk_dm in (#macroparam#) or #macroparam#) and kj.sfyyj = ? and hd.yxbz='Y' order by kj.fpzl_dm, kj.fp_dm
select yjczl_dm, swjg_dm, bz, lrrq, lrr_dm, sjgsdq from fp_jcsz where swjg_dm = ?

select T.SWXZXKUUID, T.SWXZXKXM_DM, t.xkyxqq, t.xkyxqz, T.djxh, T.swjg_dm, T.swxzxkzt_dm, T.lrr_dm, T.lrrq, T.xgr_dm, T.xgrq, T.sjgsdq from FP_SWXZXK T WHERE T.SWXZXKZT_DM = '1' AND T.DJXH = ? and t.swxzxkxm_dm = ? and t.lssqbz = ?
select sum(gptp.sygpje) sygpje from fp_gptp_ljje gptp where gptp.djxh = ? and gptp.zgqxq <= ? and gptp.zgqxz >= ? and gptp.gptplx_dm = ?
select g.gprxm, g.lxdh, g.sfzjzl_dm, g.sfzjhm, g.fppzhdczlx_dm, g.sjgsdq, g.gprqcuuid from fp_pzhdsqsp_gpr g where g.sqspuuid in (select p.sqspuuid from fp_pzhdsqsp p where p.lcslid = ?)

select lgb.fpglyxm, lgb.fplgbhm, lgb.wszzrq, lgb.sfzjhm, lgb.sfzjlx_dm, lgb.fplgbuuid, lgb.lcslid, lgb.djxh, lgb.slswjg_dm, lgb.lrr_dm, lgb.lrrq, lgb.sjgsdq from fp_lgbff lgb where lgb.djxh = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or lgb.lcslid = ?) order by lgb.lrrq desc
select a.dbckuuid, a.lcuuid, a.spfzr_dm, a.ckr_dm, a.fprkkf_dm, a.fpckkf_dm from fp_dbckd a where a.kfdbuuid = ? order by lrrq desc

select (select b.fpkfgtmc from fp_fpkf b where b.fpkf_dm = a.fpckkf_dm) fpckdwmc, a.fpckkf_dm, (select d.fpkfgtmc from fp_fpkf d where d.fpkf_dm = a.fprkkf_dm) fprkdwmc, a.fprkkf_dm, x.fpzl_dm, e.fpzlmc, x.fp_dm, x.fpqshm, x.fpzzhm, c.kfdbuuid, c.lrr_dm sqr_dm, c.sqrxm, c.ckfswry_dm ckr_dm, f.swryxm ckrxm, 'X' hzfpdbckdbz, a.lrrq from fp_rkswcyd a, fp_rkswcyd_mx x, fp_kfdbsq c, dm_fp_fpzl e, dm_gy_swry f where a.rkcyuuid = x.rkcyuuid and a.kfdbuuid = c.kfdbuuid and x.fpzl_dm = e.fpzl_dm(+) and c.ckfswry_dm = f.swry_dm(+) and (1 = ? or a.kfdbuuid = ?) and (1 = ? or x.cybdsjbz = ?) and (1 = ? or x.dsbdbz = ?) and (1 = ? or x.tzyj_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or x.cybdsjclbz = ?) and c.zfbz_1 = 'N' and c.fpdbzt_dm != '50' and not exists (select 1 from fp_dbrkd r where r.kfdbuuid = a.kfdbuuid) order by a.lrrq desc

select b.yzfpmxuuid, b.yzfpmxuuid, b.yzrkuuid, b.rkr_dm, f.swryxm rkrmc, b.rkrq, b.ysdw_1, b.cycsmc, b.wszg, c.fpzlmc, b.fpzl_dm, b.fp_dm, d.fpdmmc, c.jldw_dm, d.gg_dm, c.jeb_dm, c.wzb_dm, c.lc_dm, d.nd, d.yspc, d.zz_dm, d.mxbfs, d.mbfs, d.fpjj, d.fpxj, b.xs, b.dj, b.xsje, b.fs, b.fpqshm, b.fpzzhm, b.djxh, b.gmfplqfs_dm, b.bfjs, b.fpkf_dm, b.xs, b.xqshm, b.xzzhm, d.mxbfs mxbfjs, a.fpkfgtmc from fp_yzrkxx b, dm_fp_fpzl c, dm_fp_fp d, dm_gy_swry f,fp_fpkf a where b.fpzl_dm = c.fpzl_dm and b.fp_dm = d.fp_dm and b.fpkf_dm = a.fpkf_dm(+) and b.rkr_dm = f.swry_dm
and b.zfbz_1 = 'N' and (1 = ? or b.rkswjg_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or b.kfgly_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or b.fpkf_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or b.cycsdjxh = ?) and (1 = ? or b.lrrq >= ?) and (1 = ? or b.lrrq-1 <= ?)

select b.*, d.phcd from fp_cglcj a, fp_cglcj_escfp b left join fp_cglcj_fpyj c on b.cglcjfpyjuuid = c.cglcjfpyjuuid, dm_fp_fp d where a.fpcglcjuuid = b.fpcglcjuuid and b.zfbz_1 = 'N' and b.fp_dm = d.fp_dm and ((c.zfbz_1 = 'Y') or (b.cglcjfpyjuuid is null)) and a.fpcglcjuuid = ?
DELETE FROM fp_yqzzskspzdksqd WHERE lcslid = ?

select p.fpzl_dm, fpzl.fpzlmc, fpzl.jldw_dm, dw.jldwmc, p.myzggpsl, p.mczggpsl, p.cpzgsl, p.dffpzgkpxe, p.fpgpfs_dm, (case when p.xgrq is null then to_char(p.lrrq, 'yyyy-mm-dd') else to_char(p.xgrq, 'yyyy-mm-dd') end) hdrqxx, fpzl.fplb_dm from fp_pzhdxx p, dm_fp_fpzl fpzl, dm_gy_jldw dw where p.fpzl_dm = fpzl.fpzl_dm and fpzl.jldw_dm = dw.jldw_dm and p.yxbz = 'Y' and p.djxh = ? and to_date(to_char(p.lrrq, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') >= ? and to_date(to_char(p.lrrq, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') <= ? order by p.lrrq asc
SELECT DISTINCT QD.LCSLID FROM FP_DCXCQDB QD, FP_DCXCZHB ZHB WHERE QD.DCXCZHUUID = ZHB.DCXCZHUUID AND ZHB.ZHRWBH IS NULL AND ZHB.LSRWBH = ?

select a.fpgsuuid, a.lcslid, a.gsswjg_dm, a.gsswbm_dm, a.gsfpszkfgt_dm, a.gsqksm, a.sqr_dm, a.sqrxm, a.sqrq, a.zstybz, b.fpkfgtmc from fp_swjgfpgs_jgb a, fp_fpkf b where a.gsfpszkfgt_dm = b.fpkf_dm and (1 = ? or a.fpgsuuid = ?) and (1 = ? or a.lcslid = ?)

select ly.djxh, mx.fpzl_dm, mx.fpzl_dm, mx.fp_dm, mx.fpsl, mx.fpqshm, mx.fpzzhm, ly.lrrq, fp.phcd from fp_ly ly, fp_ly_mx mx, dm_fp_fp fp where ly.fplyuuid = mx.fplyuuid and mx.fpzl_dm = fp.fpzl_dm and mx.fp_dm = fp.fp_dm and (1=#macroparam# or ly.djxh = ?) and (1=#macroparam# or mx.fpzl_dm = ?) and mx.fp_dm = ? and to_number(mx.fpqshm) <= ? and to_number(mx.fpzzhm) >= ? order by mx.fpqshm

SELECT QDBMX.DCXCQDMXUUID, QDBMX.DCXCQDUUID, TO_CHAR(QDBMX.DJXH) DJXH, QDBMX.DCSX_DM, QDBMX.DCXM_DM, QDBMX.NSRTBNR, QDBMX.LRR_DM, QDBMX.LRRQ, QDBMX.XGR_DM, QDBMX.XGRQ, QDBMX.SJGSDQ, SX.DCSXMC, XM.DCXMMC, (SELECT DCSX.DCSXMC FROM DM_ZH_DCSX DCSX WHERE DCSX.DCSX_DM = SX.SJDCSX_DM AND DCSX.YXBZ = 'Y') SJDCSX_DM FROM FP_DCXCQDB QDB, FP_DCXCQDB_MX QDBMX, DM_ZH_DCSX SX, DM_ZH_DCXM XM WHERE QDB.DCXCQDUUID = QDBMX.DCXCQDUUID AND QDBMX.DCSX_DM = SX.DCSX_DM AND QDBMX.DCXM_DM = XM.DCXM_DM #macroparam#
select zl.fpzl_dm, zl.fpzlmc, fp.fpzl_dm, fp.fpdmmc, fp.jldw_dm, fp.phcd, fp.mbfs from dm_fp_fpzl zl, dm_fp_fp fp where zl.fpzl_dm = fp.fpzl_dm and fp.fp_dm = ?

select t.*, m.hwlwmc, y.sfyyj from fp_cglcj_ty_mx m, fp_cglcj_ty t, fp_cglcj_fpyj y, fp_cglcj c where m.tycgluuid = t.tycgluuid and t.fpcglcjuuid = y.fpcglcjuuid and y.fpcglcjuuid = c.fpcglcjuuid and t.cglcjfpyjuuid = y.cglcjfpyjuuid and trim(c.cglsjcjlx_dm) = ? and c.fpcglcjuuid = ? and c.zfbz_1 != 'Y'

select b.*, d.phcd from fp_cglcj a, fp_cglcj_jdcfp b left join fp_cglcj_fpyj c on b.cglcjfpyjuuid = c.cglcjfpyjuuid, dm_fp_fp d where a.fpcglcjuuid = b.fpcglcjuuid and b.zfbz_1 = 'N' and b.fp_dm = d.fp_dm and ((c.zfbz_1 = 'Y') or (b.cglcjfpyjuuid is null)) and a.fpcglcjuuid = ?

SELECT QD.LCSLID, QD.DCXCQDUUID, TO_CHAR(QDMXXX.DJXH) DJXH, QD.QDSWJG_DM, QD.QDR_DM, QD.QDTJ, QD.QDRQ, QD.LRR_DM, QD.LRRQ, QD.XGR_DM, QD.XGRQ, QD.SJGSDQ, QD.DCXCZHUUID, QD.ZHSWJG_DM, QD.LSRWBH, QD.QDPCH, QD.GWXH, QD.BZ_1 FROM FP_DCXCQDB QD, (SELECT DISTINCT QDMX.DCXCQDUUID, QDMX.DJXH FROM FP_DCXCQDB_MX QDMX WHERE ((QDMX.dcsx_dm like '11%' and 'Y' = ?) or (QDMX.dcsx_dm not like '11%' and 'N' = ?))) QDMXXX WHERE QD.DCXCQDUUID = QDMXXX.DCXCQDUUID AND QD.QDSWJG_DM = ? AND QD.DCXCZHUUID IS NULL AND QD.LSRWBH IS NULL

select djxh, zbz, xxsb_dm, tsxx, fxqj_q, fxqj_z, nsrmc, nsrsbh, scswjg_dm, scswjgmc, zbmc_2, zb_dm_1, smslxh, yxbz, sjjhcgbz, sjjhsj, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sjgsdq, sjtbsj from (select t.*,rownum from(select fxmxxh, djxh, zbz, xxsb_dm, tsxx, fxqj_q, fxqj_z, nsrmc, nsrsbh, scswjg_dm, scswjgmc, zbmc_2, zb_dm_1, smslxh, yxbz, sjjhcgbz, sjjhsj, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sjgsdq, sjtbsj from TD_FXMX_XXQC t where t.yxbz = 'Y' AND T.DJXH = ? and t.xxsb_dm = ? order by lrrq desc ) t ) where rownum = 1

select a.kfdbuuid,a.lrrq from fp_dbckd a, fp_dbckd_mx b,fp_kfdbsq c where a.dbckuuid = b.dbckuuid and a.kfdbuuid=c.kfdbuuid and (1 = ? or a.fpckkf_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or b.fp_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or to_number(b.fpqshm) <= to_number(?)) and (1 = ? or to_number(b.fpzzhm) >= to_number(?)) and (1 = ? or a.hzfpdbckdbz=?) and c.zfbz_1 = 'N' and c.fpdbzt_dm != '50' and not exists (select 1 from fp_dbrkd r where r.kfdbuuid=a.kfdbuuid ) order by a.lrrq desc
SELECT m.fpzl_dm, m.fp_dm, m.fpsl, m.fpqshm, m.fpzzhm FROM fp_ly_mx m WHERE m.fplymxuuid = ?
select * from fp_dcxcywgzwhb where swjg_dm=? order by sjyxj
DELETE FROM fp_yqzzskspzdk_zgswjgshb WHERE lcslid = ?

select b.fpcglcjuuid, b.wtdkfpxxcjuuid, b.lrr_dm, swry.swryxm lrrxm, b.lrrq, b.fpzl_dm, b.fp_dm, fp.fpdmmc, b.fphm, trim(a.cglsjcjlx_dm) cglsjcjlxDm, b.stfdjxh, b.sjgsdq, b.zgswskfj_dm, b.wtfswjg_dm from fp_cglcj a, fp_wtdkfpxxcjb b, dm_gy_swry swry, dm_fp_fp fp where a.fpcglcjuuid = b.fpcglcjuuid and b.lrr_dm = swry.swry_dm and b.fp_dm = fp.fp_dm and b.zfbz_1 = 'N' and a.djxh = ? and a.fpcglcjuuid = ?
select t.dcsxmc, t.sjdcsx_dm from dm_zh_dcsx t where t.dcsx_dm = ?
select SPFNSRMC, SPFNSRSBH, BZ, ZSBZ, XGRQ, XGR_DM, LRRQ, LRR_DM, SJGSDQ, SLSWJG_DM, SLRQ, SLR_DM, SQRQ, JBR_DM, ZT, SPFDJXH, DJXH, LCSLID, UUID from FP_DSZZSZYFPYBSZM ZM where ZM.Lcslid = ?

select t.fpkf_dm, t.fpzl_dm, t.fp_dm, t.fpqshm, t.fpzzhm, t.fpkf_dm, '01' fphd_dm, '期初采集撤销' fphdmc, kf.fpkfgtmc, zl.fpzlmc from fp_swjgqckccj t, fp_fpkf kf, dm_fp_fpzl zl where t.swjgqckccjuuid = ? and t.fpkf_dm = kf.fpkf_dm and t.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm(+) and t.zfbz_1 = 'Y'

select ws.wslpuuid, ws.ywslxh, ws.djxh, ws.nsrsbh, ws.gprxm, ws.sfzjzl_dm, ws.sfzjhm, ws.wslpywzt_dm, ws.wslpqrfs_dm, ws.shbtgyy, ws.zgswskfj_dm, ws.slcs, ws.lxdh, ws.yjyjsdsj, ws.sycxltpje, ws.sytgtpje, ws.dz, ws.bz, ws.lrr_dm, ws.lrrq, ws.sjgsdq, ws.fpkf_dm, ws.fplyuuid, ws.version, ws.kddh from fp_wslp ws where ws.wslpywzt_dm in (#macroparam#)

select kfyj.fpyjuuid, kfyj.ssswjg_dm, kfyj.fpkf_dm, kfyj.fpzl_dm, kfyj.fphlbs, kfyj.fpyjbs, kfyj.lrr_dm, kfyj.lrrq, kfyj.xgr_dm, kfyj.xgrq, kfyj.fpyjbl, kfyj.sjgsdq, kf.fpkfgtmc, fpzl.fpzlmc from fp_kfyjxx kfyj, fp_fpkf kf, dm_fp_fpzl fpzl where kfyj.fpkf_dm = kf.fpkf_dm and kfyj.fpzl_dm = fpzl.fpzl_dm and kfyj.fpkf_dm = ? and (1=? or kfyj.fpzl_dm = ?)

select sq.bdswxzxkuuid, sq.lcslid, sq.slr_dm, sq.djxh, sq.bdswxzxklx_dm, sq.slswjg_dm, sq.slrq, sq.zstybz, sq.lrr_dm, sq.lrrq, sq.chbgbz from fp_swxzxk_bdqk_sqsp sq where sq.bdswxzxkuuid = (select bgmx.bdswxzxkuuid from fp_swxzxk_bdqk_bgmx bgmx where bgmx.lrrq = (select max(mx.lrrq) from fp_swxzxk_bdqk_bgmx mx, fp_swxzxk_bdqk_sqsp sqsp where mx.swxzxkuuid = ? and sqsp.bdswxzxklx_dm = '5' and sqsp.zstybz='Y' and mx.bdswxzxkuuid = sqsp.bdswxzxkuuid) and rownum = 1)
select cycfpdcycuuid, swxzxkuuid, djxh, fpbmyxm, fpjyyxm, fpbgyxm, fpywyxm, fppbyxm, cyycmc, cybzmc, cysctj, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sjgsdq, nsrmc from FP_SWXZXK_CYFPXX WHERE SWXZXKUUID = ?

select tp.djxh, mx.fpzl_dm, mx.fpzl_dm, mx.fp_dm, mx.fpsl, mx.fpqshm, mx.fpzzhm, tp.lrrq, fp.phcd from fp_tp tp, fp_tp_mx mx, dm_fp_fp fp where tp.fptpuuid = mx.fptpuuid and mx.fpzl_dm = fp.fpzl_dm and mx.fp_dm = fp.fp_dm and tp.djxh = ? and mx.fpzl_dm = ? and mx.fp_dm = ? and to_number(mx.fpqshm) <= ? and to_number(mx.fpzzhm) >= ? order by mx.fpqshm

select ls.djxh, ls.kpqsrq, ls.kpjzrq, nvl((select sum(c.kpje) from fp_yjjcyqk_mx c where c.fpcyuuid in (select z.fpcyuuid from fp_yjjcyqk z where z.djxh = ls.djxh) and c.zfbz_1 <> 'Y' and trim(c.fpyjjg_dm)='1' and ls.kpqsrq <= c.kpqsrq and ls.kpjzrq >= c.kpjzrq),'0') kpje from fp_ls_yjjecxtj ls
select count(1) from fp_swjgqckccj a where a.zfbz_1 = 'N' and a.fpzl_dm = ? and a.fp_dm = ? and to_number(a.fpqshm) #macroparam# and to_number(a.fpzzhm) #macroparam#

select a.fpkf_dm, a.fpkfgtmc, a.ssswjg_dm, b.swjgmc ssswjgmc, a.kflx_dm, a.yxbz, a.sfgmfpzdfsgt from fp_fpkf a, dm_gy_swjg b where a.ssswjg_dm = b.swjg_dm and a.ssswjg_dm = ? and (1 = ? or a.fpkfgtmc = ?) and (1 = ? or a.kflx_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or a.sfgmfpzdfsgt = ?) and (1 = ? or a.yxbz = ?) order by a.yxbz desc, a.kflx_dm,a.fpkfgtmc

select qh.xzqhsz_dm code, qh.xzqhmc caption, qh.sjxzqhsz_dm pcode from dm_gy_xzqh qh where qh.xzqhsz_dm in (select t.xzqhsz_dm from cs_dj_swjggxgwxzqhdzb t where t.swjg_dm = ? and t.xybz = 'Y' and t.xybz = 'Y') and qh.yxbz = 'Y' and qh.xybz = 'Y' union select qh.xzqhsz_dm code, qh.xzqhmc caption, qh.sjxzqhsz_dm pcode from dm_gy_xzqh qh where qh.xzqhsz_dm in (select t.xzqhsz_dm from cs_dj_swjggxgwxzqhdzb t where t.swjg_dm = ? and t.xybz = 'Y' and t.xybz = 'Y') and qh.yxbz = 'Y' and qh.xybz = 'Y'

WITH mx AS (SELECT PP.DKSQUUID as uuid, PP.GHFNSRSBH AS GMFNSRSBH, PP.GHFNSRMC AS GMFMC FROM FP_DK_ZZSPTFP PP UNION all SELECT ZP.DKSQUUID as uuid, ZP.GHFNSRSBH AS GMFNSRSBH, ZP.GHFNSRMC AS GMFMC FROM FP_DK_ZZSFP ZP) SELECT mx.GMFNSRSBH, mx.GMFMC, YBSFE, DKSQJE, SQDHM, DJXH, SQRQ, SLR_DM, DKFPLB_DM, LCSLID, DKSQUUID, SQRXM, LRR_DM, LRRQ, KJBZ, KPJE FROM FP_DK_SQ, mx WHERE DJXH in (#macroparam#) AND SQRQ >= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND SQRQ <= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND ZFBZ_1 = 'N' AND ZSBZ = 'Y' AND DKFPLB_DM IN ('01', '09') AND FYBH IS NULL AND HZDKLX_DM IS NULL and DKSQUUID = mx.uuid order by sqrq desc
delete from fp_czrykfkc c where c.czrykfkcuuid = ? and c.czry_dm = ? and c.fpzl_dm = ? and c.fp_dm = ? and c.fpqshm = ? and c.fpzzhm = ?
select * from fp_yrzzzskspzqd_zzszyfp where waqsbdkzzskspzdksqduuid = ?
select qd.dcxcqduuid from fp_dcxcqdb qd, (select distinct qdmx.dcxcqduuid, qdmx.djxh from fp_dcxcqdb_mx qdmx where qdmx.djxh = ? ) qdbmx where qd.dcxcqduuid = qdbmx.dcxcqduuid #macroparam#

select z.djxh, z.gssquuid, z.skqj, z.gsshqksm, z.gssm, z.sqrxm, z.sqrq, z.sfwfwz, z.wfwzlx_dm, z.wfwzsd_dm, z.wfwzcy_dm, z.wfwzjl, m.gssqmxuuid, m.fpzl_dm, m.fp_dm, m.bglx_dm_1, m.dsbdrq, m.sfwcglfpgs, m.fs, m.fpqshm, m.fpzzhm, m.fpjxlx_dm, m.sjgsdq from fp_gsshsqbg z,fp_gsshsqbg_mx m where z.gssquuid = m.gssquuid and (1=#macroparam# or z.djxh=?) and (1=#macroparam# or m.fpzl_dm=?) and (1=#macroparam# or m.fp_dm=?) and (1=#macroparam# or to_number(m.fpqshm) <= to_number(?)) and (1=#macroparam# or to_number(m.fpzzhm) >= to_number(?)) order by z.djxh,m.fpzl_dm,m.fp_dm,m.fpqshm,m.fpzzhm

select gptp.tpjguuid, gptp.gptplx_dm, gptp.djxh, gptp.fpzl_dm, gptp.hzzggpsl, gptp.zgqxq, gptp.zgqxz, gptp.hzr_dm, gptp.hzrq, gptp.hzswjg_dm, gptp.lrr_dm, gptp.lrrq, gptp.xgr_dm, gptp.xgrq, gptp.sjgsdq, gptp.sjtb_sj, gptp.sygpsl from fp_gptpxx gptp where gptp.djxh = ? and gptp.zgqxq <= ? and gptp.zgqxz >= ? and gptp.gptplx_dm = ? and gptp.fpzl_dm = ? order by gptp.lrrq

SELECT QDB.DCXCQDUUID, QDB.QDTJ, QDB.QDR_DM, QDB.QDSWJG_DM, QDB.QDRQ, QDB.LRR_DM, QDB.LRRQ, QDB.XGR_DM, QDB.XGRQ, QDB.SJGSDQ, QDB.LCSLID, QDB.DCXCZHUUID, QDB.ZHSWJG_DM, QDB.LSRWBH FROM FP_DCXCQDB QDB WHERE 1 = 1 #macroparam#

SELECT MAX(CS.SWJG_DM), T1.ZSXM_DM, T1.ZSPM_DM, T1.ZSPMMC, CS.SL_1 AS SFL, '' SKSSQQ, '' SKSSQZ, 0 AS YJJE, 'N' SFRD FROM CS_FP_FPDKKXZSPM PM INNER JOIN CS_FP_FPDKSZDZB T ON PM.DKFPLB_DM = T.DKFPLB_DM AND PM.ZSXM_DM = T.ZSXM_DM AND T.DKFPLB_DM = '07' INNER JOIN DM_GY_ZSPM T1 ON PM.ZSXM_DM = T1.ZSXM_DM AND PM.ZSPM_DM = T1.ZSPM_DM INNER JOIN CS_GY_GLB_ZSPM CS ON T1.ZSPM_DM = CS.ZSPM_DM WHERE PM.YXBZ = 'Y' AND PM.XYBZ = 'Y' AND T.SWJG_DM IN (SELECT J.SWJG_DM FROM DM_GY_SWJG J START WITH J.SWJG_DM = ? CONNECT BY PRIOR J.SJSWJG_DM = J.SWJG_DM) GROUP BY T1.ZSXM_DM, T1.ZSPM_DM, T1.ZSPMMC, CS.SL_1

SELECT QD.LCSLID, QD.DCXCQDUUID, TO_CHAR(QDMXXX.DJXH) DJXH, QD.QDSWJG_DM, QD.QDR_DM, QD.QDTJ, QD.QDRQ, QD.LRR_DM, QD.LRRQ, QD.XGR_DM, QD.XGRQ, QD.SJGSDQ, QD.DCXCZHUUID, QD.ZHSWJG_DM, QD.LSRWBH, QD.QDPCH, QD.GWXH, QD.BZ_1 FROM FP_DCXCQDB QD, (SELECT DISTINCT QDMX.DCXCQDUUID, QDMX.DJXH FROM FP_DCXCQDB_MX QDMX WHERE ((QDMX.dcsx_dm like '11%' and 'Y' = ?) or (QDMX.dcsx_dm not like '11%' and 'N' = ?))) QDMXXX WHERE QD.DCXCQDUUID = QDMXXX.DCXCQDUUID AND QD.GWXH = ? AND QD.BZ_1 = 'Y' AND QD.DCXCZHUUID IS NULL AND QD.LSRWBH IS NULL
delete from fp_yrzzzskspzqd_zzszyfp where waqsbdkzzskspzdksqduuid =(select waqsbdkzzskspzdksqduuid from fp_waqsbdkzzskspzdksqd where lcslid = ?)
select ba.* from fp_yzjh jh, fp_yzybdwmcfpbaxx ba where jh.jhbzuuid = ba.yzybdwmcfpbauuid and jh.yzjhuuid = ?

select count(1) from fp_yzjhfp_mx a , fp_yzjhfp b where a.yzfpuuid = b.yzfpuuid and b.zfbz_1 = 'N' and a.fpzl_dm = ? and a.fp_dm = ? and to_number(a.fpqshm) #macroparam# and to_number(a.fpzzhm) #macroparam#

SELECT ZHB.DCXCZHUUID, ZHB.LSRWBH, TO_CHAR(ZHB.DJXH) DJXH, ZHB.ZHR_DM, ZHB.ZHSWJG_DM, ZHB.ZHRQ, ZHB.LRR_DM, ZHB.LRRQ, ZHB.XGR_DM, ZHB.XGRQ, ZHB.SJGSDQ, ZHB.PFBZ, ZHB.ZHRWBH FROM FP_DCXCZHB ZHB WHERE 1=1 #macroparam#

select sx.dcsx_dm, sx.dcsx_dm code, sx.dcsx_dm, sx.dcsxmc caption, sx.sjdcsx_dm, sx.sjdcsx_dm pcode from dm_zh_dcsx sx where sx.yxbz = 'Y' and sx.sjdcsx_dm is null and ((dcsx_dm like '11%' and 'Y' = ?) or (dcsx_dm not like '11%' and 'Y' = ?))
select * from fp_yrzzzskspzqd_hgjksdkxx where hgjksuuid = ?

select jc.nsrjcuuid, jc.djxh, jc.fpzl_dm, jc.fp_dm, jc.fs, jc.fpqshm, jc.fpzzhm, jc.fpzt_dm, jc.swjg_dm, jc.lrr_dm, jc.lrrq, jc.xgr_dm, jc.xgrq, jc.sjgsdq, jc.zgswskfj_dm from fp_nsrfpjc jc where jc.djxh = ? and jc.fpzl_dm in (#macroparam#) and jc.fpzt_dm = ? and rownum <= ?

with pzhd as ( select fp.fp_dm,fp.fpme from fp_pzhdxx hd, dm_fp_fpzl zl, dm_fp_fp fp where hd.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm and zl.fpzl_dm = fp.fpzl_dm and hd.djxh = ? and hd.yxbz = 'Y' and hd.yxqq <= ? and hd.yxqz >= ? and zl.defpbz = ? ) select nvl(sum(jc.fs * nvl(ph.fpme, 0)),0) nsrdefpje from fp_nsrfpjc jc, pzhd ph where jc.fp_dm = ph.fp_dm and jc.djxh = ? and jc.fpzt_dm = ?
delete from fp_pzhdsqsp_mx where sqspuuid in (select sqspuuid from fp_pzhdsqsp where lcslid = ?)
select * from fp_dcscsrdcxx where lsrwbh=? order by lrrq desc

select b.fpcglcjuuid, b.jdccgluuid, b.lrr_dm, swry.swryxm lrrxm, b.lrrq, b.fpzl_dm, b.fp_dm, fp.fpdmmc, b.fphm, trim(a.cglsjcjlx_dm) cglsjcjlxDm from fp_cglcj a, fp_cglcj_jdcfp b, dm_gy_swry swry, dm_fp_fp fp where a.fpcglcjuuid = b.fpcglcjuuid and b.lrr_dm = swry.swry_dm and b.fp_dm = fp.fp_dm and b.zfbz_1 = 'N' and a.djxh = ? and a.fpcglcjuuid = ?
select sum(t.kpje) kpje from fp_dk_sq t where t.fcjycjxxuuid = ? and t.zfbz_1 = 'N'

select a.fpzl_dm, a.fp_dm, a.fpqshm, a.fpzl_dm, a.fpzzhm, '42' fphd_dm, '发票退票' fphdmc, kf.fpkf_dm, kf.fpkf_dm, fpzlmc from fp_tp_mx a, fp_tp b, fp_fpkf kf,dm_fp_fpzl zl where a.fptpuuid = b.fptpuuid and a.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm(+) and b.fpkf_dm = kf.fpkf_dm and a.fptpmxuuid=?

select b.*, d.phcd from fp_cglcj a, fp_cglcj_jzyfp b left join fp_cglcj_fpyj c on b.cglcjfpyjuuid = c.cglcjfpyjuuid, dm_fp_fp d where a.fpcglcjuuid = b.fpcglcjuuid and b.zfbz_1 = 'N' and b.fp_dm = d.fp_dm and ((c.zfbz_1 = 'Y') or (b.cglcjfpyjuuid is null)) and a.fpcglcjuuid = ?

select a.yzfpuuid, a.yzcsdjxh, a.fpr_dm, b.swryxm fprxm, a.fprq, a.zfbz_1, a.wszg, a.ysdw_dm, a.wszzrq, a.sjgsdq, a.lrr_dm, a.xgr_dm, a.fpyzysbz, a.cycsmc, a.xzbz, a.bz, a.ysdw_1, a.jsswjg_1_dm, a.fpswjg_dm, a.rkswjg_dm, a.jsdwmc_1, a.sfrk from fp_yzjhfp a, dm_gy_swry b where a.fpr_dm = b.swry_dm and a.zfbz_1='N' and (1 = ? or a.fpswjg_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or a.rkswjg_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or a.yzcsdjxh = ?) and (1 = ? or a.fprq >= ?) and (1 = ? or a.fprq <= ?) and (1 = ? or a.fpyzysbz = ?) order by a.lrrq desc

select distinct t.sfcuuid, t.fpjcuuid, t.ssswjg_dm, t.sssqq, t.zfbz_1, t.sssqz, t.zfr_dm, t.zfrq_1, t.jbr_dm, t.zbrq, t.sjgsdq, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.xgr_dm, t.fzr_dm_1 from fp_sfcqkbg t,fp_sfcqkbg_mx mx where t.sfcuuid = mx.sfcuuid and (t.zfbz_1 = 'N' or t.zfbz_1 is null) and t.sssqq < to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and t.sssqz > to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and mx.fpkf_dm = ?
select d.zwjduuid, d.sqrq, d.sqrxm, d.jdr_dm, d.jdrq_1, d.jdswjg_dm, d.sfzjlx_dm, d.sfzjhm, d.lxdh from fp_zwjd d where d.lcslid = ? and d.sjgsdq like ?
select kpxeuuid, swxzxkuuid, swxzxkxm_dm, fpzl_dm, fpzgkpxe_dm, lrr_dm, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, sjgsdq, sjtb_sj, yxbz from fp_swxzxk_zgxe where swxzxkuuid=? and (yxbz='Y' or yxbz is null)
select dkfplx_dm code, dkfplxmc caption, null pcode from dm_fp_dkfplx where 1 = 1 #macroparam#

select kc.kfkcuuid, kc.fpzl_dm, zl.fpzlmc, kc.fp_dm, fp.fpdmmc, kc.fpkf_dm, kc.xs, kc.bs, (to_number(kc.fpzzhm) - to_number(kc.fpqshm) + 1) kcfs, kc.fpqshm, kc.fpzzhm, kc.xqshm, kc.xzzhm, '99' fpzt_dm, kc.swjg_dm, kc.sjgsdq, kc.lrr_dm, kc.xgr_dm, fp.phcd, fp.fpjj, fp.fpxj, fp.mbfs, fp.mxbfs, zl.jldw_dm from fp_swjgkfkc kc, dm_fp_fpzl zl, dm_fp_fp fp where kc.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm and kc.fpkf_dm = ? and kc.fp_dm = fp.fp_dm and exists (select 1 from fp_dbckd a,fp_dbckd_mx b where a.fpckkf_dm = kc.fpkf_dm and a.dbckuuid = b.dbckuuid and b.fpqshm = kc.fpqshm and b.fpzzhm = kc.fpzzhm and b.fp_dm = kc.fp_dm and a.hzfpdbckdbz = 'N') and kc.fpzt_dm = '21' union select kc.kfkcuuid, kc.fpzl_dm, zl.fpzlmc, kc.fp_dm, fp.fpdmmc, kc.fpkf_dm, kc.xs, kc.bs, (to_number(kc.fpzzhm) - to_number(kc.fpqshm) + 1) kcfs, kc.fpqshm, kc.fpzzhm, kc.xqshm, kc.xzzhm, '98' fpzt_dm, kc.swjg_dm, kc.sjgsdq, kc.lrr_dm, kc.xgr_dm, fp.phcd, fp.fpjj, fp.fpxj, fp.mbfs, fp.mxbfs, zl.jldw_dm from fp_swjgkfkc kc, dm_fp_fpzl zl, dm_fp_fp fp where kc.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm and kc.fp_dm = fp.fp_dm and exists (select 1 from fp_dbckd a,fp_dbckd_mx b where a.fpckkf_dm = kc.fpkf_dm and a.dbckuuid = b.dbckuuid and b.fpqshm = kc.fpqshm and b.fpzzhm = kc.fpzzhm and b.fp_dm = kc.fp_dm and a.fprkkf_dm = ? and a.hzfpdbckdbz = 'N') and kc.fpzt_dm = '21' union select kc.kfkcuuid, kc.fpzl_dm, zl.fpzlmc, kc.fp_dm, fp.fpdmmc, kc.fpkf_dm, kc.xs, kc.bs, (to_number(kc.fpzzhm) - to_number(kc.fpqshm) + 1) kcfs, kc.fpqshm, kc.fpzzhm, kc.xqshm, kc.xzzhm, kc.fpzt_dm, kc.swjg_dm, kc.sjgsdq, kc.lrr_dm, kc.xgr_dm, fp.phcd, fp.fpjj, fp.fpxj, fp.mbfs, fp.mxbfs, zl.jldw_dm from fp_swjgkfkc kc, dm_fp_fpzl zl, dm_fp_fp fp where kc.fpzl_dm = zl.fpzl_dm and kc.fp_dm = fp.fp_dm and kc.fpkf_dm = ? and kc.fpzt_dm != '20' and not exists (select 1 from fp_dbckd a,fp_dbckd_mx b where a.fpckkf_dm = kc.fpkf_dm and a.dbckuuid = b.dbckuuid and b.fpqshm = kc.fpqshm and kc.fpzt_dm = '21' and b.fpzzhm = kc.fpzzhm and b.fp_dm = kc.fp_dm and a.hzfpdbckdbz = 'N')
SELECT T.ZSXM_DM, T.ZSPM_DM, T.LJBZQ, T.LJBZZ, T.UUID, T.MSSR, T.MSSRBL, T.ZSZM_DM, T.SLWHMS FROM CS_SB_MSSR T WHERE T.XYBZ = 'Y' AND T.YXBZ = 'Y' AND SYSDATE BETWEEN T.YXQQ AND T.YXQZ

select fp.fpzl_dm, fp.fp_dm, fp.nd, fp.yspc, fp.fphy_dm, fp.zz_dm, fp.phcd, fp.fpjj, fp.fpxj, fp.dkj, fp.fpzg, fp.xybz, fp.mxbfs, fp.yxbz, fp.fpzlxl, fp.pjzdfs_dm, fp.fpxzqh_dm, fp.djbz, fp.gg_dm, fp.fpdmmc, fp.gg, fp.gdsbz, fp.jldw_dm, fp.mbfs, fp.fpme, fp.fpsx_dm from dm_fp_fp fp where fp.fp_dm = ?

select mx.zwjdmxuuid, mx.fpzl_dm, mx.fp_dm, mx.fphm, mx.fpmmskm, mx.sfytk, mx.fplyfnsrsbh, mx.fplyfnsrmc, mx.fplyfnsrdjxh, mx.fpkjfnsrsbh, mx.fpkjfnsrmc, mx.kprq, mx.kpje, mx.djxh, mx.fpjdjg_dm, mx.zwjdcljg_dm, fpzl.fpzlmc from fp_zwjd_mx mx,dm_fp_fpzl fpzl where mx.fpzl_dm=fpzl.fpzl_dm and mx.zwjduuid = ? and mx.sjgsdq like ?

select kc.kfkcuuid, kc.fpkf_dm, kc.fpzl_dm, b.fpzlmc, kc.fp_dm, kc.fpqshm, kc.fpzzhm, kc.fpzt_dm, kc.lrr_dm, kc.lrrq, a.fpkfgtmc, a.ssswjg_dm swjg_dm, a.kflx_dm from fp_swjgkfkc kc, fp_fpkf a, dm_fp_fpzl b where kc.fpkf_dm = a.fpkf_dm(+) and kc.fpzl_dm = b.fpzl_dm(+) and (1 = ? or kc.fpzl_dm = ?) and kc.fp_dm = ? and (1 = ? or kc.fpzt_dm = ?) and to_number(kc.fpqshm) #macroparam# and to_number(kc.fpzzhm) #macroparam#

select 1 from dual where exists (select 1 from fp_yjjcyqk y, fp_yjjcyqk_mx ym where y.fpcyuuid = ym.fpcyuuid and ym.zfbz_1 != 'Y' and ym.fpzl_dm = ? and ym.fp_dm = ? and to_number(ym.fpqshm) <= to_number(?) and to_number(ym.fpzzhm) >= to_number(?) and y.djxh = ?)

select b.fpcglcjuuid, b.bdccgluuid, b.lrr_dm, swry.swryxm lrrxm, b.lrrq, b.fpzl_dm, b.fp_dm, fp.fpdmmc, b.fphm, trim(a.cglsjcjlx_dm) cglsjcjlxDm from fp_cglcj a, fp_cglcj_bdcfp b, dm_gy_swry swry, dm_fp_fp fp where a.fpcglcjuuid = b.fpcglcjuuid and b.lrr_dm = swry.swry_dm and b.fp_dm = fp.fp_dm and b.zfbz_1 = 'N' and a.djxh = ? and a.fpcglcjuuid = ?

select t.djxh, t.dzbzdszl_dm, t.lcslid, t.zzr_dm, t.wszzrq, t.wszzswjg_dm, t.xmllsh, t.swsx_dm, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.xgr_dm, t.xgrq, t.zg, t.sjgsdq, t.swjgjg, t.nh, t.wh, t.ywwsuuid, t.dyry_dm, t.dyrq, t.zfr_dm, t.zfsj, t.wszg, t.sdzt_dm, t.ajxxuuid, t.blsx, t.wsbh, t.dybz, t.ywfl_dm, t.sshj_dm, t.uuid, t.ywzjuuid, t.jgssswjg_dm, t.bz, t.wszzgz_dm, t.fyjg_dm, t.jgssswjgmc, t.fyjgmc, t.swrysf_dm from gy_ws_wszb t where (t.wszg =? or t.wszg =?) and t.dzbzdszl_dm=?
